###第四章 想他
Chapter 4: Miss Him
1.【热！枫神小凤漓是兄妹关系！】
1. [Breaking news! Ye Feng and Ye Li are siblings!]
2.【小凤漓头条微博评论超一千万条！】
2. [Ye Li has received more than 10 million replies!]
3.【枫神粉丝道歉！】
3. [Ye Feng's fans apologize!]
what？
What?
ys一澄清，所有恶意的目光顿时就从叶漓身上转到了叶眉身上。
The clarification made by YS Fashion immediately drew attention away from Ye Li and onto Ye Mei.
ys这边也是无比恼怒。
The authorities of YS Fashion was incredibly infuriated.
“@小凤漓，穿自家妹妹的裙子，是不是得@一下原主表示一下啊？你这样子也太那啥了吧？”
"@LittleYeLi, since you're wearing your younger sister's dress, shouldn't you be mentioning the original owner of the dress in your tweet to give her credit? This is so inappropriate of you."
“@小凤漓，给大家介绍一下，我亲妹。”
"@LittleYeLi, please introduce yourself to everyone, my biological sister."
“@眉眼如画，这位小姐，请你自重，当时的情况我们店铺记录的清清楚楚，是您自己没有足够的余额付款，我们才将礼服给了网上先下单了人，你不顾我们工作人员提醒，私自拍照发微博这已经造成了侵犯我们店铺隐私的罪名，若是你还不悔改，向叶小姐和我方道歉，我们这边将会走法律流程，希望你能配合！”

"@PrettyLikeAPainting, Miss, please respect and behave yourself. We have a clear footage of the situation that happened in our store at that time. We only sold that gown to the person who made an online purchase because you didn't have enough money to pay for it. You ignored our sales assistant's reminder, secretly took a photo of yourself in the gown and posted it on the internet. By doing that, you've already committed the crime of invading the privacy of our brand. If you're still unrepentant and refuse to apologize to us and Miss Ye Li, we will proceed to take legal action. I hope you will be cooperative!"
“@看小凤漓照进我微博置顶，黑的太明显了吧，明明上次我看到枫神和小凤漓吃饭的时候的照片，根本不丑好吗？”
"@ComeToMyPageToSeePhotosOfYeLi, it's so obvious that you're a hater. I clearly remember seeing the photo of Ye Li and Ye Feng having lunch together.She isn't ugly at all, okay?"
“一个远房表弟，徐晗，近几年才搬来帝都，他好像是还跟你一所大学。”他说。
"He's just a distant cousin, Xu Han. He moved to the capital a few years ago and he seems to go to the same college as you," he explained.
“一次两次都不交，你当老师是摆设吗？给我出去站着！等会教室的卫生你来的就交给你来打扫！”
"You repeatedly failed to submit your papers. Do you think I won't do anything? Go out and stand outside the classroom! You'll be in charge of cleaning the classroom later!"
“不信您可以自己去查。”服务员无奈的道。
"You can check for yourself if you don't believe me,' the sales assistant said helplessly.
“不嘛不嘛，哥哥，我就要那一条！”女孩扁着嘴撒娇道。
"No, no, Brother, I want that one!" the girl insisted petulantly with pursed lips.
“不好意思啊小倩，我也不知道你要回来，我这次回来是打算进大哥公司上班，有点着急，所以才没有叫你。”
"Sorry, Xu Qian, I didn't know that you were coming home. I came back this time with plans to start working in Xu Fengnian's company. I was a little eager so I didn't inform you."
“不好的话？他说了什么？”叶明闻言，眼神一眯，强大的压迫顿时扑面而来。
"Mean things? What did he say?" Hearing his words, Ye Ming squinted and a strong pressure immediately swarmed towards him.
“不怪你怪谁？”孟非理所当然的道。
"Who else should we blame if not you?" Meng Fei said righteously.
“不愧是我的偶像，吃个饭也有这样的影响力！帅呆了。”周雪捧着脸花痴道。
"He's really worthy of being my idol. He's so influential even when he's just having a meal! He's so dashing," Zhou Xue said, looking extremely smitten.
“不是吧，从来没见男神帮谁说过话，我惊了。”
"Seriously? I've never seen Idol speaking up for anyone. I'm shocked."
“不是吧？我不是听说她被人包养了吗，还要嫁给那个公司的老总来着，听说那个人对她可大方了，她用的首饰，都是天价呢！”
"Seriously? I heard she became someone's mistress and that she's going to marry a CEO of a company. I heard that that person is very generous to her. All of her accessories are exorbitant!"
“不是的，我看中了一条礼服，比较贵，我的钱不够所以才会找你借的，姐姐，好姐姐，你不会不帮我的对不对？”叶眉伸手拉住了叶漓，一脸撒娇的语气。

"No, I've set my sights on a gown that's rather expensive. I decided to borrow money from you because I don't have enough money. Ye Li, my good sister, you'll help me, won't you?" Ye Li asked petulantly as she reached out to pull Ye Li.
“不然咱们发上贴吧问问，贴吧这么大，总有人认识吧？”

"Why don't we put it up on Baidu Tieba [1. Baidu Tieba is a Chinese communication and forums platform, hosted by Chinese search engine company Baidu.] and ask around? There must be someone who knows who she is, right?"
“不用过来接，宴会结束，我送阿漓回去。”徐凤年淡声开口。
"You don't have to come over to pick her up, I'll send Ye Li home after this," Xu Fengnian said calmly.
“不知道具体情况还这么说，让大家误会，难怪叶漓这么生气，要是我妹妹这样说，我也会生气的。”
"She doesn't know the details and yet she still said that to cause a misunderstanding for everyone. No wonder Ye Li is so angry with her, I'd be infuriated if my sister said so too."
“不过再帅也没你帅，我老公依旧还是徐家门面担当！”她最后一句，用两人才能听到的声音说。
"However, he's not as handsome as you are. My husband is still the visual representative of the Xu Family!" she whispered.
“不过这件事，我们可以先保密吗？”叶漓小心的看他。
"But, can we keep this a secret for now?" Ye Li asked, looking at him cautiously.
“不过这样也好，他们都是咱们向阳粉，哪有一家人自相矛盾呢，都是姐妹啊不是吗？”
"However, this is good, they are both fans of Xiangyang. How can there be conflicts within the fan club? We're all sisters, aren't we?"
“不，不会吧....”听到这一声哥哥，几个女生突然就一个激灵，回过神来。
"Seriously..." The few girls suddenly shivered and recovered from the shock after hearing Ye Li's words.
“不，不是的枫神，我们之前不知道她和你的关系，你听我们解释。”
"No, no, Ye Feng, that's because we didn't know how she was related to you previously. Let us explain."
“两人相比，简直相差了个天地好吗？你们看到眉宝最新发的图片了吗？那条礼服可价值千万，这才是真正的豪门小姐，叶漓我是真看不出来，他们学校翻出来的那些照片，真的是丑到掉渣了，不信你们去我微博看，我置顶第一条就是。”

"The two of them are worlds apart, okay? Did you guys see the latest photo that Ye Mei posted? That gown costs 14 million dollars. That's what a true heiress of a wealthy family is like. I really can't tell that Ye Li is one. Look at the photos of her in school. She's really so hideous. If you guys don't believe me, go look at my Twitter. It's at the top of the page."
“为什么会转变注意？我刚刚可听到了一些关于叶漓的事情，听说她已经有喜欢的人了。”徐媛疑惑。
"Why did they suddenly change their minds? I heard some things about Ye Li and she seems to be carrying a torch for someone else," Xu Yuan said in bewilderment.
“之前就听说她天天缠着向阳学长，学长都厌恶死她了，现在又缠着咱们枫神，呸！也不撒泡尿照照自己，就她这样的也配？”

"Previously, I heard that she pestered Xiangyang everyday and he really hates her. Now, she's pestering our idol Ye Feng. Psht! She should take a look at herself in the mirror. How is she worthy of him?"
“之前我还听说阿漓宁死不嫁凤年，怎么突然就转变主意了呢？”
"Previously, I heard that Ye Li would rather die than marry Xu Fengnian, why the sudden change in mind?"
“之前的聚会是她去的，就代表她可以私自拿走我的东西了？换做拿走的是你们的东西，你们还能冠冕堂皇的说出这种话？都是大人了，虽然说我可以不在意，但是始终上不得台面，没想到支持的人倒是挺多，啧，今儿个倒是让我开了眼界，不过不是同类人也不会走到一起，呵呵，我能理解。”叶漓拨弄了一下自己修剪整齐的指甲，讽刺意味十足。

"She used to attend gatherings in the past but does that mean that she can take my things from me presumptuously? If you were in my shoes, would you still be able to say this righteously? We're all adults. Although I can turn a blind eye to it, it still is a shameful behavior. I didn't expect so many people to be so supportive of it. Tsk, I've really gotten an eyeopener today, but birds of the same feather really do flock together. Hah, I understand." Ye Li fiddled with her neatly trimmed nails and made a sarcastic remark.
“也怪那个叶眉，什么都不知道就乱说话，不知道自己什么身份嘛，不然也不会害的咱们自家人差点反目成仇啊！”
"It's all Ye Mei's fault. If she doesn't know anything, she should just keep quiet. She caused us fans of the same club to almost fall out with each other!"
“也是厉害，回校第一天就逃课，不怪老师生气。”
"That's pretty impressive too. She skipped class on the first day that she returned to school. No wonder Teacher is upset."
“二哥哥，你回家了，好想你。”叶漓扑了过去。
"Second Brother, you're home. I missed you so much," Ye Li leaped towards him.
“二小姐你这么优秀，还需要走后台吗？”叶漓一脸天真的看她。
"Miss Xu Yuan, you're so brilliant, do you still need to get in through your connections?" Ye Li asked, looking at her innocently.
“二小姐你这种身份，想见枫神肯定轻而易举，不像是某些人，不知道用了什么见不得人的方法，我看是故意想蹭我们家枫神的热度吧。”
"Miss Xu Yuan, with your status, it must be easy for you to see Ye Feng, unlike someone else here who has used some sordid methods to get to know him. I bet she's just using him for fame."
“二小姐说的没错，但是这种事都是各自意愿，没有谁会强迫你上去跳舞，别人又如何知道我不会？”叶漓挑了挑眉。
"Miss Xu Yuan, you're right, but this depends on the choice of every individual. No one will force me to go up and dance. How would others know that I can't dance?" Ye Li asked, raising her eyebrow.
“二弟，让人去查查，我倒是想看看那个不想活了的，竟然敢嚼我妹妹的舌根！”叶洛阴沉的道。
"Second Brother, go get someone to investigate on this matter. I want to see who has the audacity to do this to my sister!" Ye Luo said sullenly.
“交什么往，阿漓是我妹妹！”叶枫阴沉着脸看向校长：“什么时候哥哥带妹妹吃个饭，还要被施以退学这种惩罚了，学校什么时候有这种不成文规矩？”

"Dating? Ye Li is my younger sister!" Ye Feng glared at the principal sullenly and questioned, "When has having lunch with one's brother become an offense that would result in a punishment as severe as expulsion? Since when was there a silent rule as such?"
“什么啊？叶漓就这样回来了？”
"What? Ye Li came home just like that?"
“什么绯闻？”老爷子皱了皱眉问。
"What scandal?" Xu Fengnian's grandfather asked with a frown.
“什么鬼？她坐那里？那不是那个叶漓的位置吗？”
"What the hell? She's sitting there? Isn't that Ye Li's seat?"
“什么！”叶枫闻言，脸色瞬间就沉了。
"What!?!" Upon hearing her words, Ye Feng's face immediately turned sullen.
“什么！”叶眉闻言，瞬间瞪大了眼睛，不可置信的惊叫出声。
"What!?!" Ye Mei's eyes widened in shock immediately after hearing her words, and she shrieked in disbelief.
“什么！他说你恶心！”三人的脸一下就阴沉了下去。
"What!?! He said that you're disgusting!?!" The faces of her three brothers grew sullen.
“什么，妹，妹妹！”
"What? Sis... Sister!?!"
“什么？”于向阳一愣，随后一喜：“你愿意原谅我了吗？”
"What?" After being stunned, Yu Xiangyang was thrilled and he asked, "Are you willing to forgive me?"
“什么？”叶漓愣了一下，没明白他这话什么意思。
"What?" Ye Li was stunned as she didn't understand what the meant.
“今天我是来找阿漓道歉的，我知道之前的事情是我不对。”于向阳困难的呼吸着，压制着内心的恐惧开口。
"I'm here to apologize to Li today, I know that I'm at fault for what happened before," Yu Xiangyang said while breathing with difficulty, suppressing the fear within him.
“今天要去见凤年哥哥，我怎么也得穿的独一无二！”
"I'm going to see Xu Fengnian today. I must be dressed uniquely!"
“他跟叶漓什么时候关系这么好了？”
"Since when did he become so close to Ye Li?"
“他，他们两个到底是什么人啊？”孟母惨白着一张脸，着实被刚刚丈夫要下跪那一幕吓惨了。
"Who, who are those two people?" Meng Fei's mother asked, turning as pale as a sheet because she was truly shocked by the sight of her husband kneeling down.
“以后我们可得紧紧抱上眉儿的大腿跟你混。”
"From now on, we must cling onto you, Ye Mei."
“伤害了你女儿？”叶枫回头看向孟非一家。
"Hurt your daughter?" Ye Feng turned around to stare at Meng Fei and her parents.
“但是我不会跳舞呀。”叶漓扫了一眼叶眉几乎快要扭曲的脸说。
"But I can't dance," Ye Li said, glancing at Ye Mei's face which was almost turning into a grimace.
“你....”徐晗上前，表情复杂的看向叶漓，却又不知道该怎么问。
"You..." Xu Han stepped forward and looked at Ye Li with a complicated expression, but he did not know how to ask her about it.
“你个死孩子，傻了啊，快跟叶小姐道歉！”孟父一把将女儿扯了过来。
"You stupid child, are you silly? Hurry up and apologize to Miss Ye!" Meng Fei's father quickly pulled Meng Fei over.
“你为我着想？你为我着想所以就把我推了出来承受一切责任，然后被万夫所指是吗？我为什么要背上这莫须有的罪名，你作为我的妹妹不帮我说话就算了，还向大家实证就是我的错，当真是我的好妹妹啊，要不是当时你没在现场，我都要以为你是亲眼所见了！”

"You're sparing a thought for me? Just because you spare a thought for me, you can push me out to bear all the responsibility and then make me bear the responsibility for something that I didn't do? You're my younger sister but you didn't stand up for me. You even made it clear to everyone that it's my fault. You're really my wonderful sister. If not for the fact that you weren't there when it happened, I would have thought that you saw it with your own eyes!"
“你之前不是也想要我身上这条夏夜之星吗，我感觉我穿着有点撑不起来，不然给你试试？”她丝毫不露慌张的说。
"Didn't you also want this Stars of the Summer Night gown that I'm wearing? I don't think that I can carry it well. Why don't you give it a try?" she asked, not flustered at all.
“你之前不是喜欢向阳学长吗？怎么这么快就移情转念了，要不要这么不要脸？”
"Haven't you always like Xiangyang? How can you change your mind so quickly? Must you be so shameless?"
“你也回去吧，该说的我妹妹已经都说了，她既然不想原谅你，那你就最好不要再出现在她的面前。”叶洛威胁的目光落到了于向阳身上。

"You should get going too. My sister has already said everything there is to be said. Since she doesn't want to forgive you, you'd better not appear in front of her again." Ye Luo's threatening gaze fell on Yu Xiangyang.
“你也大一了，也要不了多少时间，对了，你这次回来准备好去哪个大学了？”徐媛笑着问。
"You're already in college now. It won't be long before you do too. By the way, which college do you plan to go to this time?" Xu Yuan asked with a smile.
“你他妈耳朵聋了吗，没听到我们的话，我们让你离徐晗远一点，不然别怪我们不客气了！”另一个女生上前，撸起了袖子，一副准备动手的姿态！

"Damn it, are you deaf? Didn't you hear what we said? I want you to stay further away from Xu Han. Or else, don't blame us for being nasty!" Another girl stepped forward and rolled up her sleeves, looking like she was all ready to attack!
“你们不要这样说，我姐姐遇到这样的事情，她已经十分伤心了，我希望大家能看在我的份儿上，不要再纠结这件事了。”听到同学们的猜测，叶眉有些生气的停下脚步，维护叶漓道。

"Don't say that, my sister is already extremely upset because of this matter. I hope that you can all stop harping on this matter for my sake." Upon hearing the conjectures of her schoolmates, Ye Mei stopped in her tracks angrily and defended Ye Li.
“你们刚刚想对我妹妹做什么？”叶枫因为自己的粉丝做错了事，这会儿看着自家妹妹跟二哥说话，都不理自己，心里有些埋怨，看向那几个欺负了妹妹的女生时，眉眼中已经带了冰冷。

"What were you people trying to do to my sister just now?" Ye Feng was a little upset when he saw that his sister was talking to Ye Xun and not him because his fans had done something wrong. His gaze was icy cold.
“你们别误会，叶漓姐姐是第一次参加这种聚会，可能不太懂规矩，也不知道二小姐如今的地位，若是冒犯到了大家，我替她向你们道歉，真不好意思！”叶眉赶忙站出来帮忙说话。

"Don't misunderstand, it's Ye Li's first time attending such gatherings and she might not know the rules. She probably doesn't know Miss Xu Yuan's status either. If she has offended any of you, I apologize on her behalf, I'm really sorry!" Ye Mei hurriedly stood out and put in a good word for Ye Li.
“你们别这样，我姐姐她....”叶眉担心的上前说话。
"Don't be like this, my sister..." Ye Mei stepped forward and asked worriedly.
“你们找不到，所以怪我？？”叶漓气笑了。
"You can't find him so you're blaming me?" Ye Li asked, laughing out of pique.
“你们有没有发现，她好像就是叶漓？”
"Have you guys not noticed that she seems to be Ye Li?"
“你们没听说吗？她前段时间去找于向阳表白，结果当场被拒，跳河自杀了，当时来了好多警察，我还以为救不回来了，啧啧。”

"Haven't you guys heard? She confessed to Yu Xiangyang previously but ended up getting rejected by him. She decided to jump into the river to kill herself. At that time, there were many police officers and I thought that she'd definitely die. Tsk, tsk."
“你们男神？你说的是谁？”叶漓莫名。
"Your idol? Who are you referring to?" Ye Li asked in confusion.
“你们给的脸？我说我要了吗？”叶漓手中的酒杯一顿，看着几人的眼中充满了不屑。
"You're saving me face? Did I say I want it?" Ye Li swirled the glass of wine in her hand and looked at them in disdain.
“你们说什么呀？我怎么听不懂？”徐媛疑惑的问。
"What are you guys talking about? Why don't I understand?" Xu Yuan asked in puzzlement.
“你们这些人出来参加聚会，都不知道自带舞伴的吗？怎么个个都来邀请我未婚夫，这让我很为难呀。”叶漓故作苦恼的说。

"Don't you people know to bring your own dance partners when you come out to such gatherings? Why are you guys inviting my fiancé? You're putting me in a spot," Ye Li said, pretending to be frustrated.
“你别哭啊，我可没欺负你啊，大家都看着呢，又不是眼瞎，我实话实说而已，你怎么就委屈上了，被你冤枉该委屈的我都还没哭呢，你哭什么？”看着叶眉擦起了眼泪，一副可怜兮兮的模样，叶漓挑着眉头笑道。

"Don't cry, I'm not bullying you. Everyone's watching.They're not blind either and I'm just telling the truth. Why do you look so aggrieved? I'm the one being maligned by you and I should be the one to feel aggrieved. I'm not even crying, what are you crying for?" Ye Li said to Ye Mei with raised brows and a smile when she saw Ye Mei wiping her tears pitifully.
“你别管，这事让爸爸解决。”已经失了理智的孟父哪有注意女儿话中的意思，直接就制止道。
"Stay out of this, let me handle it," said Meng Fei's father who immediately stopped her because he was too irrational to understand what his daughter meant.
“你吃个饭你搞这么大的骚动做什么，你知道阿漓会因此而遭遇什么？我看你是想死是不是？”
"Why are you creating such huge fuss out of a meal? Do you know what this has caused Li? You must have a death wish, don't you?"
“你在家休息了那么久，怎么着一篇论文还没时间写吗？我再给你一天的时间，若是不补交给我，那接下来教室一个星期的卫生都交给你，给我出去站着。”程艳认为这件事叶眉肯定是告诉过叶漓的，只是她偷懒不想写所以现在才交不出来。

"You've been resting at home for so long, why didn't you have any time to write a paper? I'll give you another day, if you still don't submit it, you'll be in charge of cleaning for the rest of the week. Go and stand outside." Cheng Yan felt that Ye Mei must have told Ye Li about the homework but Ye Li was lazy and chose not to do it, thus she could not submit it now.
“你好。”
"Hello."
“你好，我叫温雅。”来人穿着一身黑色礼裙，整个人又高又瘦，仿佛黑天鹅一般。
"Hello, my name is Wen Ya," said a woman who was wearing a black gown. She was tall and thin, resembling a swan.
“你姐姐，到底怎么了....”于向阳也是很茫然。
"What's wrong with your sister..." Yu Xiangyang was dumbfounded as well.
“你就是叶漓？”校长蹙了蹙眉，看向叶漓。
"Are you Ye Li?" the principal asked with a frown as he looked at Ye Li.
“你就是太傻了，她对你可一点都不好，还老是连累你，也只有你这么笨的人才会一直为她说话。”王丽一脸打抱不平的说。

"You're too silly. That's why she's so hostile towards you and gets you embroiled in her affairs all the time. You're so silly for standing up for her and putting in a good word for her all the time," Wang Li said righteously.
“你开心就好。”他伸手揉了揉叶漓的脑袋。
"So long as it makes you happy." He reached out to rub Ye Li's head.
“你心情不好关我屁事啊，凭什么迁怒我，说好听一点，我就是你的一个粉丝，现在因为你的态度，让我粉转黑了，有什么好道歉的，以后对粉丝说话客气点就是了，毕竟啊，不是什么粉丝都是你能招惹的起的，你说是不是？”叶漓把玩着一旁男人垂下来的手指，一脸不屑。

"What does your foul mood have to do with me? Why did you have to vent your anger on me? To put it nicely, I'm a fan of yours. However, I've decided to start hating on you because of your attitude. What's there to apologize about? Just be kinder when you talk to your fans in the future. After all, you can't afford to provoke all your fans, don't you think so?" Ye Li said with a look of disdain as she fiddled with the finger of the man beside her.
“你怎么来了！”叶家三兄弟看到于向阳，下意识的就去看叶漓的脸色，见她并无什么变化，稍稍松了口气，可看向于向阳的眼神却很冷。

"Why are you here?!" When the three sons of the Ye Family saw Yu Xiangyang, he subconsciously looked at the expression on Ye Li's face. Seeing that there were not many changes in her expressions, they heaved a sigh of relief but he the gaze in their eyes were icy cold when they glared at Yu Xiangyang.
“你怎么知道我大哥不介意呢，这种事情不太好吧，虽然说阿漓我跟你从小认识，但是这件事确实不太对，毕竟闹大了名声也不好听吧。”徐媛担忧的看她。

"How do you know my cousin doesn't mind? This doesn't seem right. Ye Li, I may have known you since we were children but this matter isn't appropriate. After all, it won't be good for your reputation if things get blown out of proportion," Xu Yuan said, looking at her worriedly.
“你怕是巴之不得才对吧。”叶漓心中暗嘲。
'You'd probably be more than happy if that happens.' Ye Li sneered and thought to herself.
“你想跳就跳，跟我说做什么？”叶漓唇角掀起了一抹嘲讽的弧度。
"Go ahead and dance if you want. What are you telling me for?" Ye Li gibed with a derisive smirk.
“你是在教我做事？！”叶漓抬头看她，眼神冰冷异常。
"Are you telling me what to do!?!" Ye Li looked up at her with an extraordinarily cold gaze.
“你没事吧？”徐晗开口说了一句，随后见她表情有些惊讶，又解释说：“我说你跟于向阳的事情，你没事吧？”
"Are you okay?" Xu Han asked. Seeing that she was a little surprised, he explained, "I mean, the matter between you and Yu Xiangyang. Are you alright?"
“你没听她姐姐说了吗？她当时也不在现场，并不知道具体情况。”
"Didn't you hear what Ye Li said? Ye Mei wasn't there at the time and she doesn't know the details of what happened."
“你看因为她，这些人还找到你微博了，害的你被连累，真是个害人精。”
"Look, those people found your Weibo account because of her and caused you to be implicated. She's really a jinx."
“你看她那长相，一看就不是什么好女孩，一双眼睛就跟那狐狸精似的，估摸着是怕自家妹妹来抢了自己风头吧。”
"Look at the way she looks. It's obvious that she's not a good girl. Her eyes are like that of a fox and I reckon she's just scared that her younger sister would steal her limelight."
“你胡说八道，我们是粉丝，就有义务维护偶像的名誉，而且这件事本来就是你的错，凭什么要我们偶像承担责任！”女生怒目而视。

"Bullshit. Since we're his fans, it's our duty to defend our idol's reputation. Besides, you're the one at fault in this matter. Why does our idol have to take responsibility!?!" the girl retorted as she glowered at Ye Li.
“你装什么傻，我们说的当然是徐晗，刚刚你被老师罚站，他竟然站出来帮你说话！你说，你是不是背地里勾引了他！”那女生恼怒的道。

"Why are you feigning ignorance? Of course I'm referring to Xu Han. Just now, he spoke up for you when you were punished by Teacher! Did you seduce him in secret!?!" the girl questioned in exasperation.
“你要逃课？”徐晗微微眯了眯眼，蹙眉看她。
"You want to skip class?" Xu Han asked with a frown while squinting.
“你说什么？”叶枫的眉眼一沉，目光带着几分杀气的看向说话的两人：“有本事再说一遍！”
"What are you saying?" Ye Feng's gaze turned deeper and he looked at the two of them with a murderous gaze. "I dare you to say it again!"
“你还装什么，全校都知道了你中午和枫神吃饭的事情，微博都上热搜了，你还不承认？”孟非一脸嫉妒的道。

"Why are you still pretending? The entire school knows that you had lunch with Ye Feng and you're one of the trending searches on Twitter. Why are you still denying?" Meng Fei said with a look of jealousy.
“你这丫头，怎么又瘦了。”叶旬抱着自家妹妹转了一圈，突然就蹙了蹙眉，怪罪的说。
"Why have you lost weight again?" Carrying his younger sister and spinning her around in his arms, he suddenly frowned and asked that question.
“你这丫头，真是皮。”老爷子看到了她，先是一愣，随后乐了，怪罪了一声，脸上却多了几分喜色。
"Such a mischievous girl." When Xu Fengnian's grandfather saw her, he was first stunned, after which he was overjoyed to see her. After chiding her a little, he beamed with joy.
“你这样看我做什么，是心虚了吗？我知道阿漓根本不喜欢你，你能不能不要在逼迫她做不想要做的事情了，上次因为你们都在逼她，她就选择了自杀，你们难道还不明白吗！”他为叶漓打抱不平的指责起了徐凤年。

"Why are you looking at me like that? Are you feeling guilty? I know Li doesn't like you at all. Will you stop forcing her to do things she doesn't want to do? Previously, she chose to take her own life because all of you kept forcing her. Don't you understand!?!" he berated Xu Fengnian, pretending to stand up for Ye Li.
“你这话说错了叔叔，是你女儿先欺负的我，我只不过是自保而已。”叶漓颇为认真的回答这个问题。
"You're wrong, Uncle, your daughter was the one who bullied me first. I was just protecting myself," Ye Li answered solemnly.
“你，你找死是不是！别以为我们真不敢对你动手！”
"You, do you have a death wish!?! Don't think that we really don't dare to do anything to you!"
“你，你胡说八道什么，再敢乱说一句，信不信我让学校把你开除！”程艳彻底慌了。
"What nonsense are you spouting? Try saying another nonsensical thing. Do you believe I'll get the school to expel you!?!" Cheng Yan panicked.
“你，你说什么？”
"What... what did you say?"
“做了就做了，她妹妹都说了，她还死不承认，估摸着真的是想碰瓷学长吧。”
"Her sister has already said that she had done it. Yet, she still refuses to admit it. I bet she's really trying to scam Senior."
“先说这些话的都是我们班上的同学，我也不知道她们从何得知。”
"The ones who started saying these were my classmates. I don't know how they found out either."
“减肥？你减什么肥，都这么瘦了，别减了，女孩子家家的还是要胖点才好看，那些皮包骨有什么好的，听爸爸的话，好好吃饭。”叶明担忧的劝道。

"Lose weight? What for? You're already so thin, stop losing any more weight. Girls look better when they're chubbier. What's so good about being all skin and bones? Listen to me, eat well," Ye Ming persuaded worriedly.
“凤年哥哥都不在意，二夫人您这么在意做什么？”叶漓挑眉笑着。
"If Xu Fengnian doesn't mind either, why do you mind, Madam Kong Yun?" Ye Li asked with a smile and raised brows.
“凤年送她回来的？”叶旬有些惊讶。
"Did Fengnian send her home?" Ye Xun asked in surprise.
“凤年，你也来了。”叶洛同徐凤年打了招呼。
"Fengnian, you're here too," Ye Luo greeted Xu Fengnian.
“原来如此。”身边听到她这么一说的两个女生，暗暗松了口气。
"Oh, I see." The girls who heard her, secretly heaved sighs of relief.
“原来如此，我还说什么时候发生了这种事情，我怎么不晓得呢。”大夫人说了一句，随后看向二夫人，语气冷淡，却带着几分不悦：“二夫人不了解也不怪她，只是这种事，道听途说没有证据，就不要拿上台面来说，知道的是你关心我儿子和阿漓婚事，不知道的，还以为你在针对阿漓呢，弟妹你说是不是？”

"Oh, so that's what happened. I was wondering when something like that happened and why I didn't know about it." After saying that, Mrs. Xu turned to look at Kong Yun and said coldly with displeasure, "Kong Yun, I don't blame you for being unaware about this but please don't mention this based on hearsay and talk about it without any concrete evidence. Some may know you're concerned about the marriage between my son and Ye Li but others might think that you're just making things difficult for Ye Li. Don't you think so?"
“原来是叶小姐，快请！”
"It's you, Miss Ye, please come in!"
“发生什么事了？”一道温婉的女声响起，似是有些疑惑。
"What happened?" a gentle female voice sounded, seemingly bewildered.
“另一拨人？谁？”叶洛拧了拧眉。
"Another group of people? Who?" Ye Luo raised his brows.
“只可惜是个女儿身，不然这徐家庞大的家产，她或许还有一争的资格。”
"It's a pity that she's a girl. Otherwise, she might have the right to fight for a portion of the Xu Family's massive fortune."
“只有我的注意力在她脸上吗？你们看她的眼睛，好漂亮哎，标准的狐狸眼，我去，还有泪痣，这么勾人的眼睛，以前我怎么就没发现呢？”

"Am I the only one who's paying attention to her face? Look at her eyes, they're beautiful. She has a perfect pair of fox eyes and a damned mole under the corner of her eye. They're so mesmerizing. Why haven't I noticed them before?"
“可不是嘛....”
"Exactly..."
“可不是嘛....”众人厌恶的道。
"Exactly..." Everyone agreed with disgust towards Ye Li.
“可不是嘛...”都是大家族的小姐千金，什么时候遇到这种情况，这会看着周围人投来的怪异目光，两人都觉得有些丢人，不由的就有些埋怨起了罪魁祸首的叶眉起来。

"Exactly..." They were all daughters of wealthy families and during such situations, everyone would definitely look at them peculiarly. Feeling ashamed, they couldn't help but blame the culprit Ye Mei.
“可不是嘛，以前还觉得她情商挺高会说话，现在看来，也不怎么样嘛。”
"Exactly. I used to think that she had a high EQ and was very tactful with her words but it seems that she isn't that good after all."
“可不是嘛，听说今儿个徐家大少可是要出场的,别看有些女孩子年纪不大，心思可深得很！”
"Exactly. I heard that Xu Fengnian is going to make an appearance today. Some girls may be young but they're very scheming!"
“可以啊。”叶漓大方的掏出了手机，两人互相交换了联系方式，在众人风中凌乱的表情中，女同学兴奋的离开了。
"Sure." Ye Li graciously took out her mobile phone and the two of them exchanged contacts. While everyone was looking on in shock, the girls left excitedly.
“可你也没说愿意啊，算了，我不跟你结了，我换个人不香么！叶家大小姐又不是嫁不出去！”越想越觉得自己憋屈。

"But you didn't agree either. Forget it, I'm not going to marry you, I'll just marry someone else! I'm the heiress of the Ye Family, I don't have to worry about being left on the shelf!" The more she thought about it, the more frustrated she felt.
“可闹出这样的事情，始终有影响，阿漓你还是尽快澄清才是，以免让人误会。”她开口道。
"However, this matter is going to have some effect after all. Ye Li, you'd better hurry up and clarify things, lest you make anyone get the wrong idea," she said.
“叶叔叔好。”徐凤年打了一声招呼，目光却落在了叶漓挽着他的手臂上。
"Hello, Uncle Ye," Xu Fengnian greeted before turning to look at Ye Li's hand that was on his arm.
“叶家，叶家就了不起了吗？我可不管你们是什么关系，反正今天伤害了我女儿的事情一定要给我个交代！”完全不关心娱乐圈的孟父见校长这幅模样，顿时有种自己被人抢了风头的感觉，不悦的看向叶枫道。

"The Ye Family. Is the Ye Family that big of a deal? I don't care what the relationship between you two is. You must give me an explanation for what you've done to hurt my daughter today!" Meng Fei's father exclaimed, glaring at Ye Family with displeasure. He did not pay attention to the entertainment industry at all and at this moment, he felt like his limelight was being stolen.
“叶家？那个叶家，不会是跟徐家平齐的那个叶家？”徐倩惊讶的问。
"Ye Family? You mean the Ye Family that is on par with Xu Fengnian's family?" Xu Qian asked in surprise.
“叶小姐，那我公司....”孟父着急问道。
"Miss Ye Li, my company..." Meng Fei's father asked anxiously.
“叶氏的少爷千金。”孟父深吸了一口气，提在嗓子眼的心脏终于落回了胸口，心有余悸的道。
"The children of the family that owns the Ye Corporation," Meng Fei's father let out a long sigh and answered with some relief and lingering fears.
“叶氏？那个叶氏？”孟母疑惑。
"Ye Corporation? That Ye Corporation?" Meng Fei's mother asked apprehensively/
“叶漓，你完了，你竟然敢伤人，我们会告诉老师的，你就等着被开除吧！”
"Ye Li, it's over for you. You actually had the guts to hit someone. We're going to tell the teacher about this. Be prepared to get excelled!"
“叶漓，你跟我们男神什么关系，为什么他会帮你说话？”其中一个女生阴沉的问。
"Ye Li, what is your relationship with our idol? Why did he defend you?" one of the girls questioned sternly.
“叶漓，你还有什么说的吗？”他严肃的看向叶漓问。
"Ye Li, do you have anything else to say?" he asked, looking at Ye Li sternly.
“叶眉刚刚不是说是有人请她在这里吃饭吗？怎么请的人变成叶漓了，谁来给我解释一下！”
"Didn't Ye Mei just say that someone invited her to have lunch here? Why did it become Ye Li instead? Someone, give me an explanation!"
“叶，叶小姐...”接过邀请函打开一看的侍者有点懵了。
"Miss, Miss Ye..." The waiter was a little dumbfounded when he grabbed the invitation card and opened it.
“吃个饭就是名声败坏，风气不雅了？”叶漓像是听到了天大的笑话，“难道你们没有跟别的人一起吃过饭吗？”
"I have a bad reputation and I'm indecent just because I went for lunch? Have you people never had lunch with others before?" Ye Li asked, as if she had heard the greatest joke ever.
“各位宝宝对不起，我也不知道会发生这样的情况，当时我是已经准备买这条裙子，但是店铺说有人在网上定下，以至于才没买到手，发表微博是我即将付款所以才会发的，后来因为参加聚会一事，就忘记了删，没想到会让我姐姐这么误会，我真的十分抱歉，请各位原谅，也希望我姐姐原谅....”

"My dear fans, I'm so sorry, I really didn't know that this would happen. At that time, I was really prepared to buy the gown but the sales assistant said that someone had ordered it online so I couldn't purchase it. I posted that photo when I was about to pay for the dress. Later on, I forgot to delete it because I was busy attending a gathering. I didn't expect this to cause my sister to get the wrong idea. I'm really sorry, please forgive me, everyone. I hope to seek my sister's forgiveness too..."
"I agree..."
“同上，这热度蹭的太明显好吧。”
"I agree, it's so obvious that she's using him."
“同学，你别这样，哎呀，姐姐，你快跟人家道歉呀？”叶眉一脸着急担忧的看向叶漓，那模样好似是真的很关心。
"Please don't be like this, schoolmate. Ah, Sister, hurry and apologize to her," Ye Mei said, looking at Ye Li worriedly, as if she was truly concerned.
“同样的话我不想再说第二遍。”叶漓的瞳孔中闪烁着狠厉的光。
"I don't want to repeat myself again," Ye Li said with menace in her eyes.
“同，太丑了吧，我们枫神这样的盛世美颜，怎么会有这么丑的妹妹，不会是小时候医院抱错了吧？”
"I agree , she's way too ugly. How can our dashing idol, Ye Feng, have such an ugly sister? Did they bring the wrong baby back from the hospital?"
“名声败坏？风气不雅？欲加之罪何患无辞？”叶漓笑了。
"Terrible reputation? Indecent? You've got a lot of reasons for putting the blame on me," Ye Li said with a smile.
“向阳学长想请你吃饭，就在学校门口那家鱼庄，你要不要去？”叶眉开口道。
"Senior Xiangyang wants to treat you to a meal at the fish restaurant by the entrance of the school. Do you want to go?" Ye Mei asked.
“向阳学长，阿漓可能是还在气头上，不然等我劝劝她，可能过段时间，她就不生你气了。”她关心的看向于向阳，适宜的给他台阶下。

"Senior Xiangyang, Li might still be overwhelmed with anger now. Why don't you let me try and persuade her? Maybe, she'll stop being upset with you after a while," she said, looking at Yu Xiangyang and giving him an out at the right time.
“听说你们是商业联姻是吗，恐怕都不了解吧，我和凤年认识了许多年，他的爱好性格我倒是了解一些，叶小姐要是有什么不懂的，可以尽管来找我，我一定知无不言言无不尽。”温雅带着几分挑衅。

"I heard that you two got married because of your families' businesses. You two probably don't understand each other, do you? Xu Fengnian and I have known each other for many years and I'm aware of some of the hobbies he has and what his character is like. Miss Ye, if there's anything you don't know, feel free to come look for me, I'll definitely tell you everything I know," Wen Ya said with some provocation.
“听说只有手持邀请函的人才能进去！”她喃喃自语，一抹计划顿时涌上心头。
"I heard that only those with an invitation card can enter!" she muttered as an idea popped up in her mind.
“听说咱们主任的还是有妻子的，那老师您这样的，是不是就是传说中的x三呢？”叶漓故作天真好奇的看她。
"I heard that our dean is married. Teacher, does that make you a home wrecker?" Ye Li asked, looking at her and pretending to be curious and innocent.
“听说她昨儿个逃了一天的课，把导师气死了，现在都还在下面的宣传栏上贴着，被扣了好几分呢。”

"I heard that she incurred the wrath of the teacher for skipping the entire day of lessons yesterday and there's even a statement of this matter on the notice board outside. She got a few demerit points."
“听说就是那个大明星在这里包场请人吃饭，不会就是她吧！”
"I heard that that celebrity booked this restaurant to treat someone to a meal. Is she the one!?!"
“听说那是徐家二小姐，徐媛，咱们帝都第一千金！刚从国外留学回来呢，不愧是第一名媛，长得可真是漂亮！不知道以后会便宜了那个人家。”

"I heard that she's Xu Yuan, the daughter of the Xu Family and the top heiress of the capital! She's just returned from studying abroad. She's really worthy of being the top socialite. She's so beautiful! I wonder which man would be lucky enough to marry her."
“呜呜呜，我不相信，我不信，叶漓怎么配得上我们的枫神大人！”
"Ahh, I don't believe it, I don't believe it. How is Ye Li worthy of Lord Ye Feng!?!"
“呵~”叶漓轻笑了一声，仿佛并没有将她的侮辱放在眼里，“既然你想知道，那我就让他来亲自告诉你，到底是为什么，为什么我这样的人都能跟他吃饭，而你们却连他的衣角也摸不着...”

"Ah~" Ye Li chuckled, as if she did not take her insult seriously. "Since you want to know, let him tell you himself just why he's willing to eat with a person like me while you can't even touch a corner of his shirt..."
“呵~”叶漓闻言，嗤笑了一声：“你作为我的妹妹，竟然不相信我，反倒是和外人合伙来逼我道歉，承担所有的责任，这知道的，以为你是在关心我，不知道的，恐还以为你和她们是一伙的，我就奇怪了，你也没亲眼看见啊，怎么就笃定了这事是我的错呢？你不是一向最关心我，一直站在我的身边的吗？怎么这会儿，却帮着外人来陷害我？”她疑惑又怀疑的看向叶眉，“还是说，人家给你钱了，你这么帮她？”

Upon hearing her words, Ye Li sneered, "Ah, you're my younger sister and yet, you don't believe me at all.Instead, you gang up with others to force me to apologize and take full responsibility. Those who know what happened will think that you're showing me concern but those who don't might just think that you're in cahoots with them. I find it really strange. You did not see that happen with your own eyes, how are you so sure that it's my fault? Haven't you always been the most concerned about me? Haven't you always stood on my side? Why are you now ganging up with others to frame me?" Looking at Ye Mei apprehensively in confusion, she asked, "Or are you helping her because she paid you?"
“呵呵，咱们不说工作上的事了，凤年，你要跳舞吗？还记得当年学校举办舞会的时候，都是我当你的女伴，好久没一起跳舞了，我还有些怀恋，我可不可以邀请你再跳一场？”温雅开口邀请。

"Haha, let's stop talking about work. Xu Fengnian, do you want to dance? Remember when I used to be your dance partner at the school dances? It's been long since we danced together and I still miss those days. May I invite you to dance with me?" Wen Ya asked.
“呵呵，我以前以为眉宝是微博最干净耿直的女孩，现在才知道，原来都是装出来的，看她那副态度，和微博上简直天差地别，我吐了！”

"Hah, I thought that Ye Mei is the purest and most honest girl on Twitter. I finally know now that it's all just an act. Look at her attitude. It's worlds apart from the way she interacts on Twitter. Gross!"
“呵，你这是威.胁老师是吗？我倒是要看看你有多大的能耐，竟然敢威.胁老师！”程艳伸手推了她一把，叶漓倒退了两步。
"Hah, are you threatening your teacher? I shall see how capable you are. How dare you threaten your teacher!?!" Cheng Yan reached out and pushed Ye Li, causing her to take two steps back.
“呵，你这话说的可真搞笑，他作为国民偶像，喜欢的人多了，我只是其中一个而已，怎么到了你嘴里，好像是我要非他不嫁的样子。”叶漓扯了扯嘴角，目光突然落到了叶眉身后的方向，笑，“你这样说的话，你跟他在学校里还有着金童玉女之称呢，要成全也是成全你吧？”

"Ah, that's such a joke. As the nation's idol, there are plenty of people who adore him and I'm just one of them. Why are you making it sound like he's the one I must marry?" Ye Li smirked and suddenly turned to look at the spot behind Ye Mei before continuing, "Well, if you want to put it this way, you and him are nicknamed the 'it couple' in school. We should be giving you and him our blessings, shouldn't we?"
“呵，这就把你吓到了？”叶漓上前，拍了拍女同学僵硬的肩膀，笑的和善极了：“我吓吓你而已，都是一个学校的同学，我怎么也不会做的这么过分，我也明白做粉丝的想维护偶像的心情，我也是学长的粉丝，怎么能不懂你的感觉呢，只是我们同为他的粉丝，何必自相残杀，我知道，可能刚刚是因为我妹妹的话，才会让你误以为真，发生了这样的事，我能理解。”

"Hah, did that frighten you already?" Ye Li stepped forward to smack the stiffened shoulders of the girl. Smiling kindly, she said, "I was just scaring you. We're still schoolmates from the same school, I won't go so overboard. I understand that you're just a fan who wants to defend your idol. As a fan of Senior, how can I not understand how you feel? However, since we're both fans of the same idol, we shouldn't turn against each other. I know that you only got mistaken because of my sister's words."
“咦？她身后那个女生是谁啊？”看到叶眉身后又走下一个穿着校服的女孩，她扎着高马尾，朝气蓬勃，脸看起来十分圆润，在一双星眸的映衬之下，十分可爱，她素颜朝天，可肤若凝脂，白里透红，像极了垂涎欲滴的红苹果，原本精心打扮的叶眉，相比对之下，突然给人的感觉就能没那么自然了。

"Huh? Who's that girl behind her?" They saw another girl behind Ye Mei who was wearing a school uniform and had her hair up in a high ponytail, which was voluminous and stylish. Her face was round and she looked extremely adorable without makeup. Her skin was fair and slightly rosy, like delicious apples. In comparison, Ye Mei, who had exquisitely dolled herself up, seemed rather unnatural.
“咱们学校什么时候有这么纯天然的女孩了，为什么我都不知道？”其他人也纷纷朝着叶漓投去惊讶的目光。
"Since when have we ever had such a pure and natural schoolmate?" Everyone else was looking at Ye Li in shock.
“哇，没想到我竟然能见到叶家的小姐，真是太激动了！”徐倩激动的跳了起来，对叶眉的态度更熟络了。
"Wow, I didn't expect to see the daughter of the Ye Family. I'm so thrilled!" Xu Qian began jumping in excitement and became friendlier to Ye Mei.
“哈哈，还温柔女神呢？我是怎么都看不出来她哪里温柔了，高傲的感觉更多吧。”
"Haha, she's known as a gentle goddess, huh? How is she gentle at all? She seems more arrogant than gentle."
“哎呀，爸爸您放心啦，我不会因为减肥而不好好吃饭，伤害自己的身体的。”她只得撒娇道。
"Ah, Father, don't worry, I won't skip meals and end up harming my health just because I want to lose weight," she said coquettishly.
“哎哎哎，别，我马上去！”徐倩着急的拿着礼服一溜烟跑了，生怕他后悔似的。
"Hey, hey, don't, I'll go right now!" Xu Qian anxiously scurried away with some gowns, for fear that he would go back on his word.
“哎，哥哥，你看，这不是姐姐吗，她来了哎！”看到几个帅哥之后，她的目光就被见过的叶眉吸引了去，有些激动的掐着自家哥哥是手臂。
"Hey, Xu Han, isn't that Ye Mei? She's here!" After looking at the few handsome men, her gaze was attracted by Ye Mei and she pinched her brother's arm excitedly.
“哎，好孩子，你可算来我家了，阿姨都惦记死你了。”
"Hey, good girl, you've finally come to visit me. I missed you so much."
“哎？你认识我哥？那你能不能把那条裙子让给我？”女孩天真的问。
"Huh? Do you know my brother? In this case, can you let me have that gown?" the girl asked innocently.
“哥哥，你的粉丝怎么都这么凶呢？我好讨厌哦。”下一秒，刚刚还冷漠的女孩，突然像是变了个人一般，苦恼的说。

"Ye Feng, my dear brother, why are all your fans so ferocious? I hate them so much." At the next second, the indifferent Ye Li seemed to have suddenly become a different person as she complained in frustration.
“哥哥，我不怪你，要怪就怪我瞎了眼吧，不过没关系，我已经看清楚了他的真面目了，我以后再也不会喜欢他。”叶漓摇了摇头，看着三哥自责，她也无比心疼。

"Brother, I don't blame you. I can only blame myself for being blind, but it doesn't matter, I've already seen his true colors clearly. I won't fancy him anymore from now on." Ye Li shook her head, looking at her Third Brother who was ridden with remorse, feeling extremely heartbroken.
“哥！”叶漓闻声回头，见三个哥哥站在身后，顿时惊喜的站了起来，“你们回来了。”
Hearing their voice, Ye Li looked up to see that her brothers were right behind her. She immediately stood up in surprise and joy. "You guys are back."
“哥！我也要那条裙子！”长相娇俏的女孩子看到这款限定竟然被人要了，那人还是跟自己差不多同龄的女生，顿时忍不住了。

"I want that gown too!" a delicate-looking girl exclaimed at her brother, unable to contain herself when she saw that another girl about the same age as herself had set her sights on the limited edition gown.
“哥，你真是不懂女孩子心思，我和雅雅姐都是第一次出社会工作，什么都不懂，你公司又那么严厉，所以才会要你帮帮忙啊，阿漓，你快给我哥哥说说。”徐媛一脸无奈的说。

"Xu Fengnian, you really don't understand a girl's intentions. Wen Ya and I are just about to join the workforce and we're clueless. Your company is so strict too. That's why we asked for your help. Ye Li, quickly tell him to help," Xu Yuan said helplessly.
“哥，阿漓跟我吃饭呢？”
"Brother, Ye Li is having lunch with me."
“哦好，你先把手机还给我。”叶漓正给徐凤年发消息让他带自己吃饭，没想到会被徐晗抢走，有些不开心的说。
"Alright, return my mobile phone to me," Ye Li said unhappily. She was sending a text to Xu Fengnian to tell him to take her to dinner but to her surprise, Xu Han snatched it away from him.
“哦，这样吗？”叶漓并没有因为王丽的嘲笑和众人的嘲讽而生气，反倒是漠然的丢了一个字，随后掏出手机，拨打了叶枫的电话，“哥哥，我到楼下了，下来接我。”

"Oh, is that so?" Ye Li did not get angry because of the mockery of Wang Li and the others. Instead, she replied indifferently before taking out her mobile phone to call Ye Feng. "Ye Feng, I'm here. Come down and bring me upstairs."
“哦？”叶漓冷笑一声：“我倒是要看看你们怎么不客气？想要动手打我？单挑还是一起上？”
"Oh?" Ye Li sneered and continued, "I'd like to see how you do that? Are you going to beat me up? One-on-one? Or is it going to be me against all of you?"
“哦？一个八竿子打不着一点关系的粉丝？你有什么资格？你们偶像知道你背地里这样自作主张了吗？”叶漓嗤笑一声，看她的眼神仿佛在看一个笑话：“还是说，于向阳本人不敢站出来说话，需要你这个小小的粉丝来找我为他洗白开脱？啧，这么听话吗？”

"Oh? A fan who's completely unrelated to him? What right do you have? Does your idol know that you're acting presumptuously like this behind his back?" Ye Li sneered, as if she was looking at a joke. "Or is it that Yu Xiangyang is too timid to stand up for himself so he needs a fan like you to confront me and clear his name? Tsk, are you that obedient?"
“哦？你说的是那个什么明星？”二夫人挑了挑眉。
"Oh, is that so? Which celebrity are you talking about?" Kong Yun asked with raised brows.
“哦？她的邀请函名字是不是也叫做叶漓？”叶漓似笑非笑的搜了一眼脸色逐渐变白的叶眉一眼，问。
"Oh, is that so? Is the name on her invitation card 'Ye Li' too?" Ye Li asked with a fake smile as she glanced at Ye Mei whose face was gradually turning pale.
“哦？所以你也承认这不过就是谣言，而你仅仅因为听别人道听途说，就来找我麻烦了？”叶漓邪气一笑：“警察叔叔抓人都还要证据呢，你这证据都拿不出来，就开始逼我道歉，还放话威胁，这应该已经构成犯罪了吧，咱们要不要去警察叔叔那里谈谈，看看这件事如何解决，毕竟....”

"Oh? So you admit that it's just a rumor too and that you've come to make trouble for me just because of something you found out based on hearsay?" Ye Li laughed sinisterly and continued, "Even the police needs evidence to arrest someone. You started forcing me to apologize without having any evidence. That alone should have constituted a crime, right? Why don't we settle this at the police station? After all..."
“哦？没关系？”叶漓一笑。
"Oh? There's nothing between you two?" Ye Li smiled.
“哦？那好吧。”这次叶漓没有生气，反倒是笑着附和了一声。
"Oh? Okay then." Ye Li was not enraged this time. Instead, she smiled and agreed.
“哪里撑不住了，明明很好看啊，姐，真的很好看，你不信问大家，你的身材穿着刚刚好，我有点胖了，而且也矮，肯定穿着没你好看，我就不和你抢啦。”徐倩却天真的以为叶眉是客气，连连摇头。

"I don't think so. You clearly look good, you really do. If you don't believe me, you can ask everyone else. Your figure is perfect for this. I'm a little chubby and I'm short too. It definitely won't look as nice on me as it does on you. I won't vie with you for it," Xu Qian said, shaking her head profusely and innocently thinking that Ye Mei was just being polite.
“哼，你不说，我自己去问。”
"Hmph, if you don't want to tell me, I'll ask her myself."
“唔，你也可以这样以为。”叶漓诚实的点了点头。
"Yeah, you can think so too." Ye Li nodded honestly.
"Ahhh!"
“啊啊啊，叶漓，你真的是枫神的妹妹吗？可不可以帮我们要一张签名啊？”
"Ahh, Ye Li, are you really Ye Feng's sister? Can you help us get an autograph from him?"
“啊！好不甘心！”桌上的各种名贵首饰被她一把推在了地上。
"Ah! I can't stand this!" She swept all the expensive jewelry and accessories onto the ground.
“啊？”叶漓愣住。
"Huh?" Ye Li was stunned.
"Hello?"
“嗯。”叶漓诚实的点了点头。
"Yes." Ye Li nodded honestly.
“嗯嗯。”叶漓闻言，顿时就委屈了：“她们好过分，两个打我一个，要不是我力气大，今天就惨了。”

"Yes, yes." Hearing his words, Ye Li immediately felt aggrieved again. "They went overboard. The two of them ganged up together to hit me. If I wasn't strong enough, I would have been beaten up into a pulp today."
“嗯，咱们下去吧，或许等会儿，还有好戏可看。”二夫人若有所思的笑道。
"Yes, let's go downstairs. Maybe, there'll be a good show later," Kong Yun said with a smile, seemingly deep in thought.
“嗯？”叶漓疑惑的回头看他。
"Yes?" Ye Li looked back at him in confusion.
“嗯？你也要走了吗？”叶漓没有注意他的表情，继续打字。
"HuH? You're leaving too?" Ye Li continued to type on her mobile phone, not noticing his expression.
“嘶~”叶漓看着捂着手痛的面目狰狞，眼泪鼻涕直流的女孩，邪恶的嘶了一声，“看着都疼，你说你怎么就这么想不开呢？打哪里不好，非要打在我笔尖上？”明明是一副惋惜的语气，可脸上的幸灾乐祸却看得周围的人一阵脊背发凉。

Looking at the girl who was pressing her hand with a hideous expression on her face while tearing up uncontrollably, Ye Li seethed sinisterly and said, "That looks really painful. What were you thinking? Of all places, why did you have to slap the tip of my pen?" Although she seemed to be comforting her, she had a gloating expression that sent a cold chill down the spines of everyone else around her.
“嘿嘿。”叶漓不好意思的吐了吐舌头。
"Hehe." Ye Li stuck her tongue out embarrassedly.
“处理干净！”徐凤年阴沉着脸丢下一句，将西装外套脱下盖在怀中女孩头上，抱着人大步离开了这个地方。
"Clean it up!" Xu Fengnian ordered with an austere expression, after which he removed his blazer and covered her head with it. He then picked her up in his arms and left.
“大哥二哥三哥，你们不用担心，我没事。”叶漓瓮声瓮气的道。
"Big Brother, Second Brother, Third Brother, don't worry, I'm alright," Ye Li said in a hoarse voice.
“大哥二哥三哥，我知道了，我不会再这样了，这一次要不是因为同学们嘲笑我，我也不会想不开...”叶漓低着头擦了擦眼角的湿润，伤心的说。

"Big Brother, Second Brother, Third Brother, I know, I won't do this again. If my classmates hadn't mocked me this time, I wouldn't have let my emotions rule over my head..." Ye Li said miserably as she hung her head low and rubbed the tears at the corner of her eyes.
“大哥，我...”徐媛脸色很是难看。
"Xu Fengnian, I..." Xu Yuan's expression was extremely sullen.
“大小姐和叶眉小姐关系那么好，你当然不会欺负她的。”司机肯定的说。
"Missy and Miss Ye Mei are on such good terms with each other. Missy, of course you wouldn't bully her," the chauffeur said firmly.
“大小姐没有受伤，我们当时赶过去的时候，地方已经被另一拨人收拾干净了。”
"Missy wasn't hurt, when we rushed over then, the place was already cleaned up by another group of people."
“天哪，是我看错了吗？枫神竟然邀请叶漓吃饭，他们什么关系啊？”
"Oh my god, are my eyes playing tricks on me then? Ye Feng actually invited Ye Li to lunch. How are they related to each other?"
“天哪，黑卡，眉儿你竟然有黑卡，你家里人的对你也太好了吧！你还才大学，就给你那么多钱！”两个女生惊羡道。

"Oh my god, black card, Ye Mei, you actually have a black card. Your family is so nice to you! You're only in college but they're already giving you so much money!" the two girls said enviously in surprise.
“她的粉丝还就跟一群疯狗似的，跑到小凤漓微博乱骂，口口声声说是小凤漓抢了她裙子，笑死我了...”
"Yet, her fans started lashing out at Ye Li on Twitter like a bunch of mad dogs, accusing Ye Li for snatching her gown. Haha, this is so funny..."
“她说是你就确定是了？”徐晗不悦的瞪了她一眼。
"Do you believe her just because she said so?" Xu Han glared at her in displeasure.
"Okay..."
“好了吧？那我们走吧。”叶眉伸手就要接过卡离开。
"Has the payment been completed? Let's go then,"Ye Mei said as she reached out to grab the card in a bid to leave.
“好可爱啊，你看她那双眼睛，也太漂亮了吧，我隔这么远都能看到浓密的睫毛，自带眼线哎，还有一颗泪痣，妈耶，微胖中的极品！”

"She's so adorable. Look at her eyes, they're so beautiful. I can see her luscious and voluminous eyelashes. She has natural eyeliner and a mole under the corner of her eye. Oh my, she's a gem among chubby girls!"
“好啊。”叶漓想也没想就答应了下来。
"Sure," Ye Li answered without hesitation.
“好好好！既然这样，那就再好不过了，你徐姨之前昨儿个才给我打电话问这件事，还让你有时间过去玩，我还想着怕你不愿意去，现在好了。”叶父笑道。

"Great, great! Since that's the case, it's even better, Mrs. Xu called me just yesterday to ask about this matter, and asked you to go over to play sometime. I was afraid that you'd be unwilling to go over. It's all good now," Ye Ming said smilingly.
“好好好，你们两个一人一条好吧？快去选吧。”叶眉一脸无奈的说，可眉眼中却带着几分优越。
"Okay, okay, the both of you will get one each, alright? Quick, go and pick out your gowns," Ye Mei said with a helpless expression. However, her sense of superiority was revealed in her eyes.
“好孩子，快过来给阿姨看看。”徐夫人招了招手。
"Hurry and let me take a look at you," Mrs. Xu said, waving her hand at her.
“好帅好帅，简直就是漫画里面走出来的，比电视里的帅多了，我好爱啊啊啊（尖叫）！”
"He's so handsome and dashing. He looks just like a manga character, he looks so much better in person. I love him so much!" The fan started screaming.
“好的小姐，我马上帮你取下来。”
"Sure, Miss, I'll take it down for you right away."
“好酸呀。”她吃完，还嫌弃的丢了一句。
"It's so sour," she said in disgust after eating the fruit.
“妈妈呀，不是吧，我的青春结束了吗？”
"Mommy, is my youth over just like that?"
“妈，可你什么时候才能怀上啊！”闻言，叶眉有些埋怨。
"But Mother, when will you be able to conceive a baby boy!?!" Ye Mei complained a little when she heard her words.
“妈，我姐不会有事吧？”叶眉担忧的问道。
"Mother, my sister will be fine, right?" Ye Mei asked worriedly.
“姐你要上班了啊？真羡慕呀。”徐倩闻言，顿时一脸羡慕。
"Xu Yuan, you're joining the work force? I'm so envious of you," Xu Qian said, green with envy after hearing her words.
“姐姐怎么样了，还好吗？她是不是又闹了，我跟她关系最好，要不要我去劝劝她？”叶眉又关心的问。
"How is Sister? Is she alright? Is she making a scene and throwing a tantrum again? I'm the closes to her. Should I go and talk some sense into her?" Ye Mei asked with concern.
“姐姐，你怎么能这样说，我知道哥哥们在这里，你怕他们怪罪，但是我相信，只要你好好求求他们，他们肯定会愿意成全你的。”叶眉不认同的看向叶漓，一副恨铁不成钢的眼神。

"Sister, how can you say that? I know that you're afraid that my brothers will hold it against you but I believe that as long as you plead with them, they'll definitely be willing to fulfill your wishes," Ye Mei said, looking at Ye Li with disapproval, as if she expected better from her.
“姐姐，我也好想去跳舞。”不知道什么时候跟在他们身后的叶眉突然开口。
"Ye Li, I want to go dance too," said Ye Mei who suddenly appeared out of nowhere behind them.
“姐，你什么时候回家的啊，怎么都不叫我。”徐倩小声道。
"Xu Yuan, when did you come home? Why didn't you inform me?" Xu Qian asked softly.
“姐，你，你不是喜欢向阳学长么？大家都知道，你别怕呀，我相信凤年哥哥和哥哥们都理解会成全你的。”叶眉先是愣了一下，随后鼓励的看她。

"Sister, don't you really like Senior Xiangyang? Everyone knows, don't be afraid, I believe Brother Fengnian and Brothers will all understand your plight and give in to you," Ye Mei said, looking at her encouragingly after being stunned for a while.
“姐，妈让我今天去参加一个聚会，我没有钱买新的晚礼服，你能不能借我一点？”她一脸可怜的说。
"Ye Li, Mother wants me to attend a social gathering tonight and I don't have enough money to buy a new evening gown. Could you lend me some?" she asked with a pitiful expression.
“姐，姐姐我没有....”叶眉一副摇摇欲坠的姿态。
"Sister, Sister, I didn't..." Ye Mei said, swaying unsteadily like she was about to collapse.
“孟先生，你别这样说，这件事好商量。”见叶枫脸色阴沉，校长哆哆嗦嗦的插了一句，试图用眼神提醒对方。

"Mr. Meng, don't say that. Let's discuss this." Seeing the sullen expression on Ye Feng's face, the principal interjected in a shaky voice and tried to give Meng Fei's father a reminder by shooting him a glance.
“孟氏集团是吧？”叶枫脸上带着一抹笑，笑容却很冷。
"Meng Group eh?" Ye Feng smiled coldly.
“害，我确实不懂。”司机大叔憨憨的抓了抓头发，“不过大小姐这样看起来真的好看。”
"I really don't," the chauffeur said, scratching his head foolishly. He continued, "But Missy really looks good now."
“对不起枫神的妹妹....”
"Sorry Ye Li..."
“对不起，我们不知道你是枫神的妹妹，请你原谅我们。”
"I'm sorry, I didn't know that you're Ye Feng's younger sister, please forgive us."
“对了凤年哥哥的公司现在还招模特吗？我和媛媛一起回国，这会儿都没找到工作呢，咱们都认识这么多年了，凤年你不帮帮忙？”

"By the way, Xu Fengnian, is your company still recruiting models? I returned to the nation together with Xu Yuan and I haven't found a job yet. We've already known each other for years. Xu Fengnian, why don't you help me out?"
“对了，这是我姐姐，你们小时候关系挺好的，二小姐应该也没忘了她吧？”叶眉指着叶漓介绍。
"By the way, this is my sister, you guys were quite close when we were children. Miss Xu Yuan, you still remember her, right?" Ye Mei asked, pointing at Ye Li.
“对啊阿漓，有什么不开心的就说出来，大家好解决，你不要什么都藏在心里不说，自己一个人承受好吗？”
"Yeah, Li, if you're upset about anything, just tell us so that we can settle it. Don't bottle up your feelings and suffer in silence by yourself, okay?"
“对啊，二小姐你在国外不知道，枫神是这些年大火的人，长得可帅了，你要是看了肯定也会喜欢的。”见她问起，其他人顿时疯狂朝着徐媛安利。

"Yeah, Miss Xu Yuan, you were abroad so you don't know how famous Ye Feng is in the recent years. He's really handsome and you'll definitely like him after you see him." Seeing that she had asked, everyone immediately introduced Ye Feng to her.
“对啊，我差点就以为是真的了，只是好奇怪，为什么叶眉学妹一直那样说呢，害的我以为真有女的这么傻，表白被拒就自杀的，太狗血了有木有。”

"Yeah, I almost thought it was true. I was just confused about why Junior Ye Mei kept saying that. She made me think that there are really such foolish girls who would attempt suicide because they had been rejected after confessing. That's too cliché."
“对啊，而且咱们班级，就她最胖，没错了。”
"Yeah, besides, she's the chubbiest girl in class. It must be her."
“对对对，赶紧发问问到底是谁。”几人匆忙转身离开，连其他人也没心思再拍了。
"Yeah, hurry and ask around, find out who she is." The few of them frantically turned around to leave. Even the rest were no longer in the mood to continue taking photos.
“对，听说她纠缠人家，两人还闹出了不小的绯闻，就是不知道，大伯母一家还有爷爷他们知不知道这件事。”徐媛若有所思。
"Yes, I heard that she pestered him and the two of them had even gotten involved in a scandal. I wonder if Aunt, Grandpa and the others know about this," Xu Yuan said, deep in thought.
“对，她之前就对我们学校的向阳学长纠缠不清，现在还和大名鼎鼎的枫神闹出绯闻，简直无耻至极，校长你一定要开除她！”孟非站出来附和道。

"Yeah, previously, she was involved with our senior, Xiangyang, and now she's involved in a scandal with the famous Ye Feng. She's really shameless. Principal, you must expel her!" Meng Fei chimed in.
“对，若不是叶小姐的几位哥哥过来，叶小姐肯定会受委屈。”
"Yes, if not for the fact that Miss Ye Li's brothers had come over, Miss Ye Li would definitely have been mistreated."
“对，都是因为叶漓，她为什么这么讨厌，我恨死她了！”在母亲面前，叶眉丝毫不掩饰自己对叶漓的嫉妒和恨意。
"Yeah, it's all Ye Li's fault. Why is she so annoying? I hate her so much!" Ye Mei did not hide her jealousy and hatred for Ye Li in the slightest, in front of her mother.
“导师好。”叶眉乖巧的打了一声招呼，刚刚难看的脸色已经消失不见，如今的她看起来格外的乖巧。
"Hello, Teacher," Ye Mei greeted obediently. The look of displeasure on her face had long disappeared and she now looked extremely well-behaved.
“小妹，以后万不可再做这样的傻事了知道吗？哥哥们知道你喜欢于向阳，以后再也不会逼你嫁给徐凤年了。”另一个长相十分斯文，看起来书生气息颇浓的男人无奈又心疼的劝道。

"Little sister, don't ever do such a foolish thing, alright? We, your brothers, know that you fancy Yu Xiangyang and we'll never force you to marry Xu Fengnian again," said another scholarly-looking man who seemed mild-mannered. He felt helpless and took pity on his younger sister.
“小姐，您这张卡是空卡。”
"Miss, this is a blank card."
“小胖！”
"Little Fatty!"
“小雪，你没事吧！”另一个女生也没想到叶漓反应这么快，顿时变了脸，死死的看着她：“竟然敢还手，我看你想死。”

"Xiaoxue, are you alright!?!" The other girl did not expect Ye Li to react so quickly either. Her expression changed and she glowered at Ye Li. "How dare you retaliate? I think you have a death wish."
“就你？”叶枫闻言，嗤笑了一声，眉眼很是不屑。
"You?" Upon hearing that, Ye Feng sneered with disdain in his eyes.
“就她这样的，竟然还有脸惦记咱们的男神，也不撒泼尿照照自己。”
"With that face of hers, she actually has the cheek to harbor designs on our idol. Why don't she take a look at herself in the mirror?"
“就是...还勾引咱们系草帮她说话，我真是是气死了。”
"Exactly... She even seduced the beau of our faculty to speak up for her. I'm seriously infuriated."
“就是你欺负我女儿的！”孟非的父亲怒目而视。
"So you're the one who bullied my daughter!" Meng Fei's father glared angrily.
“就是啊，人家都进去了，还说这种话，不就是不想让人家来参加这个聚会吗？”
"Exactly, she's already entered and she's still saying such nasty words. She just doesn't want her sister to join the gathering."
“就是就是，你故意放丑图是不是有点过分了？欺负枫神妹妹，我们枫叶可不依。”
"Exactly, aren't you being too much by deliberately posting an ugly photo of her? We, the fans of Ye Feng, will not allow you to bully Ye Feng's younger sister."
“就是！而且只有我注意到了她穿的裙子是和我们眉宝同款夏夜之星？我可是打听过的，这条裙子是限量款，整个ys就这么一条，她蹭完了枫神的热度，又来蹭咱们眉宝的热度？？吐了。”

"Exactly! Am I the only one who noticed that she's wearing the Stars of the Summer Night gown that Ye Mei has worn? I've asked around before and I found out that this gown is a limited edition design. It's the one and only piece produced by the fashion label, YS. Now that she's done using Ye Feng for fame, she's using Ye Mei? Disgusting. I barfed."
“就是，也不知道你是用了什么不要脸的方法，才会让枫神跟你吃饭，手段可真是厉害啊！”孟非也是十分认同的道。
"Exactly. Who knows what shameless method you used to make Ye Feng have lunch with you? You're really impressive, huh!?!" Meng Fei agreed completely.
“就是，二小姐可不是谁都可以搭话的人，你别给脸不要脸。”
"Exactly, Miss Xu Yuan rarely talks to anyone. Don't go overboard."
“就是，刚刚眉儿叫你你不来，这会儿后悔了吧！”一旁的王丽不屑的道。
"Yeah, you rejected Ye Mei when she asked you to come along just now. You regret it now, don't you!?!" Wang Li said in disdain.
“就是，我还以为是什么人缠上了我们枫神呢，也长得不怎么样嘛！”其他人打量着叶漓，口上这么说，眼里却带着几分嫉妒。
"Exactly, I was wondering who started pestering our idol Ye Feng. It turns out she's just a plain Jane!" The rest sized up Ye Feng with jealous gazes.
“就是，枫神妹妹了不起啊，就可以这么挑衅我们粉丝了吗？”
"Yeah, so what if she's Ye Feng's sister? Does that mean that she can provoke and taunt us, his fans?"
“就是，楼楼上别太过分了，那毕竟是枫神的妹妹，咱们误会了就该道歉，不应该一味的怪罪她没告诉咱们她和枫神的关系，毕竟这也是人家的私事不是吗？”

"Yeah, to the comment above, don't go overboard. After all, she's Ye Feng's younger sister and since we've misunderstood her, we should be apologizing instead of blaming her for not telling us about her relationship with Ye Feng. After all, that's a private matter, isn't it?"
“就是，男神的身份本就敏感，要是这事被传出去，大家肯定会说是他逼得叶漓自杀，那咱们男神的前途可不就毁了吗？”
"Exactly, our idol's identity is sensitive in the first place. If this gets out, people will definitely say that he forced Ye Li to commit suicide. His future will then be ruined!"
“就算你得到了家里人的无限宠爱又如何，还不是只是个样样不通的废物？”
"So what if everyone in the family loves and dotes on you endlessly? You're just a piece of garbage who's not good at anything."
“就这么太便宜她了，校长，行迹这么恶劣的学生，我觉得还是要施以退学的惩罚才对，不然太影响你们学校的名声了，留着她也是个祸害！”孟母一脸阴冷的说。

"That's too easy of a solution. Principal, I think it's better to punish such a notorious student by expelling her. Otherwise, it'll affect the reputation of your school and she's just going to be troublemaker!" Meng Fei's mother said with a wicked expression.
“已经有人定下了这条礼服，所以抱歉。”经理无奈的道：“您还是看看其他的款式吧。”
"Someone has already ordered this gown, so sorry." The manager helplessly said, "You'd better look at other designs."
“帝都大学啊？”徐媛闻言，眉眼闪了闪，笑着看向了叶漓，说道：“我记得不错的话，帝都大学最大的股东就是叶叔叔吧，阿漓，你要不然帮小倩和叔叔说一下，让她好进去，我听说进帝都大学的要求挺高的，但是你要是帮忙说一下的话，肯定不是问题。”

"Beijing University?" Upon hearing her words, Xu Yuan's eyes glistened and she looked at Ye Li smilingly. "If I remember correctly, Uncle Ye Ming is the biggest shareholder of Beijing University, right? Ye Li, why don't you speak to Uncle Yeming on Xu Qian's behalf and help her get admitted smoothly? I heard that the requirements for Beijing University are very strict. It won't be a problem for her to get in if you put in a good word for her."
“年哥没走？在我们家？”叶枫也是一脸惊奇。
"Brother Nian hasn't left yet? He's still in our home?" Ye Feng asked in amazement.
“应该没事吧，我没怎么下重手。”叶漓以为他问的是那两个女生，有些不太确定的回答。
"They should be fine, I didn't go hard on them," Ye Li answered with some uncertainty, thinking that he was probably asking about the two girls.
“废话，我当然想知道！不过你这样的人肯定是用了什么恶心的办法，不然枫神那样的大人物怎么会愿意跟你吃饭？”孟非一脸嫌恶的说。
"Duh, of course I do! However, you must have used some disgusting method. Otherwise, why would a famous figure like Ye Feng want to have a meal with you?" Meng Fei said with a look of disgust.
“当姐姐的就不能让着妹妹一点吗？为什么什么都要跟妹妹抢？”
"Can't you give in to your younger sister? Why do you have to vie with her for everything?"
“当然。”叶漓也朝她露出了一抹笑容。
"Of course," Ye Li said with a smile as well.
“当然不会，你不愿意？错过了我你上哪里找比我更好的女孩！”叶漓扁着嘴委屈的说。
"Of course not, are you not willing? If you miss out on me, where can you find another girl who's better than me!?!" Ye Li said aggrievedly, pursing her lips.
“当然了，不信你问她。”叶枫将扩音打开，随后得意洋洋的将手机放到了自家妹妹耳边。
"Of course, ask her yourself if you don't believe me." Ye Feng turned the speakers on and then proudly put the mobile phone to his sister's ear.
“当然啦，三哥哥你的应援会，怎么能少了我？”叶漓笑道。
"Of course, Ye Feng, how can I not be there for you at your fan meet?" Ye Li said with a smile.
“当然啦，我们这么多年的好姐妹了，送你一条礼服也没什么。”叶眉笑着点头。
"Of course, we've been bosom friends for so many years. It's not a big deal to give you a gown as a present," Ye Mei said smilingly with a nod.
“当然有，校长你要是看了监控，还想开除我的话，我无话可说，但是你没看过监控就对我施以惩罚，那这个惩罚我怎么可能接受，若是你不能给我个满意的结果，我也不介意把这件事闹到警察局，学校给不了我公道，我不信警察还给不了！”叶漓不屑的扫了脸色难看的孟非一家一眼，平淡的道。

"Of course I do. Principal, if you still want to expel me after watching the surveillance camera footage, I'll have nothing to say. However, if you expel me without doing so, how can I accept it? If you can't give me a satisfiable answer, I won't mind taking this to the police station. The school can't do me justice but I believe the police can!" Ye Li said calmly as she looked at Meng Fei and her parents with disdain.
“当然，你看我女儿的手，被你妹妹伤成了这样，惩罚我们也说了，你们要是接受，这事就这么了了，不接受，那就别怪我们孟家不客气！”孟母冷哼道。

"Of course, look at my daughter's hand. She got hurt by your sister and we've already stated the punishment that we want her to be subjected to. If you accept it, we shall settle it like this. If not, don't blame us for being harsh!" Meng Fei's mother hollered.
“当然，我还会骗你不成，我们一起去吧。”叶眉真诚的道。
"Of course, why would I lie to you? Let's go," Ye Mei answered sincerely.
“很有可能，我听说学校的著名人物相处的都不错，是她没错了。”
"That's very likely. I heard that the famous figures of schools usually get along well with each other. It should be her."
“徐凤年？”叶洛闻言愣了愣。
"Xu Fengnian?" Ye Luo asked, stunned to hear those words.
“徐晗你干什么？”程艳抬头，见是徐晗站了起来，蹙了蹙眉。
"Xu Han, what are you doing?" Cheng Yan looked up and frowned when she saw that it was Xu Han who had stood up.
“徐晗哎，他终于来学校了！”
"It's Xu Han, he's finally in school!"
“徐阿姨。”叶洛几人也开了口。
"Mrs. Xu." Ye Luo and the rest said greeted her as well.
“徐阿姨。”叶漓看到她，眼眶也有些发热。
"Mrs. Xu," Ye Li answered, her eyes turning warm and teary when she saw her.
“心疼宝宝，被自家亲姐姐这么针对。”
"Poor Ye Mei. She's getting bullied by her biological sister."
“快报警，学长， 快帮我们报警!”另一个女孩见到叶漓这般表情，突然就兴奋的大喊了起来，可这话刚说出来，她的表情突然僵硬。

"Quickly call the police, Senior, quickly help us call the police!" Another girl suddenly shouted excitedly when she saw the expression on Ye Li's face. However, her expression suddenly became stiffer after seh said those words.
“快给叶小姐道歉！”孟父听到了女儿的声音，绝望的脸上瞬间闪过一抹希望，赶忙扯着她走到叶漓的面前，一脸着急的道：“叶小姐，我们之前不知道具体情况，所以冤枉了你，非非和你好歹是同学，你可不可以看在你们同学关系的份儿上，饶过我们孟家。”他一脸哀求。

"Hurry up and apologize to Miss Ye Li!" When Meng Fei's father heard his daughter's voice, he saw a dash of hope and hurriedly pulled Meng Fei while walking towards Ye Li. With anxiety written all over his face, he said, "Miss Ye, we don't know exactly what happened previously so we ended up wronging you. You and Meng Fei are classmates after all. Can you spare us on the account that you two are classmates?" he asked pleadingly.
“快过来坐吧，坐凤年旁边去，他那里有空位。”老人笑的暧昧。
"Come over and sit down, sit next to Fengnian, there's a seat beside him," the old man said with an ambiguous smile.
“怎么不会，她可是和全民偶像一起吃饭啊，还以这么亲密的态度，大家都怀疑他们是不是情侣关系呢！”王丽语气难掩嫉妒的道。
"Why not? She had a meal with the nation's idol and even behaved affectionately with him. Everyone is suspecting that they're a couple!" Wang Li said with a tone of jealousy that she could not hide.
“怎么了，生气了？虽然你换了个发型，但是这也改变不了你就是个小胖妞的事实啊。”反应过来的他欠揍的道。
"What's the matter? Are you upset? You may have had a change of hairstyle but that does not change the fact that you are a little fatty," he said in an annoying manner after reacting from the shock.
“怎么了？”叶漓又恢复了原本那副天真无害的模样，眼尾上挑着，眼神十分勾人。
"What's wrong?" Ye Li restored her innocent and harmless expression, the corners of her eyes slightly upturned. Her gaze was extremely alluring.
“怎么了？你要是受不了这个委屈，我也不介意去帮你讨个公道？”叶漓直接了当的笑。
"What's the matter? If you can't take it lying down, I won't mind standing up for you and doing you some justice." Ye Li laughed straightforwardly.
“怎么什么不三不四的人都能进来啊，真是无语了，就她那臭名远扬的名声，二小姐你可别跟她搭话，不然会连累你的。”
"Why do they just let anyone come in? I'm really speechless. She has a terrible reputation too. Miss Xu Yuan, don't talk to her, lest you get implicated."
“怎么可能，那个小肥妞哪有这么好看？”
"How is that possible? How can that little fat girl be so good-looking?"
“怎么回事啊？同样的名字？？”
"What's going on? The same name?"
“怎么天天都是这些东西？”她不悦的往后一靠，没有看向看过来的秦柔母女，反而是看向了一旁站着的女佣。
"Why do I get served these stuff everyday?" She leaned backwards in displeasure and stared at the maid at the side instead of Qin Rou and Ye Mei.
“怎么没听老师说过会有新同学，白白胖胖的长得好可爱呀。”
"Why didn't Teacher inform us that we'd be having a new classmate? She's fair and chubby, so adorable."
“怎么，这位同学好似还有些不甘心呢，还想要我去承担这个罪名吗？”叶漓抬了抬下巴，轻蔑的看向脸色难看的女生。
"Why? You still seem to be a bit indignant. Do you still me to take the blame?" Ye Li lifted her chin and looked at the girl whose face had grown sullen, with contempt.
“怎么？”叶漓抬眸扫了一眼侍者。
"What's the matter?" Ye Li looked up at the steward.
“怎，怎么回事啊？眉儿。”跟着叶眉的两个女生都蒙了。
"What... What is going on, Ye Mei?" the other two girls who were following Ye Mei were stunned.
“恶心，没想到你竟然是这么一个表里不一的人，我真是瞎了眼了。”
"Disgusting, I didn't expect you to be such a pretentious person. I was really blind."
“您，您和这位小姐的邀请函名字是同一个人。”侍者有些怪异的说。
"The names on your invitation card and the one that belongs to this lady here are exactly the same," the steward said in puzzlement.
“情人节？哪？”徐凤年蹙了蹙眉。
"Valentine's Day? Which one?" Xu Fengnian questioned with a frown.
“想多了吧，不就是会打扮了而已，有什么了不起的....”
"You must be overthinking it. She just dolls herself up now. It's no big deal..."
“想开除我？”叶漓拨弄着自己修剪整齐的指甲，仿佛听到了什么笑话，“你怕是不知道这是谁的地盘，就凭你？也有资格？”
"You want to get me expelled?" Ye Li fiddled with her neatly trimmed fingernails, as if she had heard some joke. "You probably don't know whose turf this is. Are you fit to get me expelled?"
“我不怪你们，我知道你们是为了我好才会让我同徐大少订婚，而且这是妈妈的心愿，我也想要帮她实现。”叶漓下定决心道。
"I don't blame you guys. I know you wanted me to marry Young Master Xu for my own good. Besides, it's also Mother's wish. I want to fulfill it for her," Ye Li said after making up her mind.
“我不过是出于礼貌回答了她们两个的问题，怎么到了你的嘴里变成了殃及了呢？你这样说，我岂不是更无辜？”叶漓挑了挑眉。
"I've merely answered their questions out of courtesy, why are you making it sound so severe? Aren't I even more innocent then?" Ye Li asked, raising her brow.
“我为什么要告诉你呢？”叶漓低头抿了一口酒，醇香的液体划过口腔，让她有些沉醉的眯了眯眼，模样很是享受。
"Why must I tell you?" Ye Li looked down and sipped on a mouth of wine. When the fragrant liquid swooshed in her mouth, she squinted as she immersed in the pleasure, seemingly enjoying it very much.
“我为什么要道歉？”叶漓歪着头，疑惑的看向她问。
"Why should I apologize?" Ye Li questioned, staring at her with confusion as she tilted her head.
“我也不知道，我要和老...徐大少订婚的消息不知道被谁传播了出去，同学们都在说，我要嫁给那些年纪大的老男人做老婆，还说我之前那么有钱，就是被人包养，明明都不是这样的，可大家都这样说，这让我日后要怎么见人？”叶漓一句老公差点脱口而出。

"I don't know, the news of my engagement with Hub... I mean, Young Master Xu, was somehow spread by someone. My classmates all said that I'm marrying an old man and that I must be able to live a luxurious life because I'm the mistress of a wealthy man. That's obviously not the truth but now that they're saying such things, how am I going to face anyone in the future?" Ye Li almost blurted the word 'Hubby'.
“我也不知道，自从上一次落水之后醒来，她就像是变了一个人。”叶眉一脸无奈的开口，见于向阳脸色难看，又安慰了一句：“会不会是她用另一种方式吸引你的注意呢， 毕竟之前她这么喜欢你，突然就不喜欢是不是太牵强了，唯一的解释，就是她故意想要利用这种办法，然后引起你的注意，让你主动找她，你也知道，我哥哥们对她几乎是百依百顺，她想要这样做，简直轻而易举。”

"I don't know, ever since she regained consciousness after she fell into the water, she seemed to have become a completely different person." Ye Mei spoke with a helpless expression. Seeing the sullen expression on Yu Xiangyang's face, she comforted again, "Could it be that she's using another method to attract your attention? After all, she used to be so fond of you and it seems a little far-fetched to say that she suddenly doesn't like you anymore. The only possible explanation is that she deliberately wants to use this approach to catch your attention so that you will take the initiative to look her up. Well, you also know how much my brothers dote on her and give in to her. It's a piece of cake for her to do this."
“我也是，不过这女的到底谁啊，我们学校有这样的人我竟然不知道？”
"Me too, but who is this girl? How come I don't know that there's someone like her in school?"
“我也没说让你出来，只是疑惑为什么没到我手中的邀请函怎么在你手中，全程都是你自己戏多，怪我咯？”她耸了耸肩，提脚走了进去。

"I didn't say that you can't come along I was just wondering why the invitation card ended up in your hands instead of mine. You were the one who started being dramatic about it and now it's my fault?" she shrugged and entered.
“我也觉得，人家也说了只是粉丝，现在的粉丝追星疯狂也能理解，但是去为了他死，好像是太过夸张了吧。”

"I think so too. She's already said that she was just a fan and it's understandable that fans nowadays would rave over their favorite celebrities hysterically but dying for him seems a bit too exaggerated."
“我也觉得，你看她白白嫩嫩的，一点也不丑好吗？”
"I think so too. Look, she's fair and tender. She doesn't seem ugly at all."
“我也觉得，姐姐你有看上的吗？”不明所以的徐倩赶忙问。
"I think so too. Ye Mei, did you see any that you fancy?" Xu Qian, who did not know why, hurriedly asked.
“我亲眼看到了，她往这边来了，肯定没错。”
"I saw it with my own eyes. She came inside here. I can't be wrong."
“我什么时候要能跟偶像吃顿饭，我当场猝死都愿意！”
"If I ever get to have a meal with my idol, I'd be willing to die on the spot!"
“我从不说假话。”
"I never lie."
“我们不是这个意思。”
"That's not what we meant."
“我们听说过你，帝都大学的文艺女神是吧，这件事不关你的事情，我们也不想连累无辜，但是也警告你，少多管闲事！”几个女生对视一眼，威胁的目光落到了叶眉身上。

"We've heard about you. You're Beijing University's Goddess of the Arts, right? This has nothing to do with you. We don't want to involve the innocent. However, I'm warning you, don't be nosy!" The girls looked at each other before looking at Ye Mei with a threatening gaze.
“我们孟家可是在帝都开大公司的，孟氏地产就是我的资产，你这种身份的人，可能都没听说过吧，我劝你识相的就赶紧让你妹妹道歉，不然别说我以大欺小！”孟父冷笑道，他根本就没有将这两个毛头小孩的身份往高处想，更不会联想到第一大世家叶家，毕竟这个城市姓叶的那么多。

"The Meng Family owns a huge company in Beijing. The Meng Group Realty belongs to me. Someone of your level has probably never heard of this before. I suggest you hurry and apologize to your younger sister. Otherwise, don't say that I'm bullying the weak!" Meng Fei's father sneered. He did not think highly of the two of them at all, let alone associate them with the wealthiest family in Beijing, the Ye Family. After all, there were many families in the city with the same last name.
“我们眉宝才买的新裙子，人家都还没来得及穿，就给你抢去了，这姐姐当的可真是666！”
"Ye Mei has just bought this gown and she hasn't had the chance to wear it yet but you've already snatched it from her. You're such a wonderful sister!"
“我们过去就知道了。”叶眉心里也是疑惑，很想去看看叶漓说的到底是谁。
"We'll know when we get there." Ye Mei was puzzled as well and she wanted to see who Ye Li was going to have lunch with.
“我们这边问了许多人，可以确定是从大小姐班级传播出去的，最后查到的两个女生叫做孟雪和白沫，他们和二小姐的关系很好。”

"We've questioned many people and so far, we can confirm that the rumors began spreading from Missy's class. We also found out that those two girls are named Meng Xue and Bai Mo. They are very close to Second Missy."
“我们领证！”叶漓重复道。
"Let's register our marriage!" Ye Li repeated.
“我倒是跟二小姐有些交情，我们过去打个招呼吧。”
"I do have some times with Miss Xu Yuan. Let's go say hello to her."
“我刷了好几次，没有骗您，其他客人也在刷卡，我们这边的刷卡机是确定没有问题的。”
"I swiped it several times, I"m not lying to you. Other customers have managed to make successful payments by card so there's definitely nothing wrong with our machine."
“我叫叶眉，叶家的小姐。”叶眉自我介绍到。
"I'm Ye Mei, the daughter of the Ye Family," Ye Mei introduced herself.
“我啊，我准备去我哥哥的那个大学。”徐倩说。
"I'm planning to go to the college that my brother goes to," Xu Qian answered.
“我大哥大学的同桌呢，当时关系还不错吧。”徐媛有意无意的看向叶漓说。
"She used to sit next to my cousin in college. They were quite close at that time," Xu Yuan said somewhat intentionally while looking at Ye Li.
“我就出门这几天，你们都照顾不好阿漓，还不得早点回来？”叶明不悦的冷哼一声，随后看向叶枫，问“刚刚你那个兄弟是怎么回事？”

"I've only been out of town for a few days but you guys failed to take care of Ye Li well. Of course I have to come home earlier." Ye Ming humphed coldly and then turned to look at Ye Ming. He asked, "What happened between you and your close friend just now?"
“我就是好奇嘛，你看他长得多帅。”叶漓由衷夸赞。
"I'm just curious. Look how handsome he is," Ye Li praised genuinely.
“我就知道，真是太不要脸了，不是我说你姐姐啊，她怎么能这样呢，之前看上向阳学长，她也是一直对人家学长纠缠不清，现在又来祸害枫神了!”王丽一脸嫌恶。

"I knew it, she's really shameless. I don't mean to criticize your sister but how can she do that? Previously, she had been pestering Xiangyang continuously because she adored him. Now, she's trying to harm Ye Feng!" Wang Li said with a look of disgust.
“我就问你想不想知道。”叶漓淡淡的道。
"I'm just asking you if you want to know," Ye Li said calmly.
“我已经说了，你自己不相信我能有什么办法？”叶漓无语的耸了耸肩。
"I've already told you what happened. What can I do if you don't believe it?" Ye Li said, shrugging her shoulders helplessly.
“我很清楚，反正咱们都要结婚的，早点结晚点结都一样。”叶漓解释着，见他一脸怀疑的看着自己，心里有些不舒服了。

"I'm very clear about it. Anyway, we're going to get married sooner or later. It doesn't matter when we register our marriage," Ye Li explained, feeling a little uncomfortable when she saw him looking at her with suspicion.
“我怎么看，觉得她好像是叶漓啊？就叶眉那个姐姐，你们看像不像？”
"She looks like Ye Li to me. Ye Mei's sister, Ye Li. Don't you guys think so?"
“我才不会和她这么恶心的人玩。”孟非一脸不屑的道。
"I won't hang out with a disgusting person like her," Meng Fei said with a look of disgust.
“我是你的姐姐，刚刚也没见你相信我？”叶漓直接原话返回，表情嘲讽，所以说你有什么资格让我相信？

"I'm your older sister but you didn't believe me just now either." Ye Li immediately retorted her with the same words and a look of mockery. 'So, what right do you have to make me believe you?' She thought.
“我是死了吗？不然为什么会见到哥哥他们？”她瞪着美目，不可置信的喃喃。
"Am I dead? Otherwise, how can I see my brothers?" Her beautiful eyes were wide open and she was muttering in disbelief.
“我最近刚好学了这首华尔兹，想要试试，只是可惜没有舞伴，所以你能不能让凤年哥哥....”她说着，欲语还休的看了徐凤年一眼，又急忙收回了目光解释道：“姐你别误会，我只是想着你也不会跳舞，所以才想着让凤年哥哥和我一起，这点小事，我相信你不会介意的吧....”她紧张的开口，模样小心翼翼，看起来可怜极了。

"Recently, I learned this waltz and I've been wanting to try it out but unfortunately, I don't have a dance partner, so can you let Xu Fengnian..." As she spoke, she paused and glanced at Xu Fengnian lustfully before quickly looking away and explaining, "Ye Li, don't be mistaken, I just thought of asking Xu Fengnian to dance with me because you don't know how to dance. It's just a trivial matter, I believe you won't mind..." She said nervously, appearing extremely cautious and pitiful.
“我未婚妻我不对她好，我对谁好？”徐凤年的视线并没有多在她身上停留，语气淡淡的，可听在叶眉的耳中，却格外刺耳。
"She's my fiancée, of course I'd treat her well." Xu Fengnian did not keep his eyes fixed on her for long and his tone was rather indifferent. However, it sounded extremely harsh to Ye Mei.
“我没事啊。”叶漓有些疑惑的看向徐晗。
"I'm alright," Ye Li said, looking at Xu Han with bewilderment.
“我没事啦哥哥，当时她先动手，我只是为了自保，就用钢笔挡了一下，谁知道孟小姐那么傻，直接往笔尖上捅了上来，你说我有什么办法？”叶漓无辜的耸了耸肩。

"I'm alright, Ye Feng, she was the one who tried to hit me first and I simply blocked her with the pen for the sake of protecting myself. I didn't expect Miss Meng Fei to be so silly as to let the tip of the pen stab her. What do you think I could have done?" Ye Li said, shrugging her shoulders innocently.
“我的小公主，等你许久了。”他们的枫神大人，一脸绅士温柔的朝着叶漓伸出了手。
"My little princess, I've been waiting long for you." Their idol, Ye Feng, reached his hand out to Ye Li with a gentlemanly warmth on his face.
“我的错？你亲眼看到我跟他表白了，你又亲眼看到我为了他自杀了？你什么都不知道，就来让我去澄清道歉？凭什么？凭你那张会说话的嘴？”叶漓不屑的目光落到了对方难看的脸上。

"I'm at fault? Did you people see me confessing to him and killing myself because of him? You people want me to clarify matters and apologize to him when you don't know anything at all? Why should I do that? Because you're good at talking?" Ye Li looked at the girl with disdain.
“我相信这学校有一半的女生都喜欢向阳学长，向他表白的人数不胜数，我不过就是刚好出了一点意外而已，怎么落到你们口中，就变成了碰瓷报复了呢？想象力这么丰富，你们还需要读什么书啊，去报刊写小说好了。”

"I believe half of the girls in school adore Senior Xiangyang and have confessed to him before. However, I only happened to fall into the water by accident. Why did you people turn it into a scam and a plot for revenge? Since you've got such a rich imagination, why bother studying? You guys should just join the newspaper agencies and write novels for them."
“我看你们是在想屁吃。”叶漓扯了扯嘴角，“先不说这件事是不是我的错，你们都没有证据证明我是不是先动的手，就下了定论，还敢要赔偿，不觉得太过分了？警察叔叔办案都还要讲究证据呢，你们难道比警察还厉害？”

"I think you people are asking for trouble." Ye Li smirked and said, "Regardless of whether I'm at fault or not, you asked for a compensation without having any evidence to prove that I was the one who got physical first. Don't you think that's too much? Even the police need evidence to press charges. Are you people more capable than the police?"
“我看你就是牙尖嘴利，他那样身份的人，我们要是能随便能找到，还找你做什么！”
"You're so sharp-tongued. If we can look for him easily, why would we look for you!?!"
“我看你是敬酒不吃吃罚酒！”说罢，那女生就提手往她脸上扇了过来。
"You must be asking for it!" After saying that, the girl pinched her face in a bid to slap her.
“我看找死的人是你们吧？”叶漓站了起来，漂亮的小脸上满是冰霜：“什么时候轮到你们这群陌生人来多管闲事了？你们是我妈？屁话这么多？”

"You people are the ones who have death wishes." Ye Li stood up with an icy cold expression on her beautiful face. "Who are you strangers to poke your nose into my business? Are you people my mother? Why do you have so much nonsense to say?"
“我看看。”叶眉故作惊讶的看去，“怎么会这样？”
"Let me take a look." Pretending to be shocked, Ye Mei looked over and asked, "Why is this happening?"
“我知道。”徐凤年闻声，先是愣了一下，怀中的小丫头不知道是受什么刺激了，一向不喜接近他的人儿，这会儿却死死的抱着他不愿松开。

"I know." Xu Fengnian was stunned after hearing her words at first. He felt that she seemed to have been triggered by something as she usually disliked getting close to him but now, she was hugging him tightly and refusing to let go at all.
“我知道改变不了什么，所以有事？”想到此，叶漓冷淡的回应了一句。
"I know it won't change anything, so what's the matter?" Ye Li answered calmly at the thought of this.
“我确实不太了解我未婚夫，不过他倒是挺了解我的，毕竟，我跟他从小长大，一直以来都是他在照顾我，温小姐这么说，我倒是有些愧疚。”叶漓回了一抹讥笑。

"Indeed, I don't know my fiancé very well, but he does know me quite well. After all, we grew up together and he has always been taking care of me. Miss Wen Ya, you're making me feel a little guilty now." Ye Li smiled derisively.
“我确实和一个大明星闹出了绯闻，不过那又怎样，我不觉得这能影响到我跟凤年哥哥的婚姻。”
"I'm indeed involved in a scandal with a famous celebrity but so what if I am? I don't think that would affect my marriage with Xu Fengnian."
“我能有什么事？”叶漓回了一句。
"What can happen to me?" Ye Li answered.
“我草，不是吧？这真的是叶漓吗？”
"Damn it, seriously? Is this really Ye Li?"
“我要不是叶漓，你们叫我来干什么？”叶漓一脸无语的道。
"If I'm not Ye Li, why did you call me here?" Ye Li said, looking a little appalled by his words.
“我要试试这一条。”
"I'd like to try this one."
“我觉得之前的还是要好看一些，还能遮住你的缺点。”她有意无意的强调。
"I still think that your previous hairstyle looks better. At least, it can hide your flaws," she deliberately emphasized in a passive-aggressive manner.
“我觉得我已经找到了。”叶漓笑了一声。
"I think I've already found one." Ye Li laughed.
“我说之前徐阿姨送我的邀请函怎么不见了，没想到在你那里啊。”叶漓看向叶眉，在她难看的表情下，又说：“你要来早说不就好了，偷偷拿走了邀请函是什么意思，害的我又让徐阿姨给我送了一张，多麻烦啊不是，眉儿妹妹？”

"I was wondering why the invitation that Mrs. Xu gave me previously had gone missing. I didn't expect it to be with you." Ye Li turned to look at Ye Mei who had an awful expression and continued, "If you wanted to come, you could have just said so earlier. Why did you secretly take away the invitation card? I ended up having to ask Mrs. Xu to send me one more. Isn't that really troublesome, Ye Mei?"
“我说到做到。”叶漓头也不回的丢了一句，冷漠的背影就消失在了校长办公室中。
"I'll keep to my word," Ye Li said without even turning around. Her cold and indifferent back view disappeared in the principal's office.
“我还以为他是要请叶眉，谁知道竟然请的人是叶漓，我懵逼了！”
"I thought he was going to invite Ye Mei for lunch but it turns out that it's Ye Li. I'm dumbfounded!"
“我还是头一次遇见拿张空卡装逼的人，她是不是以为自己有张黑卡就是有钱人了，反正试穿了也不一定要买？”

"This is the first time I've ever seen someone pretending to be rich by using an empty card. Does she think she's rich just because she has a black card and that she doesn't necessarily have to buy the gown after trying it on?"
“我这是粉了个什么样的人啊！天哪...已被惊呆。”
"What kind of a person have I been idolizing!?! Oh my God... I'm shocked."
“我都说了，咱们是同学，一句对不起就能解决的事情，何必闹大，你说呢？”叶漓一笑，可笑容不达眼底。
"I said, we are classmates. Why bother blowing up something that can be resolved with an apology?" Ye Li said with a smile, but it was not genuine.
“我配不配不是你说了算。”叶漓不屑的撇了她一眼，“有时候，别小看别人，因为不是谁，都是你能小看的起的。”
"It's not up to you to say whether I'm worthy or not." Ye Li glanced at her disdainfully and continued, "Sometimes, you shouldn't belittle others, because you can't afford to belittle just anyone."
“我问你，你跟枫神到底是什么关系！”站在前面的女人眯着眼睛问道。
"I'm asking you, what is your relationship with Ye Feng!?!" asked the woman who was standing right in front and glowering at her.
“我，我不知道，邀请函是我妈妈给我的。”叶眉摇了摇头，一脸无辜的说。
"I-I don't know. My mother gave it to me," Ye Mei said, shaking her head innocently.
“我，我没有，姐姐，你别误会，我真没有其他意思。”她赶忙解释。
"I-I didn't, Sister, don't get the wrong idea, I really didn't mean anything else," she hurriedly explained.
“所以你们想怎样？”叶漓伸手拿过了一杯红酒，摇晃了两下，漠然的目光扫过一行女人。
"So what do you people want?" Ye Li reached out to grab a glass of red wine and swirled it before looking at the women coldly.
“所以你想知道，你亲爱的枫神为什么会请我吃饭？”叶漓拨弄着修剪整齐的指甲，似笑非笑的看她。
"So do you want to know why your beloved Ye Feng treated me to lunch?" Ye Li asked with a mirthless smirk while fiddling with her neatly trimmed fingernails.
“打扰了你们，真是不好意思，那我先走了。”她对叶漓说着这话，眼睛却看向徐凤年，好似期待他的挽留。
"Sorry to have disturbed you two. I'll take my leave then," she said to Ye Li while keeping her eyes fixed on Xu Fengnian, seemingly waiting for him to ask her to stay.
“抱歉啊徐少，哪款夏夜之星是我们ys的限定，仅此一条。”一旁的服务员歉意的说。
"Sorry, Mr. Xu Han, that gown is a limited edition design called the Stars of the Summer Night and there is only one," the sales assistant said apologetically.
“抱歉啊这位小姐，我们又不知道她什么身份，自然是不好将乱七八糟的人带进去。”
"Miss, I'm sorry, we don't know what her identity is either. We can't just let any dubious person enter."
“抱歉小姐，如果她是跟你们一起来的话，是可以进去的，但是现在你们已经进去了，她没有邀请函的话，不能进去。”侍者闻言，面无表情的说。

"I'm sorry, Miss, if she had come with you, she would have been able to go in, but now that you have gone in, she can't go in if she doesn't have an invitation," the steward said expressionlessly after hearing her words.
“抱歉，我只和我未婚妻跳舞。”徐凤年蹙了蹙眉，看着叶眉痴迷的目光，眼中多了几分不耐。
"I'm sorry but I'll only dance with my fiancée." Xu Fengnian frowned and looked at Ye Mei's smitten gaze with some annoyance.
“抱歉，我对跳舞并没兴趣，温小姐另邀他人吧。”他冷淡的拒绝。
"I'm sorry, I'm not interested in dancing, Miss Wen Ya, please invite someone else instead," he declined coldly.
“换做是我告白被拒绝，还被人逼着道歉的话，我可能也会气死的吧。”
"If I were the one who got rejected after confessing and was even forced to apologize, I'd probably hit the roof."
“搞笑吧你们，现在的美颜相机多发达你们心里没点数吗？再说了，这些图都是我从他们校园贴吧翻出来的，他们学校的人都知道她长什么样，现在就开始洗了？真恶心！而且枫神那么有钱，说不定她早就整容了，之前胖的时候，根本就看不到五官好吗？也就只有你们这群脑残粉相信了。”

"You people must be joking. Don't you guys know how developed digital photo enhancement cameras and software are nowadays? Besides, I found those photos from their school forum. All her schoolmates know what she really looks like. Are you all standing up for her now? How disgusting! Besides, Ye Feng is loaded. Maybe, she's already gone under the knife for cosmetic surgery long ago. When she was chubbier, her features weren't pronounced at all. You brainless fans are the only ones who would believe her."
“无论你们怎么黑，我都会一直支持眉宝的。”
"No matter how much hate you guys send her, I'll always support Ye Mei."
“是他请我吃的饭，怎么就要我负责任了？要找也是找他吧，您可真是搞笑！”
"He was the one who treated me to a meal. Why do I have to be responsible? If anything, you should be looking for him, not me. You're really ridiculous!"
“是吗？”叶漓似笑非笑的看向得意的三人：“你确定？”
"Is that so?" Ye Li looked at the smug trio with a mirthless smirk. "Are you sure?"
“是吗？”叶漓啧了一声：“那我倒是想看看，你们要怎么不放过我了。”
"Is that so?" Ye Li clucked her tongue against the roof of her mouth and said, "I shall see how you deal with me then."
“是吗？”她若有所思的看了叶眉一眼。
"Is that so?" she asked, looking at Ye Mei, seemingly filled with thoughts.
“是呀。”叶眉一脸谦虚的说。
"Yeah," Ye Mei answered with a humble expression.
“是呀，哥哥你吃饭了吗？”叶漓关心道。
"Yeah, Ye Luo, have you eaten?" Ye Li asked worriedly.
“是呀，每一年情人节，都是凤年陪我一起过的。”温雅温柔的笑道。
"Yeah, Fengnian spends every Valentine's Day with me," Wen Ya said with a gentle smile.
“是啊....”众女生原本看叶漓愤怒的目光，逐渐变成了好想结交的期待眼神。
"Yeah..." The angry gazes of the girls who were looking at Ye Li with displeasure, gradually turned into looks of anticipation as they were eager to befriend her.
“是啊是啊叶漓，我蹲了你好几天了，拜托帮帮我好吗？”
"Yeah, Ye Li, I've been camping here and waiting for you for several days. Will you please help me?"
“是啊是啊，向阳肯定是和叶眉来吃饭的，他们两个平时关系不错的，这个叶漓仗着自家妹妹的关系，就对咱们偶像纠缠不休，恶心死了！”
