"Yes, yes, Xiangyang must have come here for lunch Ye Mei, the two of them have always been on good terms with each other. Ye Li keeps pestering our idol just because her younger sister is close to him. How disgusting!"
“是啊是啊，还是咱们眉宝低调，不像是某些人为了火炒作，趁机蹭别人热度。”
"Yeah, yeah, Ye Mei keeps such a profile, unlike someone who used her brother for fame."
“是啊阿漓宝贝，你吓死哥哥了，你要是出了一点事，要哥哥们日后怎么办呀。”蓝发男同样是一脸伤心。
"Yeah, Baby Li, you scared us. If anything happens to you, what are we supposed to do in the future?" the man with the blue hair said, looking just as sad as the others.
“是啊阿漓，你不是喜欢向阳吗？你要是喜欢，哥哥怎么也得帮你拿下他，我们也不想你不幸福。”叶枫也是认同道。
"Yeah, Li, don't you like Xiangyang? If you fancy him, I must help you win his heart no matter what. We want you to be happy too," Ye Feng chimed in.
“是啊，你们不说我还忘记这号人了，平时叶漓也跟叶眉来学校，但是跟在后面，压根没什么存在感，我从没有关注过，有些印象，这个女的看起来跟她一样胖，就是贞子发型没了，差别好大啊，我完全没认出来。”

"Yeah, if you guys didn't mention her, I would have forgotten about her. Usually, Ye Li would follow behind Ye Li and she barely has any presence at all. I've never paid attention to her and I only have a vague impression of her. This girl looks chubby, just like her, but she no longer has a Sadako hairstyle. The difference is huge. I really didn't recognize her at all."
“是啊，你们有没有发现，叶漓这次回来，改变了很多，给人的感觉也不一样了，好像是很不好惹，有时候我不小心对上她的眼睛，都莫名有些害怕。”

"Yeah, did you guys realize that Ye Li seemed to have changed a lot after she came back this time? She gives off a completely different vibe. She seems really feisty and not to be trifled with. Sometimes, I'd feel somewhat terrified when I accidentally make eye contact with her."
“是啊，叶眉都这样维护她了，还被她指责，真是太不值了。”
"Yeah, Ye Mei is already defending her. Yet, she still chided Ye Mei. It really isn't worth Ye Mei's while."
“是啊，孟非呢？她怎么样了？这件事解决了吗？”
"Yeah, where's Meng Fei? How is she now? Has the matter been settled?"
“是啊，正好阿漓不会跳舞，不如让雅雅姐和大哥跳一场，你顺便学一下？”徐媛开口。
"Yeah, it just so happens that Ye Li can't dance. Ye Li, why don't you let Xu Fengnian and Wen Ya dance with each other while you learn?" Xu Yuan asked.
“是啊，眉宝之前就说自己要去参加聚会，没有回应肯定是因为太忙没有注意，你们不要乱说好吗，她不是那样的人。”
"Yeah, Ye Me mentioned previously that she's going to attend a gathering and she must have been too busy to respond. Don't spout any nonsense, alright? She's not such a person."
“是啊，真是羡慕，听说她十八岁就在国外顶尖大学毕业了，智商高达一百八，现在还是国外有名小提琴大师的弟子，真是集优秀美貌于一身！”

"Yeah, I'm so envious. I heard that she graduated from a top university abroad at the age of 18 and has an IQ of 180. She is now an apprentice of a famous violin master from overseas. She's really a combination of brains, talent, and beauty!"
“是啊，要是能跟她搭上关系，那可就好了！”
"Yeah, it'd be wonderful if I can forge some ties with her!"
“是啊，还威胁说向阳粉不会放过她的呢，现在的粉丝都这么嚣张的吗？”
"Yeah, she even threatened her by saying that Xiangyang's fans wouldn't let her off. Are fans all so arrogant nowadays?"
“是啊，这可是在徐家，闹大了事不好，到时候徐家人怪罪下来，说不定咱们都被赶出去。”
"Yeah, this is the Xu Family's home. It would be terrible if things get blown out of proportion. If the Xu Family decides to pursue the matter, we will be thrown out."
“是啊，长得挺漂亮的啊，之前怎么就打扮成那副模样，真是奇怪，不过这会儿突然换了新发型，难不成是开窍了？”
"Yeah, she's quite pretty. Why did she use to make herself look that way? That's so strange. However, she suddenly changed her hairstyle. Has she woken up her idea?"
“是她们先动的手。”叶漓闷闷的解释道。
"They were the ones who laid a finger on me first," Ye Li explained in an upset tone.
“是徐家大少，大小姐也是被他带走的，当时我们怕被发现，没有出面。”
"Young Master Xu. He brought Missy away too. We didn't interject because we were afraid of being discovered by him."
“是我们该死，当初就不该因为这事为难你，只要你好好的，你说什么就是什么...”
"It's all our fault. We shouldn't have made things hard for you because of this. As long as you're alright, we'll do whatever you say..."
“是的，您可以去查一下余额，或者换卡支付。”服务员说。
"Yes, you may proceed to check the balance or pay with a different card," said the sales assistant.
“是该道歉。”
"You should be."
“是，他是说我恶心，说我仗着自己跟三哥哥的关系就纠缠他！”叶漓眼泪汪汪的告状。
"Yeah, he said that I'm disgusting and that I keep pestering just because I'm Third Brother's younger sister!" Ye Li complained with tears in her eyes.
“有事？”她蹙了蹙眉，有些不悦。
"Is something wrong?" she asked in displeasure with a frown.
“有问题吗？”叶枫眯着眼睛，不悦的道。
"Is there a problem?" Ye Feng asked in displeasure while squinting.
“松开！”叶漓眼中寒光乍现。
"Let go!" Ye Li exclaimed with an icy cold gaze.
“枫神看我，枫神看我。”
"Ye Feng, look at me, Ye Feng, look at me."
“枫神，真的是枫神，啊啊啊妈妈我出息了，我竟然看到了枫神！”
"Ye Feng, it's really Ye Feng! Oh my god, I actually saw Ye Feng!"
“枫神？”徐媛愣了愣，随后似笑非笑的看向叶漓。
"Ye Feng?" Xu Yuan was stunned for a while, after which she looked at Ye Li with a halfhearted smile.
“枫，枫枫枫...”带头的女生在看清其中一个男人竟然是自己的偶像时，一口气差点没吸上来。
"Ye Feng..." The girl who was leading the rest almost couldn't breathe when she saw that one of them was her idol.
“校长，叶漓我带来了，这个学生我是真的没法教，不尊重老师不说，还欺负同学，听说还对学校的学长纠缠不休，现在贴吧，网上全都是关于她不知廉耻纠缠人的八卦信息，我们学校的脸都被她丢完了，你看怎么办吧。”程艳一脸嫌恶的道。

"Principal, I've already brought Ye Li here. This student is really getting out of hand and I can't discipline her at all. Not only does she disrespect the teacher, she even bullies her classmates. I heard that she pesters her senior too. Now, there is plenty of gossip about her going around on the forums and social media platforms on the internet. She's completely embarrassed our school. Please do as you deem fit," Cheng Yan said with a look of disgust.
“校长，叶，叶枫找您。”门外的女秘书带着颤音。
"Principal, Ye Feng is looking for you," the female secretary said with a shaky voice as she stood outside the door.
“校长，这件事你也应该看到了，确实是叶漓的问题，而且她的存在实在是影响风气，若是让她继续呆下去，日后学校那些学生跟着学就不好了，你也不是不知道哪位枫神是什么人，惊扰了人家，倒霉的还是咱们。”程艳提醒道。

"Principal, you've already heard what happened. It's indeed Ye Feng's fault and her presence is really affecting the school's reputation. If she continues to stay here and lead the rest of the students astray, that would be terrible. You know what kind of a person Ye Feng is too. If we end up disturbing him, we'll be the ones in trouble," Cheng Yan reminded.
“求？”叶漓挑了挑眼尾，眼神带了几分邪气看她：“自家的哥哥还需要求？你这是在搞笑？”
"Plead?" Ye Li asked, raising the corners of her eyes and looking at Ye Mei sinisterly. "Why would I have to plead with my brothers? Are you joking?"
“没事啦，我今天带的钱多，等会你看上那一条，我送你便是。”叶眉闻言，大方的道。
"It's alright, I brought a lot of money with me today. Just pick one that you like and I'll give it to you as a gift," Ye Mei said generously after hearing her words.
“没事就好，昨晚上我就想去看你了，但是哥哥他们不让，我才没有去看你。”
"Good that you are. I wanted to go see you last night but Brothers didn't allow me to so I didn't."
“没事，我不怪你，毕竟我也知道，你和向阳学长来往关系那么密切，帮着他的忙说我我也能理解，我确实因为表白被拒而伤心，但是我不觉得那足够让我想不开自杀，落水本就是一个意外，到了妹妹的口中却变成了自杀，好像是生怕别人不知道我为情自杀似的，啧，我这还真是跳进黄河也洗不清了。”叶漓无奈耸肩。

"It's alright, I don't blame you. After all, I know that you've always been close to Xiangyang and I can understand why you want to help him. Indeed, I felt upset about being rejected after confessing to him but I don't think that's enough reason for me to want to take my own life. Falling into the water was an accident in the first place. Yet, you made it sound like suicide, as if you're afraid that others do not know that I killed myself for love. Tsk, I really can't clear my name now," Ye Li said, shrugging her shoulders helplessly.
“没什么。”叶漓收了手机，随后有些诧异的看他：“你也被罚站了？”
"Nothing." Ye Li put away her mobile phone and then looked at him in surprise. "Are you being punished too?"
“没关系他会帮你说话，装什么装呢，你今儿个不解释清楚，就别想走！”
"If you two aren't related to each other, why would he speak up for you? What are you pretending for? If you don't explain yourself clearly today, don't think of leaving!"
“没关系的阿姨，我没事。”叶漓摇了摇头。
"It's alright, Auntie, I'm fine," Ye Li said, shaking her head.
“没写。”叶漓道。
"I didn't write it," Ye Li answered.
“没听说啊，还跟咱们的文艺女神走在一起，肯定不是一般人吧？”
"Haven't you heard yet? She's walking beside the goddess of the arts. She definitely isn't an ordinary person, is she?"
“没得商量，就按照我说的办！”可孟父正在上头，哪里注意到，直接下了定论。
"There's no room for discussion, just do as I say!" Meng Fei's father decided immediately, too infuriated to notice it.
“没想到她会是这样的人，难怪枫神之官宣小凤漓这个妹妹，对她丝毫没有理睬，看来不是没有原因的嘛。”
"I didn't expect her to be such a person, no wonder Ye Feng doesn't care about her even though she's his younger sister too. Seems like there's a reason for that."
“没想到小小年纪，竟然就做出了这样的事情，真是不知廉耻！”
"I didn't expect you to do such a thing at such a young age. You're really shameless!"
“没想到我眉宝，竟然是枫神的妹妹，太低调了有木有！”
"I didn't expect Ye Mei to be Ye Feng's younger sister, she's been keeping such a low profile!"
“没有二小姐说的这么严厉，放心吧，肯定能进去的。”她淡笑。
With a faint smile, Ye Li answered, "It's not as strict as Miss Xu Yuan made it out to be. You can definitely get in."
“没有啦，可能是这段时间减肥的效果。”叶漓嘿嘿一笑。
"No, I think it's because I've been trying to lose weight lately," Ye Li said while chuckling.
“没错。”侍者连忙点头。
"Yes." The stewards nodded frantically.
“活该，让她敢接触咱们枫神，这会儿下场来了吧！”
"She deserves it. How dare she come into contact with our idol, Ye Feng? Now she has to bear the consequences!"
“滚去试衣服，不然我走了，你自己买单。”徐晗懒得解释，直接道。
"Go and get changed or I'm leaving. You'll then have to pay the bill yourself," Xu Han said, too lazy to explain to her.
“爷爷，您找我？”她笑道。
"Grandpa, are you looking for me?" she asked with a smile.
“爸爸！”叶漓听到声音的瞬间，猛地一下从沙发上起身，惊喜的看去。
"Father!" Ye Li exclaimed and sprung up from the couch the moment she heard his voice. She looked over in surprise.
“爸爸，我说的是真的了，之前我和凤年哥哥有些误会，所以我对他的态度可能不太好，让你们都误会了，但是这段时间我们的误会已经解开了，我自然也不会再无理取闹。”叶漓有些无奈的道。

"Father, I'm serious. Previously, there was some misunderstanding between me and Brother Fengnian, so my attitude towards him was rather harsh. I caused you guys to get the wrong idea. However, we've cleared the misunderstanding and I won't be unreasonable again," Ye Li said helplessly.
“爸，不好意思，外面客人多，一直在寒暄，让你们久等了。”二夫人笑着道。
"Father, I'm sorry but there are too many guests outside and I've been chatting with them. Sorry to have kept all of you waiting," Kong Yun said with a smile.
“爸，你怎么回来了？不是说还要过几天？”叶洛疑惑的问道。
"Father, why are you home? Didn't you say that you'd only be back in a few more days?" Ye Luo asked in puzzlement.
“爸，你说什么啊，我才不要道歉！”孟非也没想到父亲突然就变了决定，还扯着自己主动找叶漓道歉。
"Father, what are you talking about? I don't want to apologize!" Meng Fei did not expect her father to suddenly change his mind and drag her towards Ye Li to make her apologize to the latter.
“爸，到底发生什么事了？你倒是告诉我们啊？”孟非看父亲脸色这么难看，一下就慌了。
"Father, what exactly happened? Tell us," Meng Fei asked, panicking when she saw the grim expression on her father's face.
“爸，我，我不知道啊，从来没有听人说过她是谁家的小姐，而且看起来也不像是那样的千金，我真不知道。”孟非抽泣着道。
"Father, I-I didn't know. I'd never heard anyone say that she was the daughter of the Ye Family and she doesn't look the part either. I really didn't know," Meng Fei explained while sobbing.
“爸，爸爸你怎么能这么跟枫神说话！”一旁的孟非没想到自家爸爸竟然会这么说，顿时就涨红了了脸，赶忙制止道。

"Father, Father, how can you talk to Ye Feng like that!?!" Meng Fei, who was at the side, did not expect her father to say that at all. Her face immediately became flushed and she hurriedly stopped them.
“爸，阿漓他们来了。”大夫人上前尊敬的对老爷子说。
"Father, Ye Li and the others have arrived," Mrs. Xu said respectfully to Xu Fengnian's grandfather.
“现在还要我道歉吗？”叶漓挑了挑眉，看向脸色惨白的孟父，和一脸莫名的孟母孟非。
"Do you still want me to apologize now?" Ye Li asked with raised brows as she looked at Meng Fei's father whose face had turned pale, followed by Meng Fei's mother who looked bewildered.
“白白嫩嫩的又怎么样，还不是狗改不了吃屎，我听说今天来这里包场的可是咱们学校的大明星，之前我还不知道是谁，这会儿我知道了，肯定是咱们一心向阳，之前叶漓对一心向阳可是纠缠不休呢，向阳可讨厌她了！这会儿竟然追到了这里来，真是不要脸。”

"So what if she's fair and tender? The fox may grow gray but never good. I heard that the person who booked the restaurant is a huge celebrity of our school. Previously, I didn't know who it was but now I do. It must be our beloved idol Xiangyang. Previously, Ye Li had been pestering him and Xiangyang utterly detests her! This time, she chased him all the way here. How shameless."
“眉儿不是叫你姐姐吗？既然是姐妹，谁来不是一样，你干嘛说那么难听。”
"Doesn't Ye Mei call you her sister? Since you're sisters, it doesn't matter who turns up. Why do you have to make it sound so terrible?"
“眉儿你不是说学长包场了吗？你姐姐怎么说她约了人在哪里吃饭？”一旁的好友王丽疑惑的问。
"Mei, didn't you say that Senior has booked the entire restaurant? Why did your sister say that she's going to have lunch there with someone else?" her close friend, Wang Li, asked in bewilderment.
“眉儿你最好了！”女生兴奋的抱住了她。
"Ye Mei, you're the best!" The girl hugged her excitedly.
“眉儿你真的是太漂亮了，这衣服简直就是量身为你定做的呀！”
"Ye Mei, you're gorgeous. This gown is made just for you!"
“眉儿，不然你换其他的吧，反正身材好，穿什么都好看。”
"Ye Mei, why don't you try something else? You've got a great figure and you'll look good in anything."
“眉儿，你快看，你姐姐被全网攻击了！啧啧真是惨啊！”叶眉正蹙着眉头去看叶漓，闻言，回头看她。

"Ye Mei, hurry and see this. Your sister's being slammed by all the netizens! Tsk, tsk, it's really terrible!" Ye Mei, who was looking at Ye Li with a frown, turned around to look at her desk-mate after hearing her words.
“眉儿，学校...”叶枫正想问学校关于那些流言的事情，就被叶旬扯了一下，他顿了顿，转了个语气问：“学校那边麻烦你帮老师说一声，阿漓可能要休息一段时间再过去。”

"Mei, the school..." Ye Feng was just about to question her about the rumors that had been spreading in school when Ye Xun tugged him. Ye Feng pause and continued with a different tone, "Please inform the teacher in school that Li has to rest and recuperate for some time before returning to school."
“真是不要脸，还跑去自杀，她是不是因为咱们男神拒绝了她，所以才想要用这么极端的方式报复男神啊，太恶毒了吧！”
"She's really shameless. She even tried to commit suicide. Did she think of using such an extreme way to retaliate against our idol because he had rejected her? How vicious!"
“真是无脑脑残粉，尽是给自家偶像招黑，本来人家没那个意思，她非得要往那边想，现在好了吧，自己打自己的脸。”

"They're really brainless and retarded fans. All they do is garner haters for their idols. Ye Li didn't have those intentions in the first place but she insists on thinking that way. Great, now she's proven herself wrong."
“真的吗？”女生一听，顿时惊喜的看她。
"Really?" the girl immediately asked in surprise.
“真的很抱歉枫神妹妹，我们当时太激动了，才会来找你麻烦，请你原谅大家。”
"I'm really sorry, Ye Feng's younger sister, we were just too agitated at that time. That's why we started berating you and making things difficult for you. Please forgive all of us."
“真的？”闻言，孟父顿时一脸惊喜的看她。
"Really?" Meng Fei's father asked, looking at her in surprise as soon as he heard her words.
“真羡慕啊，长得又漂亮，学习优秀，跟大佬们的关系又那么好。”
"I'm so envious. She's so beautiful, her grades are excellent, and she's so close to the famous figures."
“确实好久不见。”叶漓淡淡的回应了一声，却并没有要伸手的意思。
"Indeed, it has been long," Ye Li answered indifferently but she did not intend to shake her hand.
“竟然敢勾引我男神，今儿个绝对不能放过她！”
"How dare she seduce my idol? I definitely won't let her off today!"
“等一下，她是跟我一起的，她没有邀请函。”侍者还没来得及说话，叶眉就大喊一声，引得周围的人一下看了过来。
"Wait a minute, she's with me. She didn't bring an invitation card," Ye Mei yelled loudly before the steward could even speak, attracting the attention of everyone and causing them to look over.
“等等！”叶漓在他几乎要跪下去的档口，沉声开口了，“你好歹也是长辈，这么大的礼，我可承受不起。”
Just as he was about to kneel down, Ye Li interjected, "Wait! You're still an elder after all, I can't accept this."
“等等，叶枫同学，你和叶漓同学是什么关系？你们难道正在交往？”校长先从在震惊中回过了神，见叶枫一脸担忧的看着叶漓，忍不住问道。

"Wait, Ye Feng, what's your relationship with Ye Li? Are you two dating each other?" The principal was the first to snap out of the shock. He couldn't help but ask that question when he saw Ye Feng looking at Ye Li worriedly.
“等等，她叫叶漓？不会是网上跟枫神闹绯闻的那个女的吧？”
"Wait, her name is Ye Li? Is she the same girl who's involved in a scandal with Ye Feng, that everyone on the Internet is talking about?"
“等等，阿漓你怎么了，不爱吃没关系呀，我让厨房的人给你换就是了，怎么动这么大的火？再说了，这位厨师是我阿姨我特意给你招来的营养师，你之前不是还很喜欢他做的菜吗？”秦柔人如其名，柔声柔气的开口。

"Wait, Li, what's the matter with you? It's okay if you don't like the food, I'll just get the chef to prepare something else. Why are you getting so angry? Besides, the chef is a nutrition I specially hired for you. Didn't you use to love the food she cooks?" Qin Rou asked tenderly, her voice as gentle as her name. [1. 'Rou' means 'gentle' in Chinese.]
“等，等等，你，你说什么，叶氏收购了我们的公司....”他的舌头像是打结了一般，带着浓重的颤音。
"Wait, wait, what did you say? The Ye Corporation has acquired our company..." he said in a shaky voice, sounding a little tongue-tied.
“算了！”他恼怒的丢了一句，正欲回到自己的座位，可见叶漓的桌子歪歪斜斜的在一边，强迫症的他还是没忍住给她移回了原来的位置，并且丢了一句：“下次生气归生气，别踹桌子，一点都不淑女。”

"Forget it!" he cursed angrily and was just about to return to his seat when he saw that Ye Li's table was out of line. Due to his OCD, he couldn't help but move it back to the original position, and say, "Next time, even if you're angry, don't kick the table. That's not ladylike at all."
“算了！”徐晗看她那茫然的表情，更是烦躁了起来，将手机往她怀里一塞，阴沉着一张脸走了。
"Forget it!" Xu Han looked at the look of confusion on her face and began getting frustrated again. He shoved her mobile phone back into her hands and left with an austere expression.
“算了，你也长大了，我不多问你的私事，要去吃饭吗？”叶明问。
"Forget it, you're grown up now. I shall stay out of your affairs. Do you want to go for lunch?" Ye Ming asked.
“算了，还是让凤年哥哥做决定吧，毕竟这是他的人身自由。”她看向徐凤年。
"Forget it, let Xu Fengnian decide. After all, this concerns his personal freedom," she said, looking at Xu Fengnian.
"I used to be a fan but I'm becoming a hater..."
“给我赶紧道歉！”
"Hurry up and apologize!"
“美炸有木有，@看小凤漓照进我微博置顶，你发的什么鬼图片，小凤漓明明很漂亮好吗？”
"She's so beautiful @ComeToMyPageToSeePhotosOfYeLi, what kind of a lousy photo did you post? Ye Li is clearly gorgeous, okay?"
“老公，怎么了，发生什么事了？”一旁的孟母见他这般失态，顿时也慌了，着急问道。
"Hubby, what's the matter? What happened?" Meng Fei's mother asked worriedly and she panicked when she saw how disoriented he was.
“老师你真不懂？那要不然我们找主任来问问，看看他懂不懂？”
"Teacher, do you really not understand? Why don't we ask the dean and see if he understands what I'm talking about?"
“老师您惩罚别人之前，能否先想想自己，有没有通知过我有论文要写这件事吧！”
"Teacher, before you punish me, can you think about whether or not you informed me about this paper!?!"
“老师，我也没交论文，现在自然是要接受惩罚，这班上没交的人不少吧，你只惩罚一个人，是不是有些说不过去？”徐晗讽刺的扯了扯嘴角，双手插兜，走了出去。

"Teacher, I didn't submit my paper either so I ought to be punished too. There must be many of us who didn't submit the papers but you're only punishing one person. That doesn't seem right, does it?" Xu Han smirked sarcastically and placed his hands in his pockets before walking out.
“聚会？难怪刚刚我收到了徐家送来的请帖，我还没有注意，你说的是这个？”秦柔先是愣了一下，随后从自己的名牌包掏出一烫金请帖，开口问？

Qin Rou was a little stunned. She then took out a golden invitation card from her luxury bag and asked, "Gathering? No wonder I received an invitation from the Xu Family just now. I haven't paid much attention to it, are you referring to this?"
“肯定了，要是我我也得找她麻烦啊，听说孟非的父母都来了，这下叶漓惨了！”
"That's for sure. If I were her, I'd hold her responsible too. I heard that Meng Fei's parents came to school too. It's over for Ye Li now!"
“肯定是嫉妒吧，眉宝这么优秀又漂亮，某些人呢，只能靠蹭别人热度抢别人东西来博眼球，呵呵，一生黑不解释。”
"Her sister must be jealous of Ye Mei for being so outstanding and pretty. Some people just have to take advantage of the fame of others to bring attention to themselves. Hah, terrible."
“肯定是，你们没看到她跟班长一起走进来的？”
"It must be her. Didn't you guys see that she had entered together with the class president?"
“能是什么人，自然是叶家的小姐和少爷。”叶枫不在意的回了一句。
"Who else can we be? Of course we're the children of the Ye Family," Ye Feng said nonchalantly.
“能有什么事情，全世界最好的医生都请回来了。”秦柔有些不屑，但话说的很小声。
"What can happen to her? They've already hired the best doctors in the world," Qin Rou said softly with some disdain.
“脸色看起来不太好看，发生什么事了吗？”叶明并不知道于向阳欺负了自家女儿的事情，他刚从国外出差回来，一回来就往家里跑。

"You don't look too well. Did something happen?" Yu Xiangyang did not know that Yu Xiangyang had bullied his daughter. He had just returned from an overseas business trip and rushed home as soon as he could.
“自己没长眼睛？”徐晗丢了一句。
"Are you blind? Can't you see for yourself?" Xu Han said.
“臭丫头，说的好像是我们很少回来一样。”叶旬上前揉了揉她的头，无奈的笑道。
"Silly girl, you're making it sound like we rarely come home," Ye Xun said with a helpless smile as he stepped forward to rub her head.
“臭小子，看看你都给阿漓找了些什么麻烦。”叶洛冰冷的扫了几个僵硬发呆的女人一眼，骂了叶枫一句。
"Rascal, look what kind of trouble you've gotten Ye Li into," Ye Luo chided Ye Feng as he glanced coldly at the few women who were petrified.
“舅妈带了好多人。”徐倩好奇的看着大夫人身后走来的人，越看眼睛越瞪的大。
"Aunt brought so many people here," Xu Qian said curiously, staring at the people behind Mrs. Xu with her eyes wide open.
“花痴！”徐晗嫌弃的丢了一句，眼神正要收回，却突然看到一个熟悉的人影，他以为自己出了幻觉，微微蹙了蹙眉，仔细一眼，眼神顿变。

"You're boy crazy!" Xu Han chided in disdain. Just as he was about to look away, he suddenly saw a familiar figure and thought that he was hallucinating. He frowned a little and took a closer look, after which his gaze changed immediately.
“虽然说这位学长确实优秀，又是新一代的偶像剧男神，但是，他要家世没家世，要颜值没颜值，我一个大家族的千金小姐，又不是瞎了眼了，干嘛要为了他得罪徐家。”叶漓颇为不屑的说。

Ye Li said in disdain, "This senior may be very outstanding and he's also the popular male lead of the idol drama of the new generation. However, he doesn't come from a wealthy family and his looks are mediocre. I'm the heiress of a wealthy and prestigious family. I'm not blind, why would I want to offend the Xu Family because of him?"
“行了行了，这事既然已经解决了，就都回去吧，你们的家事自己回家解决....”
"Enough, enough, since this matter has already been resolved, you may take your leave. Settle your family issues at home..."
“行了， 你上去吧！这事用不着你管。”换做平时，叶洛三兄弟一般也不会跟叶眉计较，在他们看来，叶眉性子软，经常被叶漓欺负哭，所以偶尔还会好说歹说两句。

"Enough, go upstairs! Stay out of this." Usually, Ye Luo and his brothers wouldn't bother holding it against Ye Mei because they felt that Ye Mei was too submissive and was often bullied by Ye Li to the point of crying. Hence, they would sometimes speak up for her too.
“行了，我不想听什么解释，管家，送这几位小姐出去。”徐夫人却并没有看她们，不容拒绝的开口。
"Enough, I don't want to hear your explanation. Butler, please send these ladies out," Mrs. Xu said assertively without even looking at them.
“行了，这件事本来就是你和你母亲的不对，不确定的事情，就不要拿上来说，误会了阿漓不说，还让人看了笑话。”老爷子沉声说道。

Xu Fengnian's grandfather said in a deep voice, "Okay, you and your mother were at fault right from the beginning. Don't talk about it. Not only have you misunderstood Ye Li, you've made a fool out of yourselves."
“行了，都别说了，让阿漓好好休息一下吧。”叶洛见妹妹脸色不大好看，开口道。
"Okay, enough, let Li get some rest," Ye Luo said when he noticed that his younger sister looked a little unwell.
“被人家说卡里没钱时，这位@眉眼如画小姐的表情可真精彩，自己的卡里面有没有钱都不清楚吗？”
"When the staff told Miss Ye Mei that she has no money in her card, the look on her face was really interesting. Wouldn't she know if there's any money in her card or not?"
“装的吧？她哪里有钱去鱼庄吃饭，哪里一道菜都是五位数呢，专门为咱们学校那些有钱人家的少爷小姐服务的鱼庄，可不是谁都能进去的。”另一个女生不屑。

"She must be pretending, isn't she? Each dish served at that restaurant costs at least a five-figure amount and it specifically serves the sons and daughters of wealthy families from our school. Not anyone can go there," another girl said in disdain.
“要，怎么不要，等我一下，我打电话让人给我送卡。”叶眉表情有些僵硬。
"Of course I do, why not? Wait, let me call my someone to bring my card here,"Ye Mei said with a stiffened expression.
“让管家换个厨师。”叶漓将自家面前的营养餐推到了一边，站了起来，不容拒绝的说。
"Get the butler to hire a new chef," Ye Li said assertively, pushing the nutritious meal away before standing up. She would not take no for an answer.
“该死的，他是疯了吗？竟然有一瞬间觉得这胖女人很勾人！”
"Damn it, am I out of my mind? I can't believe that I found this fat woman very seductive for a moment!"
“请问你什么时候公开道歉？ys官方微博都挂你了。”
"When are you going to make a public apology? YS Fashion has already tagged you on Twitter."
“谁告诉你我有喜欢的人了？”叶漓眼中泛着寒光，冰冷的扫向叶眉。
"Who told you that there's someone else I like?" Ye Li questioned, glaring at Ye Mei with an icy cold gaze.
“谁家小姐啊，竟然是第一次参加聚会，真是可怜。”
"Whose family does she belong to? It's actually her first time attending such a gathering. How pathetic."
“谁？”校长皱眉问了一句。
"Who's that?" the principal asked with a frown.
“贱女人，你还真以为我们不敢动手？”其中一个在班级上混的比较开的女生，上前就要给叶漓一巴掌。
"Shameless woman, do you really think we won't dare to touch you?" One of the more popular girls in class stepped forward and was about to slap Ye Li.
“跟谁聊天呢，这么开心？”徐晗晃悠着靠近，斜着一双漂亮的眼睛看她的手机。
"Who are you texting? You look so happy," Xu Han said as he leaned over casually, glancing at her mobile phone from the side.
“转学生？”
"Is she a transfer student?"
“还不删图？人家都点名指出了，你还装作看不见？还要不要脸？”
"Why haven't you deleted the photo? They've already clarified matters and mentioned you Why are you still pretending not to see it? Have you got any shame?"
“还把微博改成了小凤漓呢，真是恶心，枫神不过就是跟你吃了一顿饭而已，就这么迫不及待的蹭他热度了吗？我看你就是死不要脸的缠上了人家了吧！”

"You even changed your Twitter username to Little Ye Li. How disgusting. Ye Feng has merely had a meal with you, are you so eager to associate yourself with him for fame? I bet you're just pestering him shamelessly!"
“还是眉宝好，低调且优秀。”
"Ye Mei is much better. She keeps a low profile and she's so outstanding."
“还没吃呢，一个人吃饭都没什么胃口。”某人叹了一声。
"Not yet, I don't have much of an appetite because I'm going to eat alone." He sighed.
“这.....”叶眉听这话，顿时为难的看向叶漓。
"Well..." Ye Li immediately looked at Ye Li, looking as if she was put in a spot.
“这下我可以叫你老公了么？”叶漓得逞的问。
"Can I call you Hubby now?" Ye Li asked smugly.
“这不就是你保持身材的好秘诀吗？我现在想减肥，自然得学着你一点，不然如何瘦的下去，你说是不是？”叶漓一脸天真的看她。
"Isn't that your secret method for staying in shape? I want to lose weight now, so I naturally have to learn from you. Otherwise, how can I lose weight?" Ye Li said, looking at her innocently.
“这个合我胃口，你们谁都别跟我抢。”
"This one's my cup of tea, none of you vie with me."
“这么严重，肯定得赔偿不少钱吧？”
"Her injury was pretty severe. The compensation sum must be hefty, huh?"
“这么年轻，不会就是徐家大少那个未过门的小妻子吧？”
"She's so young, surely she isn't the young fiancée of Xu Fengnian, right?"
“这也不能代表你们就能欺负她！道歉！”虽然是自己的粉丝，可对叶枫来说，几千万的粉丝都没有自家妹妹一根头发来的重要，更别说刚刚这群人一副仗势欺人的样子，他可都看在眼里。

"That doesn't mean that you can bully her too! Apologize!" Although they were his fans, his younger sister was way more important than tens of millions of fans. Besides, he had also seen the way they bullied others.
“这件事一直都是大家在猜想，若是她真那么喜欢于学长，这会儿肯定会借机缠上他才是，现在她却只想撇清关系，你们说会不会真的是误会了吗？”

"All this while, we have just been making speculations and wild guesses. If she really likes Senior Yu that much, she must have taken the chance to pester him. Yet, she just wants to cut off all relations to him and draw a line between them. Do you guys think that we've really mistaken them?"
“这位小姐，你还要吗？”服务员无语的问。
"Miss, do you still want it?" the sales assistant asked helplessly.
“这叶家的所有人都没把我当回事，我真的熬不下去了，今天因为叶漓的一句话，所有人都在指责我！”叶眉不甘心的道。
"No one in the Ye Family takes me seriously. I really can't stand this anymore. Today, everyone blamed me because of something Ye Li said!" Ye Mei said indignantly.
“这圆润的身材，摸着肯定很舒服。”
"It must be comfortable to touch her since she's soft and chubby."
“这宴会这么多人，谁不找不到，偏偏来找我未婚夫？知道的以为你只是想跳舞，不知道的，还以为你才是他的未婚妻呢？”她呵了一声。

"There are so many people present at the gathering. Of all people, must you dance with my fiancé? Those who know what's happening will think that you just want to dance but those who don't might just think that you're his fiancée instead of me," she said sarcastically with a scoff.
“这就不是二小姐该担心的事情了。”叶漓淡淡的开口，可那语气好似在说徐媛多管闲事。
"That's none of your concern, Miss Xu Yuan," Ye Li said calmly, sounding as if she was saying that Xu Yuan was being nosy.
“这就不是你一个外人该关心的事了。”叶漓的笑容徒然一冷，漠然的道。
"As an outsider, that's not something you should care about," Ye Li said indifferently with a cold smile.
“这帝都除了那个第一世家的公司叫叶氏，还有谁家公司敢取这个名？”孟父烦躁的吐了口气，看这还哭的女儿，怒道：“哭什么哭，我努力的一辈子的心血，差点就被你这死丫头毁于一旦了，你招惹谁不好，偏偏要招惹叶家的千金，你是想死吗？”

"Except the wealthiest family in the capital, who else would dare to name their company the Ye Corporation?" Meng Fei's father exhaled in frustration. Looking at his daughter who was still weeping, he hollered in exasperation, "What are you crying for? You almost cause me to lose my lifelong career in a moment of folly, you silly girl. Of all people, why did you have to provoke the daughter of the Ye Family? Do you have a death wish?"
“这样说来，还不就是小凤漓抢了眉宝的礼服吗？人家都穿上身了，她还抢，是不是有些过分了“现在又发出来炫耀？”

"Doesn't that mean that Ye Li has snatched the gown away from Ye Mei? Ye Mei was already wearing it and she still tried to snatch it. Is she going overboard? She even posted a photo of the gown to show it off."
“这次宴会，我妈妈请了帝都知名的乐队来伴奏，咱们都出去看看吧，这会儿肯定都开始跳舞了。”徐媛突然开口。
"My mother invited a famous band to play some music at today's gathering. Let's go and watch. They've definitely already started dancing now," Xu Yuan suddenly said.
“这段时间我得到一些消息，叶家那边好像是转变主意了。”她的声音十分清脆，宛如少女一般，又带了几分女人的成熟，格外好听。

"I got some news lately that the Ye Family seemed to have changed their minds." Her voice was extremely crisp and clear, like that of a young girl. However, she also had a feminine maturity that was extremely pleasant.
“这转折爱了爱了，没想到叶漓性格这么好，要是我，肯定都要打起来了。”
"I love this sudden twist. I didn't expect Ye Li to have such a good character. If I were in her shoes, I'd definitely fight her."
“这难道就是传说中的不打不相识？”
"Is this the legendary theory where every friendship begins with hostility?"
“道歉。”叶漓没有看他，冰冷的目光直接落到了眼泪鼻涕横流的孟非身上。
"Apologize." Ye Li was not looking at him and was instead glaring coldly at Meng Fei who was weeping continuously.
“道歉？”叶漓掀了掀眼皮子，“道歉我就要原谅你们了？”
"Apologize?" Ye Li looked up and continued, "Must I forgive you just because you apologize?"
“邀请函是你妈妈给你的，那你没看过邀请人的名字是谁？你好歹也是帝都大学出了名的学霸，不会连字也不识吧？”叶漓嗤笑出声。

"The invitation was given to you by your mother but didn't you see the name written on the invitation card? You're a star student from Beijing University after all. Surely you can read names?" Ye Li snorted with laughter.
“那不是你兄弟？”一穿着西装，高大挺拔的男人走了进来，他手中提着公文包，头发梳得一丝不苟，虽已不惑之年，却依旧十分俊美。
"Isn't he your close friend?" A tall man entered in a suit, carrying a briefcase in his hand. His hair was neatly combed and although he was already in his forties, he was still very handsome.
“那也不怪我，大家都这么说我才会这么以为的，刚刚你妹妹都还承认了，我才会要求你道歉，又不是我一个人的错！”见大家开始指责起了自己，那女同学脸色一阵涨红，恼怒的道。

Seeing that everyone had begun blaming her, the girl felt embarrassed and infuriated. Flushed, she argued, "It's not my fault either. I only thought so because everyone said that it was the case. Just now, even your sister admitted it before I asked you to apologize, it's not solely my fault!"
“那也得人家看的上你啊，我告诉你，这样的女孩子其实最难追。”
"Well, she has to like you too. I'm telling you, girls like her are actually the most difficult to woo."
“那你....”叶眉闻言，有些不明所以的看她。
"You..." Ye Mei looked at her in confusion when she heard her words.
“那你的关心还真是让我害怕呢，我刚刚要是听你的承认了下来，估计等会就会成为全网暴力的对象了吧？啧啧，要不是你是我妹妹，我都要怀疑你是故意的。”叶漓一脸怀疑的说。

"Well, your concern really scares me then. If I had just listened to you and admitted to it, I'd probably become the subject of cyber bullying later on, wouldn't I? Tsk, tsk, if you weren't my younger sister, I'd really suspect you were doing it on purpose," Ye Li said with a look of apprehension.
“那你的眼光还真挺独特，大家都觉得不好看，就你觉得好看。”叶漓若有所思的看她。
"You've got a unique taste then. No one except you thinks that my previous hairstyle was nice," Ye Li said, looking at her ambiguously.
“那叶小姐你要怎样才能原谅我们？”孟父迫切的问。
"Miss Ye, what must we do for you to forgive us?" Meng Fei's father asked eagerly.
“那就不要了。”徐凤年闻言，蹙了蹙眉，放下了叉子，自己也没有吃。
"Don't eat it anymore then," Xu Fengnian said with a frown after hearing her words. He then put down his fork, not eating a single piece of it.
“那就不跳。”徐凤年不以为然，并不在意。
"Let's not dance then," Xu Fengnian said, not bothered by it at all.
“那就好。”叶漓上了餐桌，看着自己面前的营养餐，皱了皱眉。
"Good to hear." Ye Li walked to the desk and frowned after seeing the nutritious meal in front of her.
“那就好那就好，你能想开了爸爸就放心了，那个于向阳虽然不错，但是你们不适合，爸爸还是希望你能找到一个靠谱的男人。”他拍着女儿的肩膀感叹。

"That's good, that's good. I'm at ease now that you've figured it out. Yu Xiangyang may be a nice chap but you two are not compatible with each other. I still hope that you can find a compatible man." He patted his daughter's shoulder emotionally.
“那就是徐家二小姐吗？长得真漂亮啊！”
"Is that the daughter of the Xu Family? She's really gorgeous!"
“那就谢谢你啦。”想到这里，叶眉笑的更温柔了。
"Thank you then." At the thought of this, Ye Mei smiled even more tenderly.
“那怎么办！”
"What do we do then?"
“那我送你回家。”徐凤年也不喜与这些人多纠缠，他知道他的阿漓也不喜欢，便冷淡的和几人点了点头，牵着叶漓转身离开。

"Let me send you home then," said Xu Fengnian who did not like interacting with those people much either. He knew that Ye Li disliked it too. Hence, he nodded at the few people around him without much emotion and turned around to leave with Ye Li, hand in hand.
“那是什么意思？”叶漓疑惑的问。
"What do you mean then?" Ye Li asked with apprehension.
“那是谁啊，竟然收到了徐家的特邀函，真是羡慕了。”
"Who's that? She actually received a special invitation from the Xu Family. I'm so green with envy."
“那真是委屈你了。”
"You must be aggrieved."
“那这条裙子我也不跟你抢了，你去试把姐姐，你身材那么好，穿着肯定很漂亮！”徐倩夸赞道。
"I won't vie with you for this gown then. Go try it on. You've got such a great figure, you'd definitely look beautiful!" Xu Qian praised.
“那这样吧，你看看能支付多少，我这边换其他的卡继续刷。”叶眉闻言，整个人都不好了，可衣服都穿上了身，刚刚自己还拍了照发微博，不可能再脱下来还给人家吧！

"How about this? Let me know how much you can pay and I'll process the payment with other cards that you have." Ye Mei was disoriented after hearing her words. However, she was already wearing the dress and she had even snapped a photo of it and uploaded it to Twitter. She couldn't possibly return it to the store!
“都围在这里做什么，还不上课吗？”背后响起了老师不悦的声音，众人赶忙散开。
"What are all of you crowding here for? Don't you have lessons?" the teacher chided in displeasure, after which the crowd quickly dispersed.
“都是好朋友说这些干什么，以后有什么需要尽管来找我就好啦。”
"We're best friends, what are you saying that for? From now on, if there's anything you need, feel free to look for me."
“钱？”叶漓笑了：“你觉得我像是缺钱的人？”
"Money?" Ye Li laughed and asked sarcastically, "Do you think I'm short of money?"
“闭嘴！”孟父厉声呵斥。
"Shut up!" Meng Fei's father hollered.
“阿姨不必这么麻烦，我看妹妹的营养师就不错，日后她吃什么，我就吃什么吧。”叶漓通情达理的道。
"Auntie, you don't have to go to that trouble. I think Sister's nutritionist is great. From now on, I'll eat everything she does," Ye Li said in an understanding manner.
“阿漓你能想开最好。”愤怒的叶枫终究是无奈的叹了口气。
"Li, it's good that you can figure it out and get over it."The infuriated Ye Feng sighed helplessly in the end.
“阿漓你这样说可不对，对你来说当然不严厉了，毕竟你可是有后台的人，就算是考零分也能上去，我听说当年你高考都没考上，可倩倩始终是外人。”徐媛有意无意的说。

"Ye Li, that's not right. Of course the requirements are not as strict for you. After all, you have a powerful family to support you. Even if you scored zero for your exams, you'd still be able to get a place in the college. I heard that your results for your national college entrance examinations were below satisfactory. However, Xu Qian is still an outsider after all," Xu Qian said somewhat deliberately.
“阿漓姐姐，你去哪里？”叶眉揪住了一下课就要往外走的叶漓，问道。
"Sister Ye Li, where are you going?" Ye Mei asked, grabbing Ye Li who was going to leave right after the lesson ended.
“阿漓姐，对不起，我不知道你要来，我要是知道，我就等你一起进去了。”叶眉歉意的开口，见叶漓不说话，又道：“不然你问问其他没进来的人愿不愿意带你进来，大家都很好说话的。”她说道。

"Ye Li, I'm sorry, I didn't know that you were coming. If I had known, I would have brought you in with me," Ye Mei said apologetically. Seeing that Ye Li was remaining silent, she asked, "Why don't you ask around and see if anyone else is willing to bring you in with them? They're all nice and approachable."
“阿漓姐，我在这里。”在对方看过来的瞬间，叶眉已经恢复了原本温柔的表情，朝她招手道。
"Ye Li, I'm here." By the time Ye Li looked over, Ye Mei had already restored her usual gentle expression and was waving at them.
“阿漓宝贝！”叶明将公文包递给了一旁的管家，上前给了女儿一个拥抱，随后上下打量她一会，蹙了蹙眉，“你这丫头，怎么我才出门几天，就瘦成了这样？”

"My baby Ye Li!" Ye Ming handed his briefcase to the butler at the side and then stepped forward to give his daughter a hug. After scanning her from head to toe, he frowned and asked, "Ye Li, I've only been away for a few days. Why have you lost so much weight?"
“阿漓宝贝，你好好休息，这件事就交给哥哥们去查，一定不会让你白受了委屈，不要再想不开了好吗？有什么事情就告诉哥哥，但凡敢有人再说你半分，哥哥势必要让他后悔来到这个世界！”老三叶枫摸了摸妹妹的头，安抚着保证道。

"Baby Li, rest well. Leave this matter to me and your brothers to investigate. I'll make sure you won't suffer for nothing. Don't be upset about it anymore, alright? If there's anything, just tell us about it. If anyone dares to criticize you again, I'll make sure he regrets being born in this world!" the third brother Ye Feng comforted his younger sister reassuringly while stroking her head.
“阿漓没受伤吧？那两个人是谁，查到了吗？”叶洛抬了抬手，制止了高层的话，阴沉的问道。
"Li isn't hurt, is she? Did you find out who those two people are?" Ye Luo questioned sternly as he raised his hand to make the senior executive pause in his speech.
“阿漓说的也是，不过我也只是提议一下而已，来我给你介绍个人，你肯定不认识。”
"Ye Li, you're right too but I'm just making a suggestion. Let me introduce you to someone, you definitely don't know who she is."
“阿漓都不介意，哥你介意什么啊，我可是经过阿漓同意的！而且今儿个是阿漓主动要跟我来鱼庄吃的饭！”他颇有些炫耀的语气。

"Ye Luo, why are you so bothered when Ye Li doesn't mind at all? I got her permission prior to this! Besides, Ye Li suggested that we have lunch at the fish restaurant today!" he said, seemingly trying to show off.
“阿漓，你不要为难，哥哥们知道错了，不应该逼你，你不要有压力。”叶旬担忧的看着突然转变的妹妹，总感觉这次自杀之后，妹妹的性格变了。

"Li Li, don't feel conflicted. We know that we're at fault for forcing you. Don't feel pressurized," Ye Xun said, looking worriedly at his younger sister who had a sudden change in attitude. He felt that her personality had changed after she tried to commit suicide.
“阿漓，你不要在逞强了好吗？你告诉我，是不是他在逼你，你才会无奈说出这种话！我知道你不会是那样的人！”于向阳看向徐凤年，怀疑道。

"Li, stop trying to put on a brave front, will you? Tell me, did he force you into saying these things helplessly against your own will!?! I know you're not like that!" Yu Xiangyang said apprehensively, glancing at Xu Fengnian.
“阿漓，你先跟着她们玩，我们还有点事，就不陪你了，等宴会结束，给我电话，哥过来接你知道吗？”叶洛几兄弟看着大家纷纷走了出去，走到自家妹妹面前道。

"Ye Li, go hang out with them first. I still have something to do here, I won't accompany you. After the gathering is over, call me and I'll come pick you up, got it?" said Ye Luo who walked towards Ye Li after seeing that everyone had left.
“阿漓，你到底怎么了？哪里不舒服告诉哥哥们好吗？”
"Li, what's wrong with you? If you're feeling unwell, tell us, okay?"
“阿漓，你终于醒了！”
"Li, you've finally come to!"
“阿漓，你，你认真的？没开玩笑？”叶父有些不太确定的看向女儿。
"Ye Li, are you serious? Are you not joking?" Ye Ming asked, looking at his daughter with uncertainty.
“阿漓，凤年。”叶洛咳嗽了一声。
"Li, Fengniang," Ye Luo said with a cough.
“阿漓，对不起，哥哥没想到他会这样对你。”叶枫猩红着一双眼，要不是他给自家妹妹介绍了于向阳，她也不会喜欢上他，最后被伤到这种境地。

"Li, I'm sorry, I never thought he would treat you that way," Ye Feng said with bloodshot eyes. If he hadn't introduced Yu Xiangyang to his younger sister, she wouldn't have fallen in love with him and ended up getting hurt to such an extent.
“阿漓，快过来。”叶旬刚去国外演讲回来，都好几天没见自家妹妹了，这会儿看她被这群人围攻，又是生气，又是心疼，赶忙招了招手。

"Ye Li, come here quickly." Ye Xun had just returned from making a speech overseas and it had been a few days since he saw his younger sister. Seeing that she had been surrounded and bullied, he was infuriated and heartbroken. He hurriedly waved at her.
“阿漓，我回校了，等会中午带你吃饭！”
"Ye Li, I'm back in school. I'll take you out for lunch at noon!"
“阿漓，这到底是怎么回事？”老爷子不相信叶漓会是那样的人，这个孩子他从小看着长大的，虽然说这些年来生疏了不少，但是怎么也不相信，自己疼爱的孩子，会做出这样的事情。

"Ye Li, what's going on?" Xu Fengnian's grandfather asked, not believing that she was such a person. He had watched her grow up since she was a child. Although they had grown distant from each other, he did not believe that the child whom he doted on would do such a thing.
“阿，阿漓，我不是故意的...”他一副认错的姿态。
"Ye Li, I didn't mean to..." he said apologetically.
“难怪连二小姐都不知道，啧啧。”
"No wonder she doesn't even know Miss Xu Yuan, tsk tsk."
“难道是我看错了？”秦柔柳叶眉微皱，觉得自己应该是想多了。
"Were my eyes playing tricks on me?" Qin Rou muttered with a frown, feeling that she should have thought too much.
“非非，以后你离这种女的可要远一点，以免被带坏。”
"Meng Fei, from now on, stay away from such girls, lest you get led astray."
“额？姑妈都那样说了，肯定就是了。”徐倩不太明白哥哥这话什么意思，摸不着头脑的道。
"Huh? Since Aunt has said so, it must be the case." Xu Qian said in puzzlement, unable to figure out what her brother meant.
【热！枫神&心若向阳，昔日好兄弟反目当街动手！】
"Hot topic! Best Buddies God Feng and Beloved Xiangyang Turn Against Each Other And Fight On The Street!"
一下就将这简短的表情顶在了最上面。
The simple emoji made it to the top of the tweets.
一个叶家她们就已经惹不起，现在又来一个徐家。
They could not afford to provoke the Ye Family. To make matters worse, the Xu Family was now involved too.
一个同徐家继承人一般的存在，站在帝都顶端的王者！
Just like the successor of the Xu Family, he was a powerhouse who was above all in the capital!
一个是娱乐圈当红大明星，一个是偶像剧男神，随便一个出一点事情，都会在网络上引起风浪的两个人，突然动起了手，大家自然是十分震惊。

One was a famous celebrity in the entertainment industry while the other was a popular idol who often starred in idol dramas. Any incident that they were involved in would cause a huge uproar on the internet. Yet, both of them got into a fight. Everyone would naturally be astonished.
一副众星捧月的模样。
She seemed to be the center of attention.
一副拒绝嫌恶的表情。
Their expressions were full of disgust and repulsion.
一双仿佛星辰大海的蓝色眼睛更是让人艳羡不已。
Her beautiful blue eyes that resembled the starry ocean, were extremely enviable.
一口一个凤年，还真把自己当回事。
'You keep calling him by his name, do you really think you're somebody?'
一向以温柔出名的徐夫人，这会儿竟一脸冰冷的看着她们。
Mrs. Xu, who had always been known for her gentleness, actually stared at them with a hostile expression.
一向走到哪里都是众星捧月的少年，这会儿却充满了挫败感。
Xu Han, who had always been the center of attention, was extremely dejected and frustrated at this moment.
一旁同样打扮精致的女生开口道：“ys的晚礼服不便宜吧，眉儿你确定要在这里买吗？我惹我爸爸生气了，他这段时间给我的零花钱少的可怜，我肯定买不起这些礼服。”

Another girl beside her, who was dolled up exquisitely as well, said, "The gowns designed by this label don't come cheap. Ye Mei, are you sure you want to buy one here? Recently, I made my daddy angry and he's been cutting my allowance. I definitely can't afford to buy these gowns now."
一旁的两个女生赶忙看她：“是啊，眉儿，是不是卡有问题了，你去查查？”
The two girls at the side hurriedly looked at her. "Yeah, Ye Mei, is there something wrong with the card? Why don't you check it?"
一旁的叶眉见此场景，眸光一闪，无奈的道：“同学你别生气，我姐姐落水之后，脾气就有些不太好，她平时其实不是这样的。”

Standing at the side, Ye Mei's eyes glistened when she saw the scene and she said helplessly, "Schoolmate, don't be angry. Ever since my sister fell into the water, she has been hot-tempered. She isn't usually like this."
一旁的徐倩也没注意到他的神情，还在自顾自的说：“没想到我刚回来就见到未来的嫂子，真是运气太好了吧，哥哥，我一定要进你们学校，到时候肯定有伴。”

Standing at the side, Xu Qian did not notice his expression and continued to rattle on and on. "I didn't expect to see my future cousin-in-law as soon as I returned. I'm really lucky. Xu Han, I must get enrolled in your school. I'll definitely have friends then."
一旁的王丽说：“是不是偶像包场的事情被传播出去了，咱们学校也只有他才有这样的影响力吧？”
At the side, Wang Li asked, "Did word about our idol booking the entire restaurant spread? He's probably the only one in school who has such an influence, right?"
一旁被告状的几个女人，刚从震惊中回过神来，就接触到了徐夫人移过来的目光。
The women who had been accused immediately met the gaze of Mrs. Xu as soon as they recovered from the shock.
一旦没有了这些人帮忙，他于向阳，什么都不是。
Once they stopped helping him, he, Yu Xiangyang, would be nothing.
一早上她就收到了ys那边发来的道歉，自然也看到了叶眉和ys昨晚上发生的事情。
Brightly early in the morning, Ye Li received an apology from YS Fashion and had naturally seen the confrontation between Ye Mei and YS Fashion on Twitter last night.
一点也不像是二十岁的人该有的样子。
She did not seem like a twenty-year-old at all.
一片祥和。
Everything seemed peaceful.
一番发泄之后，她安静了下来。
After venting her anger, she quietened down.
一百万，属实有些多了。
1 million yuan was indeed a lot.
一直对绯闻一事沉默的枫神终于发了一条微博。
一直觉得，只要自己比叶漓优秀，比她乖巧，就能讨徐凤年的喜欢，能将叶漓的从他身边挤开。
She had always thought that as long as she was better than Ye Li, and was more obedient than her, she would be able to win Xu Fengnian's heart and take him away from her.
一瞬间，他感觉两人之间刚靠近一点的距离又远了。
All of a sudden, he felt that the distance between them seemed to have increased again even though they had just gotten closer.
一瞬间，她感觉自己不是孤军奋战。
All of a sudden, she felt that she was not fighting alone.
一瞬间，徐媛都有种她们感情很好的感觉。
For a moment, Xu Yuan felt that they were on good terms with each other.
一瞬间，想要找茬的女生都怂了。
All of a sudden, the girls who wanted to create trouble for Ye Li chickened out.
一穿着红色礼服的女人正被一群名媛围在中央。
一群女生闻言，顿时怒红了眼：“我们说的本来就是事实，你有什么资格配得上我们枫神，要不是看在你是同班同学的面子上，我们不对你动手，但是你要是再这么不识抬举，就别怪我们不客气了！”

Hearing her words, the girls flew into a rage. "We're just stating facts. Who are you to be worthy of our idol Ye Feng? If not for the fact that you're our classmate, we would have hit you. However, if you continue being so ignorant and unruly, don't blame us for being brutal!"
一群男生小声的议论起来。
The group of boys began discussing amongst themselves softly.
一群穿着改造过校服的精神小伙，正拿着手机不断的找寻猎物。
Dressed in modified uniform, the group of energetic young men were continuously searching for prey.
一群自称为眉宝粉丝的人纷纷来指责起了叶漓。
Ye Mei's fans quickly began to accuse and berate Ye Li.
一股子淡淡的奶香飘过，徐晗挑了挑眉，目光落到了自己前面扎着高马尾的少女身上。
A faint scent of milk wafted past and Xu Han raised his brows to look at the young girl in front of him who had her hair up in a ponytail.
一般人去参加聚会，都是要怎么夸张怎么耀眼怎么来，可叶漓却知道，这样的人太多了，反倒是让人视觉疲劳，穿着简约清新一点的，反而能更容易抓住人的眼球，而且她现在的身材也不适合穿那么繁重的礼服，更显臃肿。

Usually, most people would dress in exaggerated outfits in order to be striking and stand out from the other guests at a gathering but Ye Li knew that there were too many people who would do that. Hence, it would seem too overwhelming as many would dress in the same style. If she dressed in a simpler, fresh-looking outfit, she would be more eye-catching. Besides, her figure now was not suitable for an opulent gown as that would make her look chubbier.
一行三人上了车。
The trio got inside the car.
一行三人赶忙往校外敢去。
The trio immediately rushed out of school.
一行人坐下。
The group took their seats.
一行人惊吓回头，就见三个穿着西装，气势庞大的男人，正一脸阴冷的盯着她们的方向。
They turned around in astonishment, only to see three domineering men in suits who were glaring at them hostilely.
一行人赶忙将那女生送去了校医室。
Everyone rushed over and sent the girl to the school medic.
一身白嫩如同婴儿一样的肌肤，在灯光的照射之下白到发光。
She had supple and tender skin that was like that of a baby's and under bright light, it was fair and almost glowing.
一辆听说被那个第一世家的三少爷买去当了座驾。
Rumor had it that one was purchased by the Third Young Master of the wealthiest family in Beijing.
一道凌厉的目光带着巨大的压迫落到了于向阳的身上。
A menacing gaze with a massive sense of oppression landed on Yu Xiangyang's body.
一顿饭，在众人各怀心思中度过。
Each having their own thoughts, everyone sat through the meal.
三个兄弟你一言我一语的劝慰起来。
The three brothers began to comfort her and persuade her.
三个哥哥却没有注意到她的脸上变换的表情，因为刚刚叶漓那番话，都让三个男人几乎失去理智。
However, Ye Li's brothers did not notice the change in her expression because the three of them had almost lost their rationality after hearing her words just now.
三个哥哥离开之后，叶漓躺了回去。
Ye Li lied down again after her three brothers left.
三个哥哥都很优秀，都是人中之龙，可偏偏就她叶漓，干啥啥不行，犯错第一名。

三个男人对视一眼，都从彼此眼中看到了相同的想法。

三个男人看着她脸上翻腾的喜色，着实是觉得怪异。
The three men found her joyous expression to be extremely bizarre.
三个阴沉着一张脸站着的男人在看到女孩初醒的瞬间，一下围了上去，表情如出一辙的担忧。
Three men with somber expressions immediately crowded the girl immediately after they saw her regaining consciousness. They all looked extremely worried.
三人倒抽了一口气。
The three men gasped.
三人对视一眼，惊愕过后就是惊喜，“阿漓，你真的不怪我们了吗？”
The three of them looked at each other in shock, after which they said with some surprise and joy, "Li, do you really not blame us anymore?"
三人是同桌，平时玩的也好。

三人更是震惊，“你的意思是，你愿意跟徐凤年订婚？”
Greatly taken aback, the three of them asked, "Do you mean that you're willing to get engaged to Xu Fengnian?"
三人脸色铁青。
The three of them turned pale.
三人进了庄园，刚进大厅，就看见了沙发上坐着徐凤年和叶漓两人。
The three of them entered the manor and as soon as they stepped into the hall, they saw Xu Fengnian and Ye Li seated on the couch.
三人闻言，惊愕的看她。
The three men looked at her in shock after hearing their words.
三人闻言，顿时变脸：“什么？同学们嘲笑你？他们为什么要嘲笑你？谁敢嘲笑我们叶家的小公主，不想活了？”

Upon hearing her words, their expressions changed and they asked, "What? Your classmates mocked you? Why did they mock you? Who has the audacity to mock the little princess of the Ye Family? Do they have a death wish?"

The three brothers looked at each other with peculiar gazes while Ye Luo said in a low voice, "You don't have to. Li is still very weak now, don't go upstairs to disturb her. If you have anything to tell her, save it for tomorrow. We have some matters to attend to so we're going out now. Inform us if Li wakes up."

On the other hand, her third brother was obviously busy as he was a famous celebrity. Apart from going to school, the rest of the time in his schedule would be fully lined up with activities.

Ye Feng: "Yes! My little princess!"
上上下下打量她一眼之后，眼中都带了几分鄙夷之色。

上辈子哥哥们也没少主动找她吃饭，但是叶漓怕被人看到引起骚动造成麻烦所以每次都拒绝了。

In her previous life, she hated her three brothers and father the most for forcing her to marry Xu Fengnian and thus ruining her lifelong happiness. Hence, she had always born a grudge against them.

上辈子的叶漓就很喜欢她的性子，甚至还曾希望过，要秦柔是她的妈妈就好了。
In her previous life, Ye Li liked her temperament, and even wished that Qin Rou was her mother.
上辈子的她沉默寡言的，没什么存在感，却也很少会被惩罚。

上辈子的自己，因为她，受了多少网络暴力和攻击。
In her previous life, she had suffered a lot of criticism on the Internet and was a victim of cyber bullying because of Ye Mei.
上辈子自己好歹也嫁入了徐家那么多年，对这些还是知道一些的。
In her previous life, she had been married to Xu Fengnian for a long time and hence, she knew the preferences of his family members.

After she committed suicide in her previous life, the Xu Family had also invited her over.

上面早已提醒，若是接到金色邀请函，那便是徐家的重点接待对象。
In the morning, they had already received instructions and were informed that guests with golden invitation cards were VIP guests of the Xu Family.
下一秒，她的眼睛猛地睁开，扩散的瞳孔在一瞬间收缩，脸上还带着愤怒和惊恐绝望。
In the next second, she opened her eyes abruptly and her dilated pupils constricted immediately while infuriation, panic, and despair were written all over her face.

下面只有一条微博，转发评论都上百万，这样的数据堪称恐怖！

不仅是公司资源少的可怜，其他的公司也不愿意聘请他去拍广告，眼看着一个个的节目被别的人取而代之，于向阳是真的慌了。

Not only did he lose many of his resources, the other companies did not want to hire him for advertisements either. Yu Xiangyang began to panic as he watched himself get replaced by other artistes for the filming of variety programs.

不同于叶眉的骨感美，她给人的感觉更惊艳耐看。
Unlike Ye Mei who was beautifully thin, she looked stunning and her beautiful charm was long-lasting.
不在乎这些身外之物的叶漓当时也没放在心上，反正她想要钱也是随随时时就能到手，便忘了这件事。

Ye Li, who did not care much about material possessions, did not take the matter to hard. Anyway, it was a piece of cake for her to get money from her family. Hence, she put that incident behind her and forgot about it.

不过也因这件事，徐家被分割成了两派。

不过就是把你这上不得台面的身份说了出来而已，就装不下去了？

不过徐凤年也太直了吧，难怪这么多年下来，都没听说过他交过女朋友。
'However, Xu Fengnian is a little too blunt, isn't he? No wonder I've never heard of him having a girlfriend throughout all these years.'
不过没关系。

However, both Ye Mei and Qin Rou were smart enough to know how to swallow their pride, stay humble, behave themselves and not cause any trouble. Hence, over the years, they managed to get into the good books of many people.

不过那男人对自家小妹好的很，阿漓跟着他，叶洛心里也放心了于是沉声道：“既然他处理了，你们就继续观察吧，对了，那些谣言查到是谁传播出去的吗？”

However Xu Fengnian treated Ye Li very well and Ye Luo was at ease to hear that she was with him. "Since he has settled it, you guys continue to observe. By the way, did you find out who spread those rumors?"
不过，大多都是来骂她的。

与此同时，一栋欧式豪华风格的别墅二楼，书房内，穿着白色衬衫的男人正坐在书桌前工作，他脖颈处的纽扣微微解开了两颗，从作者这个角度隐约可见的能看到几分肌肉线条，给男人增添了几分性感。

At the same time, there was a man seated in front of a desk in the study on the second floor of a European-style luxurious mansion, and doing some work. Having gained some benefits and realizing how wealthy Ye Mei was, they said many things to please her, causing Ye Mei to feel smug and proud.

久而久之，几乎所有人都已经忘了她这人的存在。

之后一家人的关系都降到了冰点。

之后叶家出了事情，这些事情才缓缓露出水面。

之后她对学校校草排行榜上第二名的于向阳纠缠不清之后，更是被全校人所嫌恶，那评论区的评论，都被癞蛤蟆想吃天鹅肉给刷屏了。

几个女人都吓傻了，纷纷倒退了几步，一脸苍白的摇着头：“不，不是这样的徐夫人，您听我们解释，我们不知道叶漓是这个身份。”

Shocked speechless, the women took a few steps back one after another and shook their heads as they turned pale. "No, that's not what happened, Mrs. Xu, listen to my explanation. We didn't know Ye Li's identity before this."
几个女生吓得一哆嗦，眼泪都出来了：“对，对不起，我们真不知道会是这样....”
The girls were frightened to the point of shuddering and tearing up. "We're sorry, we really didn't know that this would happen..."
几个女生惶恐极了。
The girls panicked.
几个少年手一抖，手中的手机差点就掉在了地上。
The hands of the few young men trembled and they almost dropped their mobile phones.
几乎是人人艳羡的代表人物，男人心中的清纯女神。
She was almost the subject of everyone's envy and the pure and innocent goddess in the hearts of all the guys.
几人一走，温雅和徐媛的脸色就彻底阴沉了下去。
After they left, Wen Ya and Xu Yuan's faces turned completely sullen.
几人刚进屋，叶家三兄弟也回来了。
Shortly after they entered, the three sons of the Ye Family returned too.
几人对视一眼，更为愤怒：“你不认识我们没关系，反正我们认识你就对了，不要脸的贱人，说，你到底是怎么让我们枫神陪你吃饭的，还发了那样的微博，你很嚣张啊，我看你是想死是吗？”

The few of them looked at each other, and got even angrier. "It's okay if you don't know me. Anyway, I know who you are. You shameless bitch, tell us, just how did you get Ye Feng to have lunch with you? You even tweeted something so atrocious. You're very haughty, aren't you? You've got a death wish, huh?"
几人对视一眼，都从对方眼中看到恼怒：“你别给脸不要脸！”
When the few of them looked at each other, they could see the anger in each other's eyes. "We're saving you face. Don't go overboard!"
几人想到这里，表情都有些不悦起来。
At the thought of this, the few of them immediately looked displeased.
几人愣住，随后对视一眼，都从对方眼中看到了相同的担忧之色，戴着眼镜穿着白衬衫十分精明的男人严肃的开口：“你这是说什么傻话，你怎么可能会死呢？”

The few men were stunned, after which they looked at each other and saw the looks of worry in one another's eyes. The smart man who was wearing glasses and a white shirt chastised sternly, "What silly things are you saying? How can you be dead?"
几人抬起的脚在空中一顿。
The few of them paused in their tracks, their legs in midair.
几人点了点头，跟了上去。
The few of them nodded and followed her.
几人的瞳孔一深。
Their pupils darkened again.
几人还没反应过来，一道阴沉的男声就从他们身后响起：“你们在干什么！”
Before they could even react, a low and gloomy male voice sounded from behind them. "What are you people doing!?!"
凭什么叶漓能够参加这种高档聚会，自己却要在家坐着。
'Why must I stay at home while Ye Li gets to attend such a high-class social gathering?'
凭什么叶漓这么差劲的人都能得到他的宠爱，而自己不能?
'Why can such a lousy person like Ye Li win his heart but I can't?'
凭什么啊！到底凭什么，明明都是有血缘关系的，自己和她的待遇却是天差地别！
'Why!?! Just why am I treated so differently from her even though we're all related by blood!?!'
出乎意料的合身。
To her surprise, it fit her rather well.
刚刚他们那个举动，无疑得罪了人。
They had undoubtedly offended her just now.
刚刚看到的时候，先是有些惊讶，然后就是惊喜开心。
When she saw them, she was first astonished, before feeling delighted.
刚刚自己没听错的话，这个女孩叫了凤年哥哥几个字？
'If I heard correctly, this girl mentioned Xu Fengnian's name.'
刚刚还听到她叫哥哥，难不成这女孩就是传说中的叶家那位小公主？
They had also heard her calling them her brothers. Could it be that she's the little princess of the Ye Family?
刚刚还对她们大打出手的叶漓，突然就扑进了男人的怀中，“老公，她们欺负我！”
Ye Li, who had just been trying to attack them, suddenly leaped into his arms and exclaimed, "Hubby, they're bullying me!"
刚回学校，就被程艳阴沉着脸叫去了办公室。
As soon as she returned to school, Cheng Yan called her to the office with a gloomy expression.
刚要说什么，一旁的王丽忍不住先开口了：“你不是废话吗？这学校的大明星除了咱们一心向阳还有谁，你不会以为是请你吃饭的人包的场吧，哈哈，真的是笑死我了，你知道鱼庄包场要多少钱吗？”

Just as she was going to say something, Wang Li, who was beside her, couldn't help but interject, "Aren't you asking a redundant question? The only celebrity who goes to our school is Xiangyang. Surely you don't think that the person who asked you out for lunch is the one who booked the restaurant, do you? Haha, what a joke. Do you know how much it costs to book the entire fish restaurant?"
刚转身准备走，就听见两个女生阴沉的声音。
Just as she turned around and was ready to leave, she heard the low and sinister voices of two girls.
别说关注了，这餐桌上的人，几乎没有人将目光落到过她的身上。
Almost no one at the dining table even looked at her, let alone pay attention to her.
别说是外人，就连叶眉也是一脸惊愕的看着叶漓。
Even Ye Mei was looking at Ye Li in exasperation, let alone the outsiders.
到了最后才明白，年纪轻轻就出了意外的哥哥们，才是真正关心她的人。
She only realized in the end that her brothers who had gotten into an accident at a young age, were the ones who really cared about her.
到了最后，才狠狠反击！
She launched a fierce retaliation at the end!
到底发生了什么，叶漓怎么又变成了这样。
'What exactly happened? Why did Ye Li become like this?'
到底是何方神圣给他们总裁大人发消息啊，竟然能让雷厉风行的大总裁发呆。
'Who sent the CEO a message? He or she actually managed to make the austere and domineering CEO space out.'
到时候他会怎么想？
If she were to do that, what would he think of her?
到时候可能会举办一场文艺汇演，但是这件事却是保密的，就是为了考验学生们的急场应付能力。

The entertainment company would probably hold a cultural arts performance when the time comes but the matter was kept confidential for the sake of testing the students' ability to cope with an impromptu situation.
到时候就已经不是他们两人之间的事情，而是已经上升到了两个家族之间的恩怨。
By then, it would no longer be just a matter between the two of them. It would turn into a feud between the two families.
到时候就算是惊动了徐家的人，他们只要将所有的错推到她的身上，谁又知道？
Even if the Xu Family was alarmed, they could just put the blame on Ye Li. Who would know?
前段时间大家就听说徐家和叶家有可能要结亲了。
Previously, everyone had already heard that the Xu Family and Ye Family were going to unite over a marriage between their children.
前段时间她跳河自杀一事，闹的沸沸扬扬。
Previously, she caused an uproar when she tried to commit suicide by jumping into the river.
前面开车的司机看到自家总裁这幅失态的场面，愣住了，反应过来的他赶忙追了上去。
The chauffeur froze when he saw his CEO acting out of the ordinary. After being stunned, he reacted and quickly chased after Xu Fengnian.
前面憨厚的司机到这话，还好奇的从后视镜看了叶漓一眼，随后笑着夸赞：“我也觉得挺好看的，精神。”
When the daft chauffeur in front heard those words, he even curiously looked at Ye Li from the rearview mirror, then smiled and praised, "I think you look great too. You look much more energetic."
剩下的同学们都是一副惊魂未定的表情，甚至于大部分都不敢去看叶漓的目光，生怕被她注意到。
The rest of the students were all in a state of shock, even to the point that most of them did not dare to look at Ye Li's eyes, for fear that she would notice them.
办公室一度陷入了寂静，只有孟非掩饰不住的抽泣声。
At one point, the office fell silent and only Meng Fei's weeping could be heard.
动作好似一个小孩。
Her actions were like that of a child's.
势必是那两人先欺负了她，忍无可忍才动了手。

印象中的叶漓，向来都是低着头，只对人露出一个下巴。

即使大家知道不好接触，但是越是这样难以攻略的人，越是有人愿意飞蛾扑火。
Even though everyone knew that it was hard to get along with him, the harder he was to conquer, the more they were willing to try.
即使是看着网上那么多人都在黑她骂她，可叶眉依旧笑不出来。
Ye Mei could not bring herself to smile, despite seeing that a large number of netizens were scolding Ye Li on the Internet.
即使身材微胖，也并没有拉低她的颜值。
Even though she was chubby, it did not affect her beauty.
却不知道，他向来靠的，都是那些被他表面所欺骗的富二代，一步步的被人捧上来的高度。
However, they did not know that he had always been relying on the wealthy heirs who were fooled by his appearance, to attain the fame that he had.
却从没有人叫过她一声二小姐。
However, no one had ever addressed her as 'Second Missy'.
却怎么也没想到，叶眉竟然是小三的女儿！
He did not expect Ye Mei to be the daughter of a mistress!
却没想到，刚进来，就听到了叶眉的话。
He did not expect to hear those words from Ye Mei as soon as he entered.
却没想到，这样一个表面看起来文质彬彬的少年，背地里竟然那样欺负自家妹妹。
However, he did not expect that the young man who looked civilized and courteous on the surface, would secretly bully his younger sister behind his back.
却见一穿着西装的男人，正坐在叶漓身边，一手搭在叶漓身后的沙发上，仿佛在宣誓那是他的所有物，一双深不可见的黑眸，正以一种俯视的姿态冷冷的盯着他。
He saw a man in a suit seated right beside Ye Li, with one hand on the couch behind her, as if he was declaring sovereignty. He was glaring at Yu Xiangyang coldly with his pair of dark, deep eyes.
却见女儿一副无所谓的表情，“爸爸，都已经过了，我现在已经不在乎了，你别生气，我知道我不是人民币，做不到人人喜欢，以后我也不会犯傻了。”

However, he realized that Ye Li did not seem bothered at all. "Father, it's all in the past. I don't care anymore. Don't be angry, I know I'm not money and I can't make everyone happy. From now on, I won't be silly anymore."
压根就忘了，人家刚来时，他们的态度。
They had completely forgotten about the attitudes that they showed when Ye Li had just walked over.
原本只是听说，还不确定。

原本她还不知道怎么教训叶漓的。

原本对于自家弟弟这个朋友，他是一直以礼相待。
He initially treated Yu Xiangyang cordially like he was his younger brother.
原本快两百万粉丝的她，突然就掉了好几十万。
Ye Mei, who initially had almost 2 million followers, suddenly lost hundreds of thousands of them.
原本才二十个粉丝的她，就这一会的功夫，就多了好几万。
She initially only had 20-odd fans but in the blink of an eye, she now had tens of thousands of them.
原本气势汹汹的程艳听到这话，脸色刷的一变，不可置信的看着她：“你，你什么意思，我听不懂你说什么！”

The expression of Cheng Yan, who was initially very aggressive, changed immediately after hearing his words. He looked at her in disbelief and exclaimed, "You... What do you mean? I don't understand what you said!"
原本的骂声逐渐变成了抱歉。
The scoldings, hateful comments and criticism gradually turned into apologies.
原本看着一群女生要欺负她的时候，他还十分生气的。
He was extremely infuriated when he saw the girls who were about to bully her.
原本脸色不大好的她一下看起来就精致了不少，薄薄的刘海儿隐约露出她细长的眉毛，微微上挑的眼尾硬生生的给这张脸增添了几分诱惑，特别是眼角下还有一颗泪痣。

Ye Li, who originally looked sickly, now looked much more exquisite than before. Her thin bangs revealed her long and thin eyebrows, and the slightly upturned corners of her eyes made her look attractive, especially with the mole under the corner of the eye.
原本还有些害怕的他因为妹妹的话，这会儿腰杆子都直了。
Initially, he was afraid but he was extremely confident after hearing Ye Li's reassuring words.
原来不是乱说，而是真的。

原来他们之间是这样的关系。

原来如此，原来如此。

原来是要带叶小姐去吃饭呀。
'Turns out he wants to take Miss Ye out for a meal."
去刷卡的服务员走了过来，脸色却不太好看。
The sales assistant who had gone to process the payment with her card, walked over with a sullen expression.
参加这个聚会的人，都是要有邀请函才能进去的，为了的就是杜绝一些乱七八糟的人混进去。
Only those who had invitations could enter the gathering venue, so as to prevent any dubious people from sneaking in.
又a又飒！

又动了什么歪心思？
'Is she harboring some thoughts?'
又听叶漓这么一说，都惊愕的说不出话。
After hearing Ye Li's words, they were stunned beyond words.

反倒是周围的女孩子们，眼珠子都快黏在了他身上似的。

反倒是，更像仇人....

反应过来的她做出一副害怕的表情，委屈的道：“不是的阿漓姐姐，我也是为了你好才这么说，你怎么能这么凶我？”
After recovering from the shock, she put on a fearful expression and asked aggrievedly, "Sister Li, I was just saying this for your best interests. How can you be so fierce to me?"

发生了这种事情，看当时导师那表情，叶漓不被找麻烦才怪。
'Judging from the severity of the incident and the expression and the expression on the teacher's face at that time, Ye Li must have gotten into trouble.'
口上劝着叶眉，可看向叶漓的目光中，尽是幸灾乐祸！
Although they were persuading Ye Mei, they were looking at Ye Li gloatingly!
口上这么说着，手却已经打开了美颜相机，笑道：“咱们合拍一张照片吧，难得相聚一次。”
Despite saying so, she had already turned on the beauty camera app on her mobile phone and she said smilingly, "Let's take a picture together. It's rare for us to meet."
口中夸赞的十句不离叶漓。

另一个女生故作生气的说：“好呀，眉儿你偏心！”
Pretending to be angry, another girl jested, "Ye Mei, you're so biased!"
另一个满脸淤青，头发凌乱的女孩瑟瑟发抖的瘫在另一边，惊恐的看着这一幕。

On the other hand, Ye Li, who was completely unaware that she had just disrupted the meeting, had already gone downstairs with her schoolbag.
另一边，帝国集团会议室中。

On the other hand, Ye Luo, who was working, received a call from his subordinate.
只剩下了一群年轻人。
The bunch of young people were left behind.
只剩下了开心和温暖。
She was filled with joy and warmth.
只可惜这徐晗来上课那是看心情。

只恨自己瞎了眼，一心只相信叶眉和于向阳这对渣男贱女的话，以至于最后被害到了那样的下场！
She could only blame herself for being blind and believing Yu Xiangyang and Ye Mei, the despicable couple who caused her to end up in that terrible situation!
只是不同的是，徐凤年没有让叶眉得逞过。

只是他们的目光从叶眉身上扫过之后，都好奇的落到了叶漓身上，见是一张陌生人的脸，纷纷疑惑：“那人是谁啊，艺术系又来新人了吗？”
However, after looking away from Ye Mei, they glanced at Ye Li curiously. Feeling bewildered by the fresh face, she asked, "Who's that person? Is there a new student in the Faculty of Arts?"

只是奈何叶眉出来帮忙，那些人才不好对她动手。

只是很久没玩了，若不是所有自己所有账号的密码都一样，她恐怕都记不得了。

只是徐媛毕业了，她还才上大一，这次要不是看到她，都不知道她回来了。
However, Xu Yuan had already graduated while she was Xu Qian was only a freshman-to-be. If she did not see Xu Yuan here, she wouldn't have known about her return.
只是想着秦柔这么关心自己，自己却不顺从着她的话，好像是不太好，所以即使是不喜欢，也装出了一副很满意的模样。
However, she used to comply and pretend that she was pleased with the meals because she felt that it would be inappropriate to defy Qin Rou who had always showed her concern and doted on her.
只是想着自家就这么一个宝贝女儿，自己人都没打过她，却被别人这么欺负，他这心里也是怒火中烧，点头认同道：“行，爸爸就听你的。”

However, as he thought about how no one from his family had ever hit or bullied his precious daughter, his heart was filled with infuriation and he agreed with a nod, "Okay, we'll go ahead with that."
只是母亲的气质很温柔，丝毫没有因为这双眼睛，而让人觉得魅惑。
However, her mother had a gentle temperament and she did not seem sultry because of her eyes.
只是没想到徐晗会拆台，说她欺负人？

Clearly, most of the oppressive tension in the air had eased up.
可话中的意思却变相的告诉大家，叶漓是没见过世面，所以才会这样不知好歹！
However, in other words, she was indirectly telling everyone that Ye Li was acting so callously because she had never been to such major events before.
可谁让她们欺负了他的丫头，那就别怪他不客气了。
However, since they bullied his girl, they shouldn't blame him for being hostile.
可越是这样的学校就越是管得严格。
However, such schools had stricter rules.
可跟在她身后的小姐们就忍不住了：“你谁啊？没见二小姐跟你打招呼吗？怎么就这个态度！”
However, the ladies behind her couldn't hold it back any longer. "Who are you? Can't you see that Miss Xu Yuan is greeting you? What's with that attitude of yours!?!"
可车停了半响，车上也未见有人下车，这让大家不禁有些疑惑。
However, no one alighted from the car even after it had stopped for a while, which made everyone else feel somewhat confused.
可这个没什么记忆的少年，却精准的认出她？
Yet, this young man whom she had a vague impression of, actually managed to recognize her accurately.
可这也改变不了，她之前传出来的那些丑闻。
可这件事距离此时已近过去了八年，又怎会再现？
However, it had been eight years since that incident occurred. Why did this scene appear again?
可这会儿却仿佛什么事情都没发生一样。
However she was acting like nothing happened now.
可这会儿却掩都掩不住，很明显是有什么很开心的事情。
However, he couldn't hide his joy now and he was obviously elated about something.
可这会儿却连看也不想多看一眼。
However, today, they did not want to take another glance at her at all.
可这会儿平淡的像是什么也没发生一般，根本就没将这个称呼放在心上。
'But this time, she's so composed, like nothing had happened. She doesn't take it to heart at all.'
可这会儿看到跟着的几个男人，还是没忍住惊艳。
However, after seeing the few men now, she couldn't help but be amazed.
可这会儿，因为一个叶漓，大家看他的眼神只剩下了冰冷。
However, now everyone looked at him coldly because of Ye Li.
可这对他们来说，却更为反常，不由的担忧对视一眼，作为大哥的叶洛先开了口，“阿漓，让你和徐凤年订婚是我们的不对，以后万不可再做傻事了好不好？”

However, to them, they felt that she was acting out of the ordinary. They couldn't help but look at each other worriedly. The eldest brother, Ye Luo, was the first to speak. "Li, it was wrong of us to make you get engaged to Xu Fengnian back then. Don't do anything stupid in the future again, alright?"
可这幅怪异的表情落到三人眼中，又是一阵疑惑。
However, the three men were confused again when they saw her peculiar expression.
可这是一回事，被叶漓当面说出来就是另一回事了。
However, it was one thing for him to know it himself, and another for Ye Li to spell it out loud.
可这样一个男人，在知道她身份之后，竟然也不像是其他人那样讨好她顺着她，甚至对她嗤之以鼻，冷漠相对。
However, after discovering her identity, a man like him actually despised her and treated her coldly with disdain and contempt, unlike others who tried hard to please her and get into her good books.
可这裙子的价格，可让少千金小姐都不敢靠近。
However, the hefty price tag of the dress was far beyond the reach of many daughters of wealthy families too.
可这话一出，孟父直接腿一软，瘫坐在了地上。
However, as soon as he said that, Meng Fei's father's legs turned into jelly and he sat on the ground.
可这辈子，叶漓再也不愿意为了别人的眼光而束缚自己！
However, in this life, Ye Li did not want to restrain herself because of the opinions of others anymore!
可这辈子，看着于向阳这幅表情，她的心里只剩下恶心。
However, in this life, Ye Li felt nothing but disgust when she saw Yu Xiangyang's expression.
可那是神一样的人物，出现在学校的场次一只手也数的过来，更不可能说会请人吃饭了。
He was a godlike figure and he rarely appeared in school, let alone treat someone to a meal.
可那样太奇怪了，重生也太奇怪了，她必须得忍住，直到确定一切都是真实存在为止。
However, that was too strange, just like her rebirth. She had to hang on until she was certain that everything was real.
可靠关系什么的，也怪不好意思的。
She was too embarrassed to rely on her connections to get into Beijing University.
叶家三兄弟：“....”
The Ye brothers remained silent too.
叶家人宠叶漓她也是知道的，若是她不愿意的话，叶家人肯定不会逼她。
She knew that the Ye Family doted on Ye Li greatly and they would never force her to do anything she disliked.
叶家夫人生下唯一的女儿没多久就去世了。
He knew that Ye Li's mother passed away shortly after she gave birth to Ye Li, the one and only daughter of the Ye Family.
叶家连续三个儿子，想女儿都要想疯了，孩子出生的时候，整个帝都的豪门贵族都被邀请了过去庆祝，各大媒体连续一个月报道此事，热度一度超过娱乐圈各种大牌明星，那个才出生就霸榜了各大影视屏幕的女孩，校长至今还记忆犹新。

Having had three sons in a row, the Ye Family was obsessed with having a daughter. When Ye Li was born, all the wealthy families of Beijing were invited to celebrate her birth. The various major media agencies continuously reported about that matter for an entire month and at one point, it was an even more popular topic than other major celebrities. Even till now, the principal still clearly remembered the girl who had dominated the major television screens shortly after she was born.
叶旬同叶枫也是一脸紧张又小心翼翼的看着她。
Ye Xun and Ye Feng also looked at her nervously and cautiously.
叶旬和叶枫一下就闭了嘴，点了点，一步三回头的和她告别。
Ye Xun and Ye Feng immediately kept quiet and nodded. While leaving, they continuously turned around to look at her.
叶旬点了点头，与他如出一辙的表情。
Ye Xun nodded with the same expression as him.
叶旬蹙着眉头：“阿漓都说了，那些话是从他们班上传出去，但是她们班上，只有叶眉知道这件事。”
With a frown, Ye Xun said, "Li has already said that those rumors were spread from her class. In their class, no one except Ye Mei knows about this."
叶明又是一愣，惊愕的看她：“真的？你想开了？”
Once again stunned to hear her words, he looked at her in astonishment. "Really? Have you figured it out and gotten over it?"
叶明意外的看他一眼，“那你笑的这么荡漾？”
Looking at him in surprise, Ye Ming asked, "Why are you smiling so radiantly then?"
叶明注意到他的目光，挑了挑眉，随后得意一笑。
Noticing the look in his eyes, Ye Ming raised his brows and smiled smugly.
叶明见女儿答应，心里也高兴，点头说道：“行，到时候我让你阿姨把请帖给你。”
Ye Ming was glad to see that his daughter had agreed. He nodded and said, "Sure, I'll ask Mrs. Xu to send the invitations to you when the time comes."
叶明闻言，又是欣慰，又是心疼，欣慰女儿的突然懂事，心疼她到底是经历了什么，才会变得这么乖巧。

Ye Ming was both heartened and distressed to hear her words. He was heartened and gratified to see that she had suddenly become sensible but he was also distressed as he wondered just what she had gone through that made her become so obedient.
叶明闻言，嗤了一声，理也不理就转身走了。
Ye Ming sneered when he heard that and turned around to leave without turning around.
叶明闻言，脸色一沉，随后担忧的看向女儿。
Upon hearing his words, Ye Ming's face turned sullen and he then looked at his daughter worriedly.
叶枫一个哆嗦，突然觉得自己玩的有些大了。
Ye Feng shuddered and suddenly felt that he had gone overboard.
叶枫一听这话，顿时暗骂无耻：“平时那些名媛主动约你吃饭，也没见你同意，这会儿说什么一个人吃饭没胃口，呸！虚伪。”

Finding him to be shameless, Ye Feng immediately rebuked, "I didn't see you saying yes to those socialites who ask you out for meals. Why are you complaining about having no appetite because you're eating alone? Psht! What a hypocrite."
叶枫一脸惊喜：“真的吗？你这样想就太好了！”
Ye Feng exclaimed in surprise, "Really? It's great that you think that way!"
叶枫不敢置信，毕竟于向阳和他是好兄弟，关系也非常不错，平时虽然话不多，但是于向阳一向彬彬有礼，和谁都相处的好，怎，怎么会私下那样说他的妹妹？

Ye Feng was in disbelief. After all, Yu Xiangyang was his close friend and they were on extremely good terms with each other. Although Yu Xiangyang was not talkative, he had always been a well-mannered person who was polite and courteous to everyone. Why would he say that about Ye Li in private?
叶枫哈哈一笑：“这算什么，你是没看见应援的时候，那人才是人山人海，下次哥哥应援会，带你去玩。”他有些期待的道。
Ye Feng laughed and said, "This is nothing, you haven't seen the enormous crowds of fans who would show up to support me at events. Next time, I'll take you along with me," he said expectantly.
叶枫嗤笑一声，掏出了手机拨打电话：“帮我查一下孟氏集团，市值多少，哦？就这？收购了吧。”他简短的说了几句，便挂断了电话。
Ye Feng sneered and took out his mobile phone to make a call. "Help me check up on the market value of Meng Group. Oh? That's it? Acquire it then," he said briefly before hanging up.
叶枫带着墨镜刚下车，就收到了妹妹发来的表情，他顿时像是打了鸡血一般，吩咐一旁的经纪人道：“给我把鱼庄包场，等会儿我要带我家公主去吃饭。”

As soon as Ye Feng alighted from the car, he received a message of the emoticon that Ye Li sent him. He immediately instructed his manager, "Book the entire fish restaurant. I'm going to take my little princess for lunch later."
叶枫抬头看了一眼，就愣了。
Ye Feng was stunned right after he looked up. '
叶枫摘下墨镜，一双带着几分灰的眸子扫过众人，见大家激动的叫着自己的名字，抬手挥了挥，一笑。
Ye Feng removed his shades and looked at the crowd with grayish eyes. Seeing that everyone was calling his name excitedly, he waved his hand and smiled.
叶枫有些疑惑，“二哥，刚刚你为什么不让我问，眉儿和阿漓同个班级，她应该知道才对，虽然这件事一直保密，但是保不准会被谁透露出去也不是没这个可能。”

Feeling a little confused, Ye Feng asked, "Second Brother, why didn't you let me ask Mei just now? Since Mei is in the same grade as Li, she should be well aware. Although this matter has been kept secret, it is possible that someone has leaked it."
叶枫沉默了。
Ye Feng was silent.
叶枫没有丝毫的回应。
Ye Feng did not respond at all.
叶枫没看她，看到叶漓之后，直接走了过去，担忧的道：“阿漓，他们是不是欺负你了？”
Ye Feng did not look at her. Instead, he walked towards Ye Li as soon as he saw her. He asked worriedly, "Ye Li, did they bully you?"
叶枫点了点头。
Ye Feng nodded.
叶枫点了点头：“好。”
Ye Feng nodded. "Okay."
叶枫的影响力太大，这才是他最担忧的。
Ye Feng was very influential and that was what the principal was worried about.
叶枫看到了孟非包扎的伤口，脸色顿时变得担忧起来，就在孟非以为他是担心自己的时候，就听他突然问：“阿漓，你和她打架了？伤到哪里没有，快给哥看看。”说罢，就紧张的上下检查了起来。

When Ye Feng saw Meng Fei's bandaged hand, he immediately looked worried. Just as Meng Fei thought that he was being worried about her, she suddenly heard him say, "Ye Li, did you get into a fight with her? Did you hurt yourself? Hurry and let me take a look at you." After saying that, he began checking her nervously.
叶枫眼神有些复杂的看他。
Ye Feng looked at him with a complicated gaze.
叶枫硬着头皮道：“就是一些不喜欢阿漓的话。”
Ye Feng bit the bullet and answered, "Just some things about him not liking Ye Li."
叶枫脸色薄怒，“这件事还没确定，那些人怎么会知道？”
Ye Feng's face was full of anger. "This matter hasn't been confirmed yet. How would those people know?"
叶枫还想说什么，可叶洛的电话打了过来。
Ye Feng wanted to say something but he received a call from Ye Luo.
叶枫闻言愣住，惊愕的看她：“可你之前不是最怕这些了吗？”
Stunned to hear her words, Ye Feng looked at her in shock. "But weren't you most afraid of these in the past?"
叶枫闻言，表情有些复杂道：“之前于向阳对阿漓说了一些不好的话，这次是来道歉的。”
Upon hearing her words, Ye Feng said with a complicated expression, "Previously, Yu Xiangyang said some mean things to Ye Li. He's here today to apologize."
叶枫阴沉着脸，正要说话，被叶洛制止。
With a sullen expression, Ye Feng was about to say something but he was stopped by Ye Luo.
叶枫顿时就感动了，眼泪汪汪的看着她：“阿漓你真好。”
Ye Feng was immediately touched. Looking at her with tears in his eyes, he said, "Ye Li, you're so nice."
叶没伸出的手一下就僵在了空气中，笑容逐渐从脸上消失了：“你说什么？不够？”
Ye Mei's hand stiffened in midair and the smile on her face gradually disappeared. "What did you say? Insufficient credit limit?"
叶洛一头黑线。
Ye Luo was at a loss for words.
叶洛一脸拒绝：“两个大老爷们吃饭像什么回事，我不去，你自己去吧，我比较喜欢一个人用餐。”
Ye Luo refuted, "It's so weird for two men to have lunch together. I"m not going, you go ahead yourself. I prefer eating by myself."
叶洛三兄弟脸十分难看。
Ye Luo and his brothers looked extremely stern and somber.
叶洛不悦的丢了一句。
Ye Luo said in anger.
叶洛几兄弟也在大夫人的招呼下纷纷落座。
Ye Luo and his brothers sat down one after another under Mrs. Xu's urging.
叶洛几兄弟闻言，也是怀疑的看向叶眉。
After hearing her words, Ye Luo and his brothers turned to look at Ye Mei with suspicion.
叶洛只是蹙了蹙眉，没有说话。
Ye Luo simply frowned and did not say anything.
叶洛听手下说叶漓被两个女生堵在了洗手间，脸色阴沉的快要滴水。
Ye Luo's expression grew extremely hostile when he heard from his subordinate that Ye Li was blocked by two girls in the washroom.
叶洛和叶旬两兄弟对视一眼，同样想到了这个问题。
Ye Xun and Ye Luo looked at each other as they had also thought of the same problem.
叶洛咳嗽了一声，可上扬的唇角是止都止不住，“没有。”
Ye Luo coughed but he couldn't stop smiling. "No."
叶洛拧着眉头，表情有些悲痛：“阿漓，现在大家都在这里，你老实告诉我们，我们会尊重你的选择。”
Ye Luo frowned and said with melancholy, "Li, everyone's here now. Tell us the truth and we will respect your choice."
叶洛的目光从叶眉担忧的脸上扫过。
Ye Luo glanced at the worried Ye Mei.
叶洛眉眼一寒。
Ye Luo's gaze turned cold.
叶洛看了他一眼，意味深长的说：“也好，我正好找你有事。”
Ye Luo took a glance at him and said ambiguously, "Great, I happen to be looking for you for something."
叶洛语气复杂的问：“阿漓啊，你跟你三哥哥吃饭呢？”
Ye Luo asked with a complicated tone, "Ye Feng, are you having lunch with Ye Feng?"
叶洛闻言，点了点头：“也行，那我们就先走了，你慢慢玩。”
Upon hearing his words, Ye Luo nodded and said, "That works too. We'll get going then, have fun."
叶洛：“三弟你什么情况！阿漓呢？”
Ye Luo asked, "Ye Feng, what's going on? Where's Ye Li?"
叶漓一下就将刚刚的事情抛在了脑后，赶忙跑进了洗手间，整理起了自己的头发。
Ye Li immediately stopped thinking about that matter and dashed into the bathroom to tidy up her hair.
叶漓一下就红了脸，赶忙起身，却因为用力过度，头一下撞在了车顶，发出了咚的一声之后，她又被弹坐了回去。

Ye Li immediately blushed and got up. HOwever, she was being too vigorous with her actions and hence, knocked her head against the top of the car with a loud thud, after which she was bounced back onto the seat.
叶漓一来，就抢走了所有人的目光。
Ye Li stole all the attention as soon as she appeared.
叶漓一眼就看到了。
Ye Li saw it immediately.
叶漓一笑，伸手同她虚握了一下：“你好。”笑容同样不达眼底。
Ye Li smiled and somewhat shook it with a mirthless smile, "Hello."
叶漓一笑：“哥你说什么啊，我又没生你气，而且你还让我获得了这么多粉丝，我开心还来不及呢。”
Ye Li smiled and said, "Brother, what are you talking about? I'm not angry at you. Besides, you even allowed me to gain so many followers. I'm really glad."
叶漓一路上都在说着自己今天发生的一切，说自己如何被老师针对，又是如何饿着肚子罚站，要多委屈有多委屈，一时之间已经忘了自己要去吃饭的事情，这会听他开口。才猛然反应过来，车已经停下了。

Ye Li had been telling him about everything that happened to her today, including how her teacher nitpicked on her and how she was punished to stand with an empty stomach. She was clamoring about how aggrieved she was, so much that she forgot that they were going to have a meal. After hearing his words, she finally realized that the car had already stopped.
叶漓上了楼，没一会就将黑卡拿了下来，毫不犹豫的给了叶眉。
Ye Li headed upstairs and quickly returned downstairs with a black card, which she handed to Ye Mei without hesitation.
叶漓不好意思的笑笑。
Ye Li smiled embarrassedly.
叶漓不屑的表情不似作假，难道真的是他们误会了吗？
Ye Li's disdainful expression did not seem fake at all. Thus, they wondered if they had really misunderstood everything.
叶漓不说这个问题，没人会多想，都觉得叶眉好像是在帮她说话。
If Ye Li did not bring up that issue, no one else would think much of it and they would all feel that Ye Mei seemed to be speaking up for her.
叶漓之前能落到那般下场，在徐晗看来，可没少拜这个叶眉所赐。
In Xu Han's opinion, Ye Li ended up in such a dire situation previous because of Ye Mei.
叶漓乖巧的点了点头，十分歉意的说：“对不起，大哥二哥三哥，之前是我太任性了，还总是跟你们闹不是，你们不要生阿漓的气好不好？”

Ye Li nodded obediently and said apologetically, "I'm sorry, Eldest Brother, Second Brother, Third Brother, I was too willful and capricious back then. I kept throwing tantrums at you guys. Don't be angry at me, alright?"
叶漓也不在乎，反正现在大家对她的印象都很差，不喜欢也是正常，她也不勉强，只是那个论文，她还真不记得了，算了吧，不交了。

Ye Li could not be bothered either. Anyway, everyone had a poor impression of her now and it was normal that she was disliked by many. She did not try to force it. However, she really couldn't remember anything about the paper so she decided to forget it and just not submit it.
叶漓也没想到外面围了这么多人，惊呆过后，就是费力的往里面挤。
Ye Li did not expect so many people to gather outside. After being stunned, she tried her best to squeeze her way through to go in.
叶漓以为离开了徐凤年，自己就可以重新开始。
Ye Li thought that she could start anew after leaving Xu Fengnian.
叶漓伸手挽住了一旁的徐凤年，笑的璀璨：“这不就近在眼前吗？”
Reaching out to hold onto Xu Fengnian who was beside her, she smiled radiantly and said, "He's right in front of me."
叶漓伸手捏住了棒棒糖，口中弥漫的甜腻让她眯了眯眼，微微抬眸，冷冽的目光扫向说话的女同学，嘲讽的扯了扯嘴角：“你是以什么身份跟我说话？于向阳的女朋友？还是他妈？”

Ye Li reached out to grab her lollipop and squinted as the sweetness filled her mouth. She looked up a little and stared coldly at the female student who had been talking. She smirked sneeringly and asked, "In what position are you talking to me? Yu Xiangyang's girlfriend? Or his mother?"
叶漓低垂着眸，突然又来了一句。
Ye Li looked down and suddenly said those words.
叶漓你好得很，竟然这么玩我！
'Great, Ye Li, you played me out!'
叶漓关了新闻，从床上起身。
Ye Li turned off the news channel and got up from the bed.
叶漓冷冷一笑，一脸讽刺：“现在你又搞得好像是我欺负了你一样，明明就是你和一个外人逼我承认这件事，怎么反倒是先委屈起来了呢？该委屈的是我吧？”

Ye Li sneered and said with a look of sarcasm, "Now you're making it seem like I bullied you. You were obviously the one who colluded with an outsider to force me to admit to this. Why are you feeling wronged and aggrieved instead? I should be the one feeling that way, aren't I?"
叶漓冷冷扫了她一眼，“以后看人不顺眼的时候别冲动，因为惹了的后果，不是你承受的起的。”
Ye Li glanced at her coldly and said, "From now on, don't act impulsively just because you don't like someone because you might not be able to bear with the consequences."
叶漓冷哼了一声。
Ye Li humphed coldly.
叶漓冷笑。
Ye Li sneered.
叶漓冷笑一声，在她扇过来的瞬间，将桌上的钢笔拿了起来，笔尖对准了对方扇过来的手掌。
Ye Li sneered and at the instant that the girl's hand moved towards her, Ye Li picked up the fountain pen on the table and pointed the sharp tip of the pen at the girl's hand.
叶漓冷笑：“你有资格开口吗？我叶家的事情，什么时候轮到你一个小三的女儿插话管教？”
Ye Li sneered and gibed, "Are you in any place to speak? Since when has the Ye Family's matters got anything to do with you, the daughter of a home wrecker? Who are you to interrupt and lecture me?"
叶漓冷笑：“没有？这件事从一开始我都没怎么表态，全程都是你在说，非得灌输大家我很喜欢于向阳的思想，你不是多管闲事，那就是想要破坏叶家和徐家的关系了？”

Ye Li sneered, "You didn't? Right from the beginning, I've never made my stand about this mater and you were the one who had been talking throughout. You insist on brainwashing everyone into thinking that I'm really fond of Yu Xiangyang.
