Ye Mei did not refute since she wanted to bring some people with her to see Ye Li make a joke out of herself in the first place.
叶眉本来僵硬的表情在看到她之后，顿时灵光乍现，笑着开口道：“没事，你换好了吗？这条裙子有些成熟呀，不太适合你，要不要再换一条试试。”

Ye Mei's stiffened expression immediately became livelier when she saw Xu Qian. She askde smilingly, "It's alright. Have you changed? Your gown makes you look a little too mature for your age. Why don't you try on another one?
叶眉死死的捏紧掌心，面上却依旧带着温柔的笑容，“谢谢夫人。”
Although she was clenching her fist tightly, Ye Mei was still smiling warmly and gently. "Thank you, Madam."
叶眉气的脸都歪了。
Ye Mei grimaced in exasperation.
叶眉没想到她会突然生气，脸色微变，随后赶忙解释：“姐我不是这个意思，我只是觉得那样才好看，不过你要是非要这样也没关系呀。”她语气和善，听起来都是为她着想。

Ye Mei didn't expect her to get angry all of a sudden. Her expression changed slightly and she hurriedly explained, "Sister, that's not what I meant. I just think that you look better that way. However, it doesn't matter if you insist on having his hairstyle," she said in an amicable tone, sounding as if she was just sparing a thought for Ye Li.
叶眉深吸了一口气，又端起了温柔的笑容，转身就准备去付款。
Ye Mei took a deep breath, put up a gentle smile again, turned around and was ready to make the payment.
叶眉满意的发了微博。
Ye Mei posted the tweet in satisfaction.
叶眉猛地看了过去，就见带着墨镜，穿着一身休闲装，顶着一头蓝发的绝美少年从鱼庄大门走了出来。
Ye Mei turned to look at them, only to see a stunningly handsome young man who had blue hair, striding out of the entrance of the fish restaurant, clad in a casual outfit and a pair of shades.
叶眉猩红着双眼，目光怨毒，好似要吃人。
Ye Mei's eyes were bloodshot and full of resentful viciousness, as if she was about to eat someone up.
叶眉的关系属实跟他很不错，他甚至十分欣赏这个女孩，再加上叶眉是叶枫的妹妹，他不同于对叶漓的厌恶，对她是很有意思的。
Ye Mei was indeed very close to him and he even admired her. Besides, she was Ye Feng's sister and unlike how he felt about Ye Feng, he did not detest Ye Mei. In fact, he even quite liked her.
叶眉的微博号叫做“眉眼如画。”
Ye Mei's Twitter account handle was 'Pretty Like A Painting'.
叶眉的心里一阵不适，明明都是骂声，为什么还是有那么多人关注了她。
Filled with displeasure, Ye Mei thought, 'They're all criticizing her and slamming her but why does she have so many followers?'
叶眉的本来心情十分不好，她今日来这里，本以为自己能够惊艳全场，得到所有人的关注。
Ye Mei was in low spirits today and she initially thought that she would be able to steal the show and be in the limelight at the gathering.
叶眉的脸一僵。
Ye Mei's face stiffened.
叶眉的脸刷地一下白了。
Ye Mei immediately turned pale.
叶眉的表情已经不能用难看来形容了。
Ye Mei's expression was beyond awful.
叶眉的话，估摸着这会儿估摸着被骂惨了，都不敢出门了吧。
Ye Mei was probably too scared to leave the house because of the flak that she had received online.
叶眉的身体一僵，猛地回头，就见于向阳一脸难看的盯着自己。
Ye Mei's body stiffened and she suddenly turned around, only to see that Yu Xiangyang was staring at her with a sullen expression.
叶眉的身子僵硬极了。
Ye Mei's body stiffened.
叶眉直接找到了自己的今日的目标ys的“夏夜之星”限定款。
Ye Mei immediately found her target for the day, the limited edition gown, "Stars of the Summer Night".
叶眉看到她这表情，莫名有种不好的预感。
Her expression gave Ye Mei an ominous hunch.
叶眉看到对方，眉眼闪了闪。
Ye Mei's eyes lit up when she saw her.
叶眉看到这样的叶漓，心里难掩的嫉妒。
When Ye Mei saw that, Ye Li couldn't hide her jealousy at all.
叶眉看到这里，气的鼻子都歪了。
Ye Mei was boiling with fury at this point.
叶眉看到这里，脸上不由的带了一抹笑。
When Ye Mei say that, she couldn't help but smile
叶眉看她这讨好奉承的表情，虚荣心得到了巨大的满足。
Ye Mei's vanity was satisfied when she saw the flattering expression on her face.
叶眉看着叶漓今天的装扮，眸光闪了闪，点了点头：“是呀，你也知道哥哥们不喜欢我。”她一脸黯然。
Ye Mei looked at Ye Li's outfit today and her eyes glistened. She nodded and said, "Yeah, you know very well too that Brothers dislike me." Her expression was gloomy.
叶眉看着被哥哥们包围宠爱的叶漓，再想想无人问津的自己，垂在裙摆的双手，指甲已经死死陷入了掌心。

Ye Mei looked at Ye Li who was being doted on and surrounded by her brothers. She then thought about herself, whom no one paid attention to. She was clenching her fists so tightly that her fingernails had already sunk deep into the flesh of her palm.
叶眉看着这么多人，几乎已经想象到自己接下来被人众星捧月的场面。
Looking at the people around them, Ye Mei could almost imagine herself being the center of attention later.
叶眉眸光闪了闪，正欲说什么，就见叶洛三兄弟从楼上一脸阴沉的走下。
Ye Mei's eyes glistened and she was just about to say something when she saw Ye Luo and her two brothers making their way downstairs with gloomy and sullen expressions.
叶眉眼神闪烁了一下，无奈的摇头解释道：“我也不清楚，你也知道我姐姐的性格，只要是她看上什么人，就会一直去纠缠，可能是这个原因吧，害，我也就是猜测，具体情况不清楚。”

Ye Mei's eyes glistened and she shook her head helplessly. "I'm not too sure about that either. Well, you know what my sister is like. Whenever she falls for someone, she'll pester him endlessly. Maybe that's the reason. I'm just making wild guesses, I don't know the exact details."
叶眉竟然是小三的女儿？
'Ye Mei is actually the daughter of a mistress?'
叶眉等人一走过来，就有人注意到了她，毕竟也是学校出了名的风云人物，大家是想不注意都难。
When Ye Mei and company walked over, the people immediately noticed her. After all, she was a famous and influential figure in school and it was hard for them not to notice her.
叶眉等人走进，一眼就注意到了耀眼的徐媛。
When Ye Mei and the others entered, they immediately noticed the striking Xu Yuan.
叶眉维持了这么多年的好名声，不知道她看到如今自己的微博，会是怎样一个表情。
'Ye Mei has been painstakingly building and maintaining her reputation for so many years. I wonder what her expression would be like when she sees her Twitter page.'
叶眉脸上的笑容彻底没了，不相信的说：“怎么可能呢，这可是黑卡，是不是你们刷卡机出问题了，你再刷一次？”
The smile on Ye Mei's face vanished and she asked in disbelief, "How is that possible? This s a black card. Is there a problem with your card machine? Why don't you try swiping it again?"
叶眉脸上的笑容徒然一僵，随后她反应过来，脸色发白，瑟瑟缩缩的说：“姐姐，你说什么，我怎么听不懂？你是不是误会了什么？”

The smile on Ye Mei's face suddenly stiffened, after which she recovered from the shock and turned pale. Shivering, she asked, "Sister, what are you saying? I don't understand. Are you mistaken about something?"
叶眉脸色一白，一副摇摇欲坠的姿态，表情好似受到了天大的委屈：“姐，姐姐，你怎么能这么想我，毕竟当时你去找向阳学长告白的事情是事实，我不想因为这件事而让你被大家所讨厌，才会让你道歉的，我都是为了你着想，你这样说，也太让我寒心了。”她说罢，红着眼眶低下了头，仿佛在多说一句，就忍不住要哭了一般，看的周围的男同学们是一阵怜惜，连带着看向叶漓的目光都带着敌意，仿佛她做了什么天理难容的事情。

Ye Mei turned pale and seemed to be on the verge of collapsing. Looking extremely aggrieved, she said, "Sister, how could you think of me that way? After all, it's true that you had gone to confess to Senior Xiangyang. I want you to apologize because I don't want you to be hated by others. I am doing this all for your own good. Yet,you said that about me. I'm really disappointed." After saying that, her eyes turned red as if she was about to burst into tears if Ye Li went on. The boys around her were all showing her sympathy and looking at Ye Li with extreme animosity, as if she had committed a terrible sin.
叶眉被夸得开心，心里满足的很，面上却十分谦虚：“你们夸张啦，哪有这么好看。”
Glad to hear the compliments, Ye Mei's heart was filled with content but she nonetheless maintained a humble expression. "You guys are exaggerating. I'm not that beautiful."
叶眉见徐夫人自始至终都没有将目光落到自己的身上，心里的愤怒几欲喷涌而出。
Seeing that Mrs. Xu had never once looked at her, she was so enraged that she was about to erupt.
叶眉解释说：“姐，你道了歉，这件事就这样过去了，你若是不道歉的话，以后要被网络暴力的，你又不是不知道向阳学长的粉丝团队有多大，全校一半的女孩子都是他的粉丝，你就道歉吧！这样才能息事宁人啊。”叶眉苦口婆心的说。

Ye Mei explained, "Sister, this matter will be over once you apologize, but if you don't, you will be cyber-bullied. It's not like you don't know how big Senior Xiangyang's fan club is. Half the girls in school are his fans. Just apologize to him! Only then can we settle this matter," Ye Mei said concernedly.
叶眉赶忙凑了过来：“凤年哥哥，我可以和你们一起回去吗？”
Ye Mei hurriedly inched closer and asked, "Xu Fengnian, can I go home with you guys?"
叶眉这么聪明，不应该不知道这些才是。
Since Ye Mei was that intelligent, she should have known this.
叶眉这会儿才刚回到家。
Ye Mei had just returned home with a sullen expression.
叶眉这话好像是有些牵强了。
Ye Mei's words seemed to be far-fetched.
叶眉遭受各种怀疑的目光，心里有些慌了，赶忙低下头，委屈的说：“姐姐，我真不知道，以前你从来不会参加这些聚会，所以我跟妈妈都没有多想，拿到邀请函也没有注意就直接来了，没想到会让你这样误会，要是你生气的话，我可以离开的....”

Ye Mei began to panic when she sensed the gazes cast on her. She hurriedly lowered her head and said worriedly, "Sister, I really didn't know. You used to shy away from such gatherings so my mother and I didn't think much about it. After we received the invitation card, we put it away without paying much attention to it. I didn't expect to cause such a misunderstanding. If you're upset, I can leave..."
叶眉那边不知道她有没有向别的人透露过，总之这会儿都不能打草惊蛇，要等他好好的揪出来，看看到底是谁想死！

They did not know if Ye Mei had told anyone else about the secret but in any case, they could not startle the culprit at this moment. They had to lure the culprit out slowly and see who wanted to die!
叶眉长相清纯，在这个年代，已是十分少有，还有人说她和当下最红拥有着玉女之称的女明星周莹莹十分相似，然后就被同学们封了个小玉女的称号，热度十分大，叶漓记得不错的话，这个时候，叶眉的微博粉丝都已经破百万了。

Ye Mei looked rather pure and innocent. Girls like her were extremely rare in this day and age. Some even said that she resembled the female celebrity, Zhou Yingying, who was nicknamed 'Jade Girl'. She was extremely popular and if Ye Li remembered correctly, Ye Li probably had more than a million fans on Weibo now.
叶眉闻言，好不容易端起的笑容彻底崩塌。
Upon hearing her words, Ye Mei's smile, which she had painstakingly forced, completely collapsed.
叶眉闻言，温柔的笑道：“我和徐晗是同班同学呢。”
Upon hearing her words, Ye Mei smiled gently and said, "Xu Han and I are classmates."
叶眉闻言，脸色一白，戏剧性的倒退了两步，摇着头委屈的说：“不是这样的姐姐，我只是不太好意思才会请凤年哥哥一起跳舞，你不要误会好不好，凤年哥哥，对不起，我不是故意要惹姐姐生气的。”她看向了徐凤年。

Ye Mei turned pale after hearing her words and took two steps back dramatically. Shaking her head, she said aggrievedly, "It's not like this, Ye Li, I'm just too shy, that's why I'm asking Fengnian. Don't misunderstand me, alright? Fengnian, I'm sorry, I didn't mean to make Ye Mei angry," she said, looking at Xu Fengnian.
叶眉闻言，顿时为难的看向叶漓，“阿漓姐你岂不是进不来了？”
After hearing what he said, Ye Mei immediately looked at Ye Li, as if she had been put in a spot. "Ye Li, doesn't that mean that you can't enter?"
叶眉难看的表情，让叶漓的心情更好了。
The look of dismay on Ye Mei's face put Ye Li in high spirits.
Ye Mei was speechless.
叶，叶漓竟然是叶家大小姐？？
'Ye Li is the daughter of the Ye Family?'
司机也不是傻子，惊了一下，总感觉这大小姐好像是什么地方变了。
The chauffeur was not a fool either. He got a shock as he felt that something about her had changed.
司机打了个寒颤。
The chauffeur shivered.
司机打了电话让人处理了事情，走到学校门口的时候，还以为自己要打车走了，谁料却见自己开来的车还停在原来的地方。

The chauffeur made a call to get someone to handle the matter. When he reached the gate of the school, he thought that he would have to hail a cab to leave but surprisingly, the car that he drove was still parked at the same spot.
司机明白的点了点头，从后视镜看到两人亲昵的模样，贴心的将隔板打开，非礼勿视，非礼勿视啊！

Having understood his instructions, the chauffeur nodded and looked at the two of them getting all chummy and affectionate with each other in the rear view mirror. He thoughtfully put up the partition so that he would not see them!
吃了早餐两人一同上了车，叶眉终于忍不住问了起来：“阿漓，你的发型怎么变了，之前那个多好看啊，现在这样显得你的脸好大。”明明是关心的话，可听在当事人的耳中，却足够让人无地自容。

After having breakfast, the two of them got inside the car where Ye Mei finally couldn't help but say, "Li, why did you change your hairstyle again? Your previous hairstyle was beautiful. Your current one makes your face look so large." Although she was clearly showing her some concern, her words were incredibly humiliating.
吃瓜群众们倒是议论的火热。
The gossipy fans began having an intense discussion.
同学们不禁没有怜悯半分，还幸灾乐祸，恨不得她死了最好，那样就没有人再缠着他们的偶像于向阳。
The students did not show her any sympathy at all and they even gloated, wishing that she would just die. That way, no one would pester their idol, Yu Xiangyang.
同学们看着这一幕，又是一阵唏嘘。
The students sighed after seeing that.
同学们见叶漓完好无整的回来，纷纷好奇。
The students were all curious to see that Ye Li had returned unscathed.
同学们面面相觑，十分惊讶，“徐晗这是为叶漓打抱不平吗？”
The students looked at each other in puzzlement and shock. "Is Xu Han standing up and doing justice for Ye Li?"
同样是叶家的小姐，可她却丝毫没有入这个男人的眼。
Although she was also a daughter of the Ye Family,Xu Fengnian had never paid attention to her.
后来订婚一事不知道被谁传播了出去，大家都在说她一个大学生以前能过的那么好，肯定是被什么公司的老总包养。
Later on, someone spread the word about her engagement and everyone said that she must have been a mistress of the CEO of a certain company in order to live in luxury as a college student.
后来长大了，她知道自己和她不是同一个母亲所生，所以明白了自己为什么会遭受这样的对待。
Later on, she grew up and finally understood why she was mistreated, after finding out that she was born to a different mother from them.
听到前面一句的时候，叶漓还有些生气。
When she heard the first sentence, Ye Li was still a little angry.
听到哥哥两个字时，叶眉的表情已经变了。
Ye Mei's expression had already turned sullen when she heard her brother's name.
听到女儿的问话，二夫人手中摇晃的的红酒杯一顿。
After hearing her daughter's words, Kong Yun swirled the glass of red wine in her hand.
听到这话，孟非顿时涨红了脸，恼怒的看着她。
Hearing her words, Meng Fei's face turned flushed and she glowered at her.
听她问，其他人顿时蜂拥而上，抢着回答：“二小姐你不不知道吧，现在咱们娱乐圈不是有个很火的大明星叫做枫神吗？他是我们的偶像，谁知道竟然跟人闹出了绯闻，那个人就是她，我可听说了，她就是帝都大学的一学生，之前的时候，对那个另外一个叫做一心向阳的明星纠缠不清，后来被人家拒绝，又缠上了我们枫神，真的是不要脸！”

Hearing her words, everyone immediately flocked towards her and vied to answer. "Miss Xu Yuan, you probably know about this famous celebrity who's really popular in the entertainment industry now. His name is Ye Feng and he's our idol. However, recently, he got involved in a scandal with someone and that's her. I heard that she's a student of Beijing University and before this, she continuously pestered a celebrity named Xiangyang who rejected her. Now, she's pestering our idol, Ye Feng. She's really shameless!"
听说十八班才艺，样样精通。
She was rumored to be proficient in 18 talents.
听说周珩最喜欢的就是各种乐器。
She heard that musical instruments of all types, were Zhou Heng's favorite.
听说娱乐圈经过他手的人，无一不是大红大紫！
She heard that all artistes in the entertainment industry who had been managed by him, would rise to fame!
听说是因为出了什么意外，才和她父亲发生了亲密关系，然后怀上了和她一个年纪的叶眉，这事情发现的时候，秦柔已经大了肚子，想要打胎太伤身体，她妈妈不忍心，也就没再说什么，只是和丈夫的关系一度降到冰点，任由他如何补偿也不见起色，随着孩子长大，甚至一度抑郁，再加上秦柔若有若无的各种出现，整个人郁郁寡欢，生她的时候因为早产，大出血，没过多久便去世了。

She heard that that woman had gotten intimate with her father because of a certain incident and later on, she got pregnant with Ye Mei, who was the same age as her. By the time they discovered that matter, Qin Rou's baby bump was already showing and it would getting an abortion when she was heavily pregnant would be harmful to her body. Her mother could not bear to let her get an abortion so she kept mum about it. However, the relationship between Ye Li's mother and father became extremely strained and regardless of how the latter coaxed her, she would not snap out of her gloomy mood. When giving birth to Ye Li, she went into premature labor and suffered an excessive loss of blood that caused her to pass away soon after labor.
听说这次若是能拿到特等奖，将会得到娱乐公司的重点对待，而且还有娱乐圈金牌经纪人周珩亲自培养。
She heard that winners of the special prize this time would be receiving priority from the entertainment company, and be personally nurtured by the renowned and esteemed celebrity manager, Zhou Heng.
听说，当初徐家二爷，就是她的忠实歌粉。
Her husband used to be her loyal fan.

周周小公举：“所有人都看过来，这件事是真的，我当时就在现场，我是帝都大学的学生，那个女的我还认识，叫做叶漓，是我们学校校园榜上其中一女神的姐姐，当时大家那个女神也在现场，我们是听说有大明星包场了鱼庄，所以才好奇过来想要看看是谁的，当时还以为人家请的人是女神，谁知道人家请的竟然是她的姐姐，我当时都懵逼了你们知道吗？啊啊啊！！虽然很难以置信，但是枫神是真他么的帅！！！！呜呜呜，无论他做什么我都会支持他的，嘤嘤嘤！~~”

Little Princess: "Everyone look over, this matter is real. I was there at the time. I'm a college student of Beijing University and I know that girl too. Her name is Ye Li, and she's the sister of one of the girls on the campus Goddesses List, who was also present then. We heard that a celebrity had booked the entire fish restaurant so we were curious to see who it was. Back then, we thought that he had invited that goddess but who knew? He invited the goddess's sister. I was dumbfounded! Ahhhh! Although I was in disbelief, Ye Feng is really so handsome! No matter what he does, I will support him. Woo!"
周围人异样的眼光让叶眉有些丢脸，却强撑着道。
The peculiar gazes of the people around her made Ye Mei feel a little embarrassed but she was still trying hard to hang on.
周围压抑的气氛在一瞬间好似消失的无影无踪。
The somber and pressurizing ambiance around him seemed to disappear without a trace in an instant.
周围的人也看了过去，“如果这件事真不关叶漓的事情的话，那她刚刚说的那些就太过分了。”
Everyone looked over too. "If this matter really has nothing to do with Ye Li, she has gone overboard with her words just now."
周围的人在看到叶漓拿出特邀函的时候，脸色就已经变了。
The expressions of the people around them had already changed when they saw Ye Li taking out the special invitation card.
周围的人无不投入艳羡的目光。
Everyone was looking at her enviously.
周围的人纷纷尊敬的叫了一声：“徐夫人！”
Everyone greeted respectfully, "Mrs. Xu!"
周围的人这才发现叶漓，议论了起来，“叶漓？不是吧，这就是叶眉那个姐姐，我怎么看着跟之前人家发上网上的图不一样啊，虽然胖了一点，但是长得很可爱。”

The people around them finally noticed Ye Li and began discussing amongst themselves. "Ye Li? Are you kidding me? She's Ye Mei's sister? Why does she look different from the photos of her on the Internet? She may be chubby but she's very adorable."
周围的人都朝着叶漓看了过去。
The people around looked over at Ye Li.
周围的人闻言，也是惊愕的看向叶眉。
Everyone looked at Ye Mei in shock when they heard her words.

她看了旁边站着的少年，挑了挑眉：“那个，我要先走了，你是要继续站着还是....”叶漓指了指一旁的楼梯。
Looking at the young man beside her with raised brows, she said, "Um, I'm going to get going. Do you want to continue standing here or..." Ye Li pointed at the staircase at the side.
她看向叶漓的眼睛都红了，不屑的道：“让枫神亲自来，你开什么玩笑，就凭你也配？”
Looking at Ye Feng with bloodshot eyes, she asked in disdain, "What a joke. Do you think you're worthy enough to get Ye Feng to come here in person?"
她看向徐凤年 。
She looked at Xu Fengnian.
她看着叶漓那双有些深不可测的双眸，眼睛弯了弯。
She looked at Ye Li with mysterious eyes that curved.
她眼神闪了闪，迅速发表了一条微博：“大家都不要吵了，我知道这件事确实很让人震惊，但是叶漓毕竟是我的姐姐，看到她被骂我心里也十分难受，我希望大家不要再说她了，她约了枫神吃个饭而已，不是你们猜想的那种关系，宝宝们不要乱想。#枫神母校于神秘大学生吃饭事件#小凤漓回应#小凤漓和枫神关系。”

Her eyes glistened and she quickly sent a tweet that read: "Everyone, cut it out. I know that this matter is indeed very astonishing but Ye Li is my sister after all, and I feel very upset to see her getting scolded. I hope that you can all stop criticizing her. She had just asked Ye Feng out for a meal, their relationship is not what you think it is. Babies, stop making wild guesses. #YeFengDinesWithMysteriousCollegeStudent #LittleYeLiResponds #TheRelationshipBetweenLittleYeLiAndYeFeng."
她瞪着眼珠子，一脸不敢置信的看着父亲。
She stared at her father with her eyes wide open in disbelief.
她知道，自己要是跟叶漓要，她那么大方的一个人，肯定不会不给。
She knew that the magnanimous Ye Li would definitely lend the black card to her as long as she asked for it.
她笑了。
She laughed.
她笑了一声，点头说道：“对，爷爷，二夫人和二小姐说的没错。”
She chuckle and said with a nod, "By the way, Grandpa, Miss Xu Yuan and Madam Kong Yun are right."
她笑容淡了两分，道：“叶眉小姐也来了，快坐吧。”
Her smile faded a little and she said, "You're here too, Miss Ye Mei, hurry and take a seat."
她笑意盈盈的抱着属于自己的本本，很是开心。
She was hugging her booklet smilingly, seemingly in good spirits.
她笑的很大声吗，周围的人都听见了。
She was guffawing loudly and everyone around could hear her.
她等不及了，现在的她才二十，若是要等到二十三，那岂不是还要等上三年？
She could not wait any longer. She was now 20 years old and if she were to wait until she was 23 years old to get married, that would mean that she had to wait for three more years.
她美眸闪烁了一下，开口道，“难道凤年也知道这件事？并且你们已经私下解决了？”
Her beautiful eyes flickered and she asked, "Does Xu Fengnian know about this too? Have you already settled this between yourselves?"
她肤若凝脂，双眉修长，星眸璀璨，唇红齿白，一头靓丽的黑发被高高扎在了耳后，只留下零零碎碎的发丝修饰着圆润可爱的双颊。

Her skin was supple like gelatin, her eyebrows were long, her eyes were glistening, and her lips were red while her teeth was white. Her beautiful, black hair was pulled up into a high ponytail behind her ears, leaving only some loose segments of hair that framed her round and adorable cheeks.
她脸上的笑容难看了几分，“那就麻烦叶小姐多照顾一下凤年了。”
Her smile stiffened and she said, "Please take care of Xu Fengnian then, Miss Ye Li."
她脸色微沉，这于向阳还真是会说，明明背地里对她那般嫌恶，为了前程还真是什么恶心话都说得出口！

Her face turned a little sullen and she thought, 'This Yu Xiangyang is so good at talking. He's clearly disgusted with me in private. For the sake of his future, he can really bring himself to say all sorts of disgusting things!'
她脸色无比惊愕的看向叶漓。
She looked at Ye Li in astonishment.
她自以为自己见多了自家哥哥大表哥的盛世美颜，对帅哥已经免疫了。
She thought that after seeing the handsome good looks of her eldest cousin, she would feel nothing for handsome men.
她自小怕水，这会儿竟然能为了这事能做到这一步，三人心里又是恨自己不该这么逼她，又是气她为何这么冲动。

Ever since she was a child, she had been afraid of water. Yet, she actually took things so far because of that matter. The three men blamed themselves for forcing her and were also angry at her for being so impulsive.
她自己也是有微博号的，当初为了支持于向阳，还是他的应援粉丝。
She had her own Twitter account, which she had created for the sake of supporting Yu Xiangyang. She would go to his fan meets too.
她自然是欣喜至极，几乎是想也没想便答应了对方，之后听了对方的话以死相逼，成功拿到了离婚协议书。

She was naturally overjoyed and she almost agreed to let him help her, without hesitation at all. Later on, she heeded his advice and successfully managed to get the divorce papers signed by threatening Xu Fengnian with her own life.
她若是没记错的话，这餐桌上向来坐着的都是徐家人或者一些旁系。
If she remembered correctly, the people sitting at this table were usually members of Xu Fengnian's family or some other distant relatives.
她虽然也是叶家二小姐，但是和叶漓在叶家的地位却天差地别。
Although she was also a daughter of the Ye Family, her status in the family was worlds apart from Ye Li.
她要是多问，姑且还会让这三人反感。
If she asked any more questions, they would be repulsed and annoyed by her.
她觉得叶漓和叶眉是两姐妹，这事叶眉肯定是告诉了她，但是叶漓偷懒没写。
She thought that Ye Mei must have informed Ye Li since they were sisters, and that Ye Li was just too lazy to write it.
她记得很清楚，叶漓十八岁生日那年，徐凤年送了她一张黑卡做礼物。
She remembered very clearly that Xu Fengnian gifted Ye Li with a black card for her eighteenth birthday.
她记得，当时自己虽然没去，但是叶眉去了。
She remembered that although she did not go at that time, Ye Mei did.
她记得，母亲的眼睛也是跟自己一样，眼下还有一颗泪痣。
She remembered that her mother's eyes were identical to hers, and she also had a mole under her eye.
她说什么。
'What is she talking about?'
她说到这里，掀了掀眼皮子：“我也不能白受了这个委屈不是？”
At this point, she looked up and said, "I can't be wronged for nothing, right?"
她说怎么就这么好说话，直接就给她了，原来是故意整她！
'I was wondering why she agreed so readily. Turns out she wanted to play me out on purpose!'
她说着，若有若无的看向徐凤年，那表情好似受了天大的委屈。
As she spoke, she turned to look at Xu Fengnian, looking as if she had been terribly mistreated.
她说罢，就哇的一下大哭了起来。
As soon as she finished speaking, she began bawling loudly.
她说罢，看向叶漓，眼底深处闪过一抹怨毒，可脸上却无比的真诚：“阿漓，对不起，这件事是我不对，希望你能原谅我，我们从小就是朋友，我相信不会因为这一点小事就会毁掉我们之间的友谊的对不对？”

After saying that, she looked at Ye Li with a trace of resentment in her eyes. However, her expression seemed genuinely sincere. "Ye Li, I'm sorry, this matter is my fault, I hope you can forgive me. We have been friends since we were children and I believe our friendship won't be ruined by such a trivial matter, right?"
她走到一旁，打了电话。
She walked to the side and made a call.
她跳河一事是真，虽然也有因为表白被拒的因素在里面，但是更多的是因为要嫁给徐凤年和同学们的欺辱嘲笑。

It was true that she had jumped into the river and although the rejection was part of the reason it was mostly because of the humiliation that she suffered for having to marry Xu Fengnian, and the mockery from her classmates.
她身份太过敏感，所以一直是处于隐秘状态，除了叶眉和哥哥们，学校里的人几乎都不知道。
Due to the sensitivity of her identity, she had always been keeping it a secret. Other than Ye Mei and her brothers, no one else in school knew about it.
她身后的两个女生赶忙拉着她：“眉儿你别冲动呀，这件事不关你的事，咱们就不摊这浑水了好吗？再说了，这在人家呢，她们肯定也不会太过分的，你放心吧。”

The two girls behind her hurriedly tried to stop her. "Ye Mei, don't be reckless. This matter has nothing to do with me. Can we not get involved? Besides, we're in someone else's home now. They definitely won't act recklessly, don't worry."
她身后的女生惊讶的看来。
The girl behind her looked over in shock.
她身后跟着的两个女生看着众星捧月的徐媛，艳羡道。
Green with envy, the two girls were looking at Xu Yuan who was admired by many.
她转身回了房间，翻出了之前大家送的礼服，随便挑了挑，选出了一条较为显瘦又不失保守的米色晚礼服。

She turned around and returned to her room and took out the gowns that she had received as gifts previously. She casually picked out a cream-colored one that would make her look slimmer but was not too revealing.
她还没说话，前排的叶眉就站了起来，一脸犹豫的说道：“老师，我姐姐不是故意不交的，您能不能不要惩罚她？她从小到大就没干过粗活，可能....”

Before she could say anything, Ye Mei, who was in the front row, stood up and said with a hesitant expression, "Teacher, my sister didn't mean not to submit the paper. Could you spare her from the punishment? She's never done any hard labor since she was a child, maybe..."
她这么有钱，肯定不止是一张卡。
They reckoned that she definitely had more than just one card since she was that wealthy.
她这会甚至都有些感谢叶漓了。
She even felt somewhat thankful for Ye Li.
她这样找叶漓的茬，对方竟然不怪罪她。
She made things hard for Ye Li but the latter did not blame her at all.
她这辈子最恨的就是为什么自己不是正室的女儿，因为因此，她遭受了多少不公平的对待。
In this life, the thing she hated the most was the fact that she was the daughter of a mistress, because that was the reason she had suffered plenty of unfair treatment.
她递给了自家哥哥看，道：“哥，你看我粉丝涨的好快。”
She handed her mobile phone to her brother and said, "Brother, look at how quick my follower count is increasing."
她邪恶的笑着，眼中却带着几分恨意。
She smiled sinisterly with some hatred in her eyes.
她高中之前一直是十分优秀的学生，只是高考的时候因为睡过头，试卷只填了一半，勉强凑够分数进了帝都大学。

Before she went to High School, she had always been an outstanding student but due to the fact that she had overslept on the day of the national college entrance examinations, she only had time to complete half of the exam script and barely made it through to Beijing University.
好不容易熬到了生下孩子，于向阳突然出现，说要帮助她离开。
After a great deal of hardship, she finally gave birth to her child and Yu Xiangyang suddenly appeared, claiming that he would help her leave.
好似之前发生的一切不过一场梦，梦醒了，就什么都没了。
It was as if everything that happened prior to this was just a dream that he had now woken up from.
好似之前露出的嚣张不过是大家的幻觉。
It was as if the arrogant behavior of his just now was just everyone's illusion.
好似告诉大家，叶漓只是害怕他们怪罪，所以才不敢承认。
It was as if she was telling everyone that Ye Li was just scared to admit it because she didn't want them to blame her.
好似在看到她的瞬间，所有迫人的气息都消失了。
It seemed that all their oppressive auras disappeared at the instant that they saw Ye Li.
好似已经笃定，叶漓就是那样的人一般。
It was as if they were already certain that Ye Li was such a person.
好似看到了他们，这种对她来说不喜欢的聚会，也变得无比美好了起来。
It was as if the gathering that she disliked, had become much better after they appeared.
好似自始至终都没有什么变化。
It was as if it had never changed much throughout.
好像是哎，人家只是问为什么拿了邀请函没有告诉她，并没有说不让她来吧。
'That seems to make sense. She's only asked her sister for the reason that she took away her invitation card without asking. She didn't forbid her sister from tagging along.'
好多暗恋徐晗的人，这会儿嫉妒的眼都红了。
Many of those who had a crush on Xu Han were filled with jealousy at this moment.
好姐妹们 求个五星好评呀~
好想他！
'I miss him so much!'
如今已经知晓未来会发生的一切，叶漓自然不会再让这些事发生。
Now that she had already known everything that would happen in the future, Ye Li naturally wouldn't let those things happen.
如今的叶漓，刚满二十岁，就读帝都中心大学，是大二艺术系的学生。
The current Ye Li had just turned twenty years old and was a Year Two college student at Beijing University.
如今看到二夫人母女针对她，她心里终于舒坦了一些。
After seeing the way that Kong Yun and Xu Yuan were making things difficult or her, she finally felt much more at ease.
如今看到叶漓，好似也并不像是资料中的那样自卑愚蠢。
Ye Li did not seem as foolish and self-conscious as she was said to be.
如今被对方那么说，心里该会多么难过。
How upset must she have been after hearing those words from Yu Xiangyang?
如今要是没了哥哥，她看他还如何星途辉煌！
'Let's see how he can achieve stardom and fame without Third Brother!'
如今邀请函在自己手上，叶漓就算是去了，她也无法进去。
Now, the invitation card was in her hands and even if Ye Li were to turn up at the venue, she would not be granted entry.
如今限量款被两个人穿了不说，还都发了微博。
Not only had the gown been donned by two people, they had also posted photos of it onto Twitter.
妈妈？
Mother?
妒的是，这些外面人眼中的天之骄子，在家在自己妹妹面前却是这样一副宠溺无边的姿态。
However, she was jealous that the outstanding figures whom everyone deemed to be favored by god, were all pampering and indulging Ye Li to no end.
妹妹这段时间的变化太过奇怪了。
The changes that occurred to his younger sister lately were too strange.
嫁入徐家之后，便退出了娱乐圈，安心的当起了贵妇。
After marrying into the Xu Family, she quit the entertainment industry and enjoyed life as a wealthy man's wife.
嫉妒是罪恶之源。一天两章 等会儿还有一章 好宝贝们求五星好评呀，比心心~
孟家一家人闻言脸都黑了。
The faces of Meng Fei and her parents turned hostile.
孟母嫌恶的道。
Meng Fei's mother said in disgust.
孟母看丈夫这样，也知道事情可能有些严重，联想刚刚丈夫接的电话，和之前这个少年说的，她脸色微微一变。

Seeing the way that her husband was acting, Meng Fei's mother knew that something severe had happened. At the thought of the call that her husband had just picked up and what Ye Feng just said, her expression changed a little.
孟母阴沉道：“你一个小女娃家家的，怎么就这么恶毒！”
Meng Fei's mother exclaimed sullenly, "You're just a little girl, why are you so vicious!?"
孟父听到她的声音，仿佛一下被惊醒了一般，惊恐的看向叶枫两兄妹，“你，你们是叶家什么人？”
When Meng Fei's father heard her voice, he seemed to have suddenly been awakened as he stared at Ye Feng and Ye Li in horror. "How are you two related to the Ye Family?"
孟父咬了咬牙，回头看向叶漓，“可以，但是下跪，我来代替她！”这话一出，叶漓都不禁诧异的看了他一眼。
Meng Fei's father gritted his teeth and turned around to look at Ye Li. "Yes, but I'll kneel on her behalf!" After he said that, Ye Li couldn't help but look at him in surprise.
孟父孟母直接给他这眼神吓得一个哆嗦，竟然是说不出话来了。
Meng Fei's parents was so frightened by his gaze that they shuddered, unable to say anything else.
孟父孟母闻言，勃然大怒：“你还有理了不是，今儿个你要是不给我家非非下跪道歉，我们孟家决不罢休！”

Upon hearing her words, Meng Fei's parents suddenly flew into a rage and exclaimed, "So you think you're right, huh? If you don't kneel down and apologize to Meng Fei today, we won't let go of this matter!"
孟父恼怒道：“你说我女儿欺负你，我怎么没看到你哪里受伤，倒是我女儿的手被你伤的这么严重，今天你不给我说清楚，别想走出这道门！”

Meng Fei's father hollered in exasperation, "You said my daughter bullied you, but why don't I see any injuries on you at all? You severely wounded my daughter's hand. Don't think of leaving before giving me a clear explanation today!"
孟父愣了一下，随后脸僵了。
After being stunned for a while, Meng Fei's father's face stiffened.
孟父提着的心一落，感激的看着她：“谢谢叶小姐，那我们公司。”
Feeling relieved, Meng Fei's father looked at her gratefully and said, "Thank you, Miss Ye Li. In this case, our company."
孟父涨红了一张脸，想着自己刚刚在外人面前丢了那么大的面，也是不想再呆，告别一句就灰溜溜的带着妻女离开了。

Meng Fei's father's face became flushed again. Thinking about how much he had embarrassed himself just now, he didn't want to stay behind any longer either. After saying goodbye, he left ashamedly with his wife and daughter.
孟父的脸一僵，伸手掏出了手机接通了电话，可电话中传来的内容，让这个男人脸色的怒容，逐渐转化成了惊骇和惶恐。
Meng Fei's father's face stiffened and he reached out to grab his mobile phone. He then answered the call but what he heard next made his anger turn into horror and panic.
孟父的脸一僵，笑容几乎维持不下去。
Meng Fei's father's face stiffened and he almost couldn't keep up with the smiling.
孟父脸上的笑容已经彻底绷不下去了。
The smile on Meng Fei's father's face had vanished.
孟父说罢，见叶漓没有说话，涨红了脸，腿一曲就准备跪下去。
After saying that, Meng Fei's father's face became flushed and he bent his legs when he saw that Ye Li was remaining silent. He was all ready to kneel in front of her.
孟父闻言，脸色一阵难看，却还是强撑着笑容，讨好之色溢于言表：“叶小姐，那你看这要怎么样才能原谅我们，赔偿多少钱什么的我们都能接受，只要你们不生气。”

Upon hearing her words, Meng Fei's father's face grew sullen but he still tried to keep a smile on his face. Trying to please Ye Li, he said, "Miss Ye, what must we do to get your forgiveness? We're willing to compensate you with any amount of money that you want, as long as it'll make you simmer down."
孟非吓傻了。
Meng Fei was dumbfounded.
孟非听到这话，顿时紧张的看了过来，这会儿她已经注意不到叶漓了，瞳孔中全是自己偶像的身影，掌心的痛都忘了个一干二净。

When Meng Fei heard that question, she immediately looked over nervously. At this moment, she could no longer pay any attention to Ye Li. All she could see was her idol and she had also forgotten about the pain in her palm.
孟非噎住。
Meng Fei choked.
孟非愣住了。
Meng Fei was dumbfounded.
孟非是他唯一的孩子，从小娇宠长大没舍得动过一根手指头。
Meng Fei was his only child whom he had pampered ever since her birth. He had never laid a finger on her before.
孟非是真的被刚刚那一幕吓傻了。
Meng Fei was truly dumbfounded by that scene.
孟非更是瞪大了眼珠子，倒退了几步：“叶漓你什么意思，你竟敢让我给你下跪道歉？我看你是在做梦！”
Meng Fei's eyes widened in shock and she took a few steps back. "Ye Li, what do you mean? How dare you ask me to kneel down and apologize to you? You must be dreaming!"
孟非的脸一僵。
Meng Fei's face stiffened.
孟非的脸上带着不符合这个年纪的恶毒之色，闻言狠狠的瞪着叶漓道：“我要她下跪道歉，再赔偿我一百万的精神损失费！”

With a vicious expression that should not have appeared on the face of a girl her age, Meng Fei glowered at Ye Li and said, "I want her to kneel down and apologize, and then compensate me with a million yuan for the emotional damage that she has done to me!"
孟非看到他这个表情，脸色都白了，疯狂的摇着头：“爸，爸爸你想干什么，我不要！”
Meng Fei turned pale when she saw his expression and she nodded hysterically. "Father, what are you trying to do? I don't want to do it!"
孟非瞪着眼珠子，原本看着叶漓的脸色从嫌恶逐渐变得难以置信。
Meng Fei's eyes were wide open as she stared at Ye Li. The look of disgust on her face gradually turned into disbelief.
孟非被她这眼神看的一阵心慌，赶忙去扯自家父亲的手臂，疯狂摇晃：“爸，我才不要，你快帮我啊！”
Panicking because the gaze in her eyes, Meng Fei hurriedly tugged her father's arm and shook it vigorously. "Father, I don't want that. Hurry and help me!"
孟非蹙了蹙眉：“你什么意思？”
Meng Fei frowned and asked, "What do you mean?"
学校里有钱人家的少爷小姐，都是比较出名的，可叶漓是靠自家妹妹出名的，也没传过她家有钱，所以大家并没有将叶漓放在心上。

The children of the wealthy families in school were all rather famous in school but Ye Li was only well known because of her sister. There were no rumors about her family being wealthy so no one took Ye Li seriously.
完了完了，这个女的和叶眉从同一辆车上下来，那肯定也不是一般人。
'Oh dear, it's over for us. This girl alighted from the same car as Ye Mei. She's definitely not an ordinary person.'
实际骨子里比谁都黑。
客厅中，已经站了不少的宾客。
There were already numerous guests in the guest hall.
家人群里，大家都看到了叶枫发的自己和妹妹吃饭的图片视屏，作为很是嚣张，其他人已经有了好好揍他一顿的冲动了。
Everyone in the family chat group saw the photos and videos of Ye Feng and Ye Li having lunch, which were sent by Ye Feng. He seemed extremely arrogant and everyone else felt an urge to beat him up.
容是没整，被家里人拦住了。

徐凤年眯了眯眼，锋利的眼神如刀锋一般划过，于向阳的脊背一阵发凉。

徐凤年脸色微紧，有些复杂。

When Xu Fengnian saw that she even dared to ask him that question, his face turned gloomier and he asked coldly, "What are you asking that question for?"

Xu Fengnian frowned. He truly detested the woman in front of him. If she were to get inside the car too, wouldn't he be separated from Ye Li?
徐凤年连续打了两个电话，也没有人接，不悦的皱了皱眉。
Xu Fengnian made two consecutive calls but she did not answer any of them. He frowned in displeasure.
徐凤年闻言，眸中闪过一抹笑意，“我问的是你。”
Hearing her words, Xu Fengnian smiled and said, "I was asking about you."
徐凤年闻言，脸色一黑，手一下拍在了她的屁股上，“胡闹，这种事情岂是你随便乱说的，乖，等吃了饭，我们就去领证。”

Hearing her words, Xu Fengnian smacked her buttocks with a hostile expression and said, "Nonsense, how can you say such things frivolously? Be good, after our meal, we'll go and get our marriage registered."
Xu Fengnian remained silent.
徐大少的车！
'It's Young Master Xu's car!'
徐夫人上下打量她片刻，才欣慰的笑道：“真好，长大了，你妈妈要是泉下有知，肯定也会很开心的。”
Mrs. Xu scrutinized her for a moment before smiling with gratification. "Great, you're all grown up now. If your mother knows about this n the Netherworld,she'd definitely be elated."
徐夫人也很快就从情绪中恢复了过来，拉住了她的手拍了拍，才看向众人，疑惑的问道：“刚刚发生什么事情了？”
Mrs. Xu soon got a grip on her emotions and held onto Ye Li's hand. She patted it and looked at everyone else before asking in apprehension, "What happened just now?"
徐夫人听闻这话，脸上的笑容逐渐消失。
Upon hearing her words, Mrs. Xu's smile gradually vanished.
徐夫人见是几人，目光变得慈爱：“老大老二老三都来了，哎，这是...”她的目光落到叶漓身上时，突然愣了一下，随即瞳孔微张，整个人都失态的激动了起来：“阿，阿漓！”

Seeing that it was the few of them, Mrs. Xu's gaze became much more benevolent. "Ye Luo, Ye Xun, Ye Feng, you're all here..." When she saw Ye Li, she was suddenly stunned for a while and her pupils dilated immediately. She exclaimed agitatedly, "Ye Li!"
徐媛也没想到回事这样的情况，听到叶漓说这话，眼中闪过一抹恼怒。
Xu Yuan did not expect that to happen either. Her eyes were filled with fury when she heard Ye Li's words.
徐媛仿佛像是明白了什么似的，点了点头。
Xu Yuan nodded and she seemed to have understood something.
徐媛和温雅的笑容同时一僵。
Xu Yuan's and Wen Ya's smiles stiffened.

徐媛歉意的道。
Xu Yuan said apologetically.
徐媛正好走过来，她身后还跟着一个同她年级差不多大的女人，听到这话，徐媛笑道：“阿漓我大哥对你可真好，不过不会跳舞的话不大好吧，毕竟以后你嫁给我大哥的话，肯定会被邀请参加各种聚会的，到时候大家都在跳舞，就你不会，岂不是尴尬？”

Xu Yuan happened to walk over with a woman who was about the same age, behind her. Upon hearing those words, Xu Yuan smiled and said, "Ye Li, my cousin treats you so well but it doesn't seem appropriate for you to not know how to dance. After all, if you marry him in the future, you will definitely be invited to various social events. Wouldn't you be really awkward if everyone present can dance except you?"
徐媛点了点头，正欲说些什么，手机突然响起。
Xu Yuan nodded and was about to say something when her phone suddenly rang.
徐媛的手紧了紧，随后有些委屈的说：“我只是关心你，阿漓你看起来好不乐意的样子，若是让你生气了，那我道歉。”
Xu Yuan clenched her fists and said aggrievedly, "I'm just concerned about you. Ye Li, you seem upset. If I've angered you, I'm sorry."
徐媛的旁边就是徐晗两兄妹，她笑着打了一声招呼：“小倩小晗你们都来了。”
Xu Yuan was seated beside Xu Han and Xu Qian. She greeted smilingly, "Hello, Xu Qian, Xu Han."
徐媛的表情也僵住了。
Xu Yuan's expression stiffened too.
徐媛眉眼闪了闪，好似不在意的收回了目光。
Xu Yuan's eyes glistened and she looked away embarrassedly.
徐媛眼神微闪，随后看向了身边的女人。。
Xu Yuan's eyes flickered and she turned to look at the woman beside her.
徐媛笑着点了点头：“看来你们都很喜欢他呀，等我有时间，一定去接触一下。”
Xu Yuan smiled and nodded. "Seems like you guys like him a lot. I'll definitely get to know him when I have the time."
徐媛赶忙道：“可能是误会吧，我相信阿漓不是那种人。”
Xu Yuan hurriedly said, "It might be an understanding. I believe Ye Li is not such a person."
徐媛蹙了蹙眉，看清说话的人是谁之后，突然就笑了：“当然记得，眉儿也来了，我还说有时间去找你们叙叙呢。”
Xu Yuan frowned and smiled after taking a clear look at who it was. "Of course I do. You're here too, Ye Mei. I was thinking of going to see you to catch up with you some time."
徐媛这才将目光移到了叶漓身上。
Xu Yuan finally shifted her gaze onto Ye Li.
徐媛闻言，点了点头：“那应该就是妈妈您说的那个了。”
Xu Yuan nodded when she heard his words and said, "We should be talking about the same person then."
徐家夫人又送了一张特邀函给她。
'Mrs. Xu sent her another one?'
徐家很注重身份地位。
The Xu Family was very concerned about status.
徐家的人对她都很热情。
All the members of the Xu Family were very kind and friendly to her, especially Xu Yuan.
徐家的司机开来了车，停在了两人面前。
The Xu Family's chauffeur pulled the car over in front of the couple.
徐家的餐桌上。

徐家这一代子嗣很少。

Xu Han grabbed her mobile phone and exclaimed, "If you wait any longer, you're going to get arrested!"
徐晗一阵烦躁的坐到了自己的位置上，看到叶漓高高扎起的马尾，几乎就快要忍不住想要狠狠欺负她的冲动。
Xu Han returned to his seat in frustration. When he saw Ye Li's high ponytail, he almost couldn't resist the impulse to bully her.
徐晗一顿。
Xu Han paused.
徐晗下意识的朝着叶漓看的方向看去，正好就对上了自家大表哥冰冷的目光。
Xu Han subconsciously looked at Ye Li and happened to meet the icy cold gaze of his eldest cousin, Xu Fengnian.
徐晗不喜接触这样心思复杂的女生，也不希望自家妹妹接触。

徐晗不知道说什么。

Xu Han's expression changed a little when he entered the classroom and saw that scene.
徐晗原本还只是抱着怀疑的心理，可当看到叶漓在大哥身边坐下时，心里的一切质疑都碎了一地。
Xu Han was initially skeptical, but when he saw Ye Li sitting down beside his eldest cousin, all the doubts in his heart vanished.
徐晗只是淡淡扫了她一眼，没有说话。

徐晗心一紧，赶忙错开了目光，可等反应过来就是一阵懊恼.

徐晗愣了一下，拧着眉头看她。

徐晗提着书包走了进来。

Xu Han glanced at the name of the contact on her mobile phone and his gaze turned extremely cold. "You're still contacting Yu Xiangyang!?!"

Xiangyang frowned. Although he had heard some of it, he was not interested in paying attention to the gossip about the entertainment industry and simply took it as an incident that involved Yu Xiangyang and Ye Li. Hence, he didn't think much about it.

心底深处也涌出了一股子怨恨！

心里对叶漓恨得牙痒痒，这个贱女人，绝对是故意的！

心里恨得要死，可却丝毫不敢表现半分，宛如林黛玉一般，摇摇欲坠的上了楼。

心里本来就对她很不满，这会儿又不交论文，程艳说什么今儿个也得好好教训一下她。

Cheng Yan was initially already extremely annoyed and displeased with her in the first place and to make matters worse, Ye Li failed to submit her paper this time. Cheng Yan was bent on teaching her a lesson no matter what.
心里虽然疑惑，但是司机也来不及多想，赶忙上了车问：“总裁，接下来要去哪里？”
Although he was filed with doubts, the chauffeur did not have time to think at all. He hurriedly got inside the car and asked, "Mr. Xu, where do we head to next?"
心里这样想着，叶漓眼珠子转了转，突然就有了个邪恶的想法，故作好奇的问到：“哥哥，那个男生是谁啊？你家亲戚吗？”
While thinking about it, Ye Li rolled her eyes and a sinister idea suddenly popped up in her mind. Pretending to be curious, she asked, "Xu Fengnian, who's that boy? Is he your relative?"
怎么也不相信，他们的女神竟然会做出这样的事情。
They couldn't believe that their goddess would do such a thing.
怎么也不能委屈了她。
'She can't be shortchanged and mistreated no matter what.'
怎么也想不到，这女孩背后的家世竟然这么庞大。

怎么会，二哥出国演讲，大哥忙着公司的事情几乎走不开，三哥的行程那么多，怎么可能会来学校请叶漓吃饭。

'How is that possible? Ye Xun has gone abroad to give a speech while Ye Luo is busy with the matters at the office. Ye Feng has a tight schedule too. How could he come to school and take Ye Li out for lunch?'
怎么变成了自己？
'Why did it suddenly become me?'
怎么可能会愿意帮她说话？

怎么回事，邀请函不是在自己这里吗，叶漓怎么还会有？
'What's going on? Isn't the invitation card with me? Why does Ye Li have it too?"
怎么这么安静。

总之各种各样难听的话，让一向自命清高的叶漓几乎无地自容，再加上那一天，她匆忙找自己的男神于向阳解释的时候，被那个男人一脸厌恶的叫滚，这才绝望自杀。

Bombarded by all sorts of insults, Ye Li, who had always been lofty, felt incredibly ashamed and to make matters worse, Yu Xiangyang, her idol,told her to get lost with a look of disgust when she hurriedly tried to give him an explanation. She was in so much despair that she tried to take her own life.
恐是没想到这辈子还能听到叶漓这一声哥哥。

情敌真多。
'So many love rivals.'
想到上辈子这个女人做出的一切，她眉眼微微眯了眯。
At the thought of everything this woman had done in her previous life, she squinted a little.
想到两人的差距，叶眉的心里顿时就开心了。
At the thought of the difference between the two of them, Ye Mei immediately felt elated.

Meng Fei's father was incredibly infuriated at the thought of everything that happened today.
想到他们上辈子结婚的时候，自己已经是二十三岁，叶漓眸光微微一暗。
Ye Li's gaze grew dimmer when she thought about the fact that she was 23 years old when they got married in her previous life.
想到对方自作主张的跟着自己，大夫人心中有些不悦，可人已经进来了，总不能赶走。
Thinking about the fact that Ye Mei had followed her presumptuously, Mrs. Xu was a little displeased. However, she couldn't chase Ye Mei away since she had already entered.
想到此，叶漓嘴角勾起了一抹邪恶的微笑，开口道：“是啊，凤年哥哥，吃了晚饭再走吧。”
At the thought of this, Ye Li smirked sinisterly and said, "Yeah, Brother Fengnian, stay for dinner before you leave."
想到自己之前的所作所为，程艳顿时浑身发凉。
At the thought of everything that she had done previously, Cheng Yan immediately felt a chill running through her entire body.
想到自己回来的目的，徐媛的眸光闪烁了一下，朝着叶漓伸出了手：“阿漓妹妹，好久不见，你长漂亮了哦。”
At the thought of her purpose of coming home, Xu Yuan's eyes glistened and she reached her hand out to Ye Li. "Ye Li, it's been long since we last met. You've grown prettier."
想到自己差点遭遇那样的场面，两人不禁都不满的看向叶漓，说道：“是啊，之前的聚会都是眉儿去的，我们可是从来就没见过你。”

At the thought of the fact that they almost had to end up in such circumstances, they couldn't help but look at Ye Li with dissatisfaction and said, "Yeah, Ye Mei turned up for all the gatherings in the past and we've never seen you before."
想到自己当初的愚蠢，叶漓真恨不得给自己几个耳光。
Thinking of her own stupidity, Ye Li really wanted to give herself a few tight slaps.
想到自己曾今最厌恶的人，现在却不得不被逼无奈主动接近，于向阳的心里就是一阵厌恶，他甚至有些埋怨起了叶眉，为什么她不是叶枫的亲妹妹，这样的话，自己就不用勉强自己了。

The thought of having to take the initiative to approach the person he once loathed the most, Yu Xiangyang's heart was filled with disgust and he even began to put the blame on Yu Xiangyang. He thought, 'Why isn't she Ye Feng's biological sister? If she is, I won't have to force myself to do this.'
想到这个可能，叶漓整个人都陷入了一阵震惊当中。
At the thought of this possibility, Ye Li was flabbergasted.
想到这个可能，叶漓的脸一下就白了。
Ye Li turned pale as soon as she thought of that possibility.
想到这个可能，周围的人顿时蠢蠢欲动了起来，几乎是抢着回答，“徐夫人，刚我们看到了，是那几个小姐不知道因为什么在针对叶小姐。”

At the thought of this possibility, everyone else began to get riled up. They almost vied to answer, "Mrs. Xu, we've seen what happened just now. Those few ladies were targeting Miss Ye Li for some reason."
想到这个可能，女同学慌了。
The girl panicked when she thought of this.
想到这个可能，校长的老脸白了起来。
The old principal turned pale at the thought of it.
想到这个场景，男人就是一阵不悦，拒绝道：“抱歉，我不习惯让别人坐我的车。”
At the thought of that scene, Xu Fengnian declined in displeasure, "I'm sorry, I'm not comfortable with giving others a ride in my car."
想到这种可能，叶漓的心里顿时就冒起了火，“我不明白你们在说什么，赶紧滚开！”
At the thought of this possibility, Ye Li immediately flew into a rage and barked, "I don't understand what you people are saying, hurry and leave!"
想到这种可能，她又不禁有些慌了，暗暗埋怨起了叶眉，为什么自己都没有看见，就那样说，害的她还以为自己猜对了，才会那么理直气壮的找叶漓的麻烦。

At the thought of this possibility, she couldn't help but be flustered and secretly blame Ye Mei. 'Why did Ye Mei say that even though she did not witness it with her own eyes? She caused me to think that I had guessed correctly and thus cause trouble for Ye Li self-righteously.'
想到这里，两母女的心情都逐渐阴沉了下去。
At the thought of this, Xu Yuan and Kong Yun both felt gloomy.
想到这里，他的瞳孔深了深。
At the thought of this, his pupils became gloomy.
想到这里，几人看叶漓的眼神中已经充满了恶意。
At the thought of this, they looked at Ye Li with malicious gazes.
想到这里，即使心里再怎么不甘，他也只得装作一副歉意无比的样子说告别：“这次的事情我真的很抱歉，一人做事一人当，阿枫，网上的事情我会出来澄清的，你好好在家陪陪阿漓吧。”

At the thought of this, he had no choice but to pretend to be extremely apologetic despite feeling indignant deep down."I'm really sorry for what happened this time. I should take responsibility for my own actions. Feng, I will step forth to clarify the rumors on the internet. Stay at home and accompany Li."
想到这里，叶漓冷笑。
Ye Li sneered at the thought of this.
想到这里，叶眉心里暗暗下了决定，一定要将叶家资产抢到手的决定！
At the thought of this, Ye Mei secretly made a decision in her heart to seize the assets of the Ye Family!
想到这里，叶眉暗暗冷笑，脸上却是一脸为难，“那也行，要是你能受得了的话。”
At the thought of this, Ye Mei secretly chuckled but she nonetheless put on a conflicted look. "Sure,if you can take it."
想到这里，大家的表情都变得不不自在了起来。

The moment she saw Ye Li, she was slightly stunned, after which she stood up with a look of surprise. "Sis Li, you're awake. Do you feel any discomfort?"

看到这一幕场景，也是呆在了原地。

看她脸色黯然，徐夫人才反应过来自己提到了这些伤心事，不免有些歉意，“瞧我，大好的日子说这些什么，阿漓，阿姨不是故意的，你别介意。”

看她走进了试衣间，徐倩顿时就凑到了自家哥哥身边，激动的掐着他的手臂，“哥哥哥，叶家小姐啊，那不就是凤年哥哥要订婚的那个人吗？天哪，姑妈今天还说让咱们过去给咱们介绍的，没想到竟然在这里碰上了未来的大嫂子！”

看来这又是一个自作多情的女人。

看看这关心的表情，要不是已经经历过一辈子，叶漓估摸要感动。

看着叶漓走进教室，大家小声议论了起来。

看着男人露出这样的表情，她心里就是一阵抽疼，赶忙解释道：“过段时间不是我爷爷八十大寿吗，我想到时候给他一个惊喜。”

看着车消失在黑夜当中。

看着镜中圆润的自己，她微微叹了口气。

看起来最为关心柔软的话，带来的后果却是致命。

着实是叶漓这五官精致的让人无可挑剔。

着实是她这个借口太过牵强。

竟然还是徐凤年的大学同学兼同桌。

等人走了，大家才从震惊中回过了神。

终于在最好的年纪毁了她，这一直是叶眉最得意开心的事情。

这样锋利带着杀气的眼神让叶眉微微一惊，不由的倒退了几步。
The menacing and sharp look in her eyes made Ye Mei feel a cold chill down her spine as she couldn't help but take a few steps back.
这次ys丝毫没有给叶眉留面子，直接将她进店到离开的监控全部发出。
This time, YS Fashion did not bother being polite or saving Ye Mei's pride anymore. They simply posted the footage of the entire process of Ye Mei entering the store and leaving.
这次三哥哥和他闹崩，这还没多久呢，就赶紧找上门来了。
This time, he showed up at their home shortly after he fell out with Ye Li's third brother.
这次也没想到这丫头会来，这会看到她，心里是无比的激动。
This time, she did not expect Ye Li to turn up. When she saw her, she was incredibly excited.
这次回校，她改头换面的样子，学校里的人都没认出自己。
This time, no one in school could recognize her after her makeover.
这次好不容易弄到手，结果告诉她余额不足？
Now that she had finally gotten it after so much effort, she was told that the balance was insufficient.
这次是自己大意了，没想到叶漓和自己查到的资料中的她完全不一样，才导致出现了这种情况。
She had been too careless this time and she did not expect Ye Li to be completely different from the information she had found out about her, which led to this situation.
这死丫头，看什么书，看帅哥不香？
'This damned girl. What is she reading? Isn't it nice to look at a hunk?'
这种大家族的聚会，想要进去的人几乎挤破了脑袋，特别是一些居心不良的女的，为了攀上关系，不惜付出代价，就为了跟着别人进去。

There would often be numerous people who would rack their brains and think of a solution to attend such a social gathering hosted by a wealthy and powerful family, especially some women with ill intentions who would try to enter together with others at all costs, just for the sake of cozying up to someone powerful.
这突然的转折让维护叶眉的粉丝们大脑差点没有转过弯来。
The sudden twist in events made Ye Mei's fans who were continuously defending her, unable to react or process what was happening.
这简直就是要将她推入刀剑风口上啊。
Ye Mei was simply pushing her to death.
这表情落在其他人的眼中，就是叶漓是怕他们怪罪，所以才说了谎，不敢说自己喜欢于向阳。
In the eyes of others, Ye Mei's expression seemed to be suggesting that she was afraid that they would blame her and hence, she decided to lie and deny that she adored Yu Xiangyang.
这让二夫人的心里微微有些不悦。
That made Kong Yun feel a little displeased.
这让原本都准备好被她拒绝的叶枫一愣。
That caused Ye Feng, who was ready to be rejected by her to be stunned.
这让叶父一度十分为难。
That made Ye Ming feel stuck in a spot at one point.
这话一出。
As soon as she said that, Kong Yun's smile stiffened for two seconds.
这话一出，不仅给对方台阶下不说，还变相的告诉大家，叶漓这是恼羞成怒了，才敢这么说话。
Not only did she give the girl an out by saying that, she even indirectly told everyone that Ye Li said those words because she was ashamed and angry.
这话一出，于向阳的刚缓和的脸色瞬间又阴沉了下去。
As soon as she said those words, Yu Xiangyang's expression which had just become mellower, immediately became sullen again.
这话一出，众人又是一呆。
Everyone was dumbfounded to hear her words.
这话一出，众人直接蹙眉倒退。
After she said that, everyone immediately frowned and took a step back.
这话一出，全场气氛凝滞。
As soon as she said those words, the ambiance seemed to have tensed up.
这话一出，办公室的门被人敲响。
As soon as she said those words, someone knocked on the door of the office.
这话一出，叶眉的表情微变，劝道：“这样不好吧阿漓，我吃的都太素了，你肯定受不了的。”
As soon as she said those words, Ye Li's expression changed a little and she persuaded, "That doesn't seem appropriate, Li. My food is too bland, you definitely won't be able to stand it."
这话一出，叶眉顿时不开心了，蹙了蹙眉，抽出了黑卡递过去：“我买下总能拍了吧，还有我两个朋友的，一起结。”她大方的道。

As soon as she said that, Ye Mei immediately frowned in displeasure. She took out the black card and handed it to her. "I can take a photo of it after I buy it, can't I? bill this together with the dresses that my friends have chosen," she said generously.
这话一出，在场的人都惊叫了起来。
As soon as he said those words, everyone exclaimed in shock.
这话一出，大夫人和老爷子都沉了脸。
After she said that, austere expressions formed on the faces of Mrs. Xu and Xu Fengnian's grandfather.
这话一出，孟父都愣了一下。
Even Meng Fei's father was shocked to hear her words.
这话一出，引得周围的不少客人和服务员都投来了艳羡的目光。
As soon as she said that, many of the customers and service and sales assistants looked at them enviously.
这话一出，所有人都惊愕的看她。
Everyone looked at her in shock when she said those words.
这话一出，整个餐桌都陷入了冰点。
As soon as she said those words, tension arose at the dining table.
这话不是叶漓说的。
Ye Li was not the one who said that.
这话可能是他从出生至今，听到过最可笑的笑话。
That was probably the greatest joke he had ever heard since he was born.
这话听起来好似是为叶漓着想。
She sounded like she was sparing a thought for Ye Li.
这话听起来好似真的为叶漓说话，可却变相的告诉大家，没错，你们猜对了，叶漓就是因为被人拒绝表白，才会跑去自杀！
Although she sounded as if she was really speaking for Ye Li, she was indirectly telling everyone that Ye Li had really tried to commit suicide because she had gotten rejected!
这话有故意的成分在里面，让经理和导购都有些不大开心起来。
She was deliberately saying those words, which caused the manager and sales assistant to feel offended.
这话落到孟非耳中，那就是炫耀。
Meng Fei felt that she was just showing off.
这话说出来，他势必会非常生气，甚至和于向阳断绝兄弟关系。
If he were to say those things, Yu Xiangyang would definitely fly into a rage and sever their friendship.
这话说的，知道的他们只是大学同学关系，不知道的，还以为她是徐凤年前女友了！
'Those who aren't aware that they're former college classmates might think that she's Xu Fengnian's ex-girlfriend!'
这辈子她不在做个怂包，不在因为那些冤枉和欺辱就抬不起头。
In this life, she would no longer be a coward who would hang her head low just because she had been wronged and bullied.
这辈子她再也不做一个与世无争的女孩，她要做一个魔女，哪怕人人唾之，也要将所有欺负过的自己的人狠狠踩在脚下！
In this life, she would never be a kind-hearted girl again! She would be a demoness who would trample on everyone who bullied her, even if she had to face the criticism of everyone!
这辈子她告诉自己，没关系，一切都可以重来，自己上辈子犯得错，这一世用一辈子来弥补，于是，她拨出了那熟悉的电话。

In this life, she told herself that it didn't matter because she could start anew again and she could atone for all the mistakes that she had made in her previous life. Hence, she dialed the familiar phone number.
这辈子，只要能让关心她的人开心，让叶漓做什么，她都愿意。
In this life, Ye Li would be willing to do anything to please the people who cared about her.
这辈子，她需要换一个方式生活，一个谁也惹不起的方式！
In this lifetime, she had to change the way she lived and made sure that no one could provoke her!
这辈子，这些叶漓都将会百倍奉还给她。
In this life, Ye Li would pay Ye Mei back in her own coin.
这还是才开始呢！
'This is only the beginning!'
进了教室，她又刷了一波惊奇的目光。
Once she entered the class, she again attracted many gazes of amazement.
道歉，不甘心！
She wasn't willing to apologize!
那一瞬间，叶漓脸上的狠，他看的比谁都清楚。
At that instant, he saw clearly the viciousness on Ye Li's face.
那个人给她带来的改变，就这么夸张吗？
'Did that person bring about such a drastic change to her?'
那个叫做“看小凤漓照进我微博置顶”的人很快就回复了大家的消息。
The person whose Twitter handle was @ComeToMyPageToSeePhotosOfYeLi, soon replied to everyone's tweets.
那个叶漓又是谁。
'Who's Ye Li?'
那个时候她就发誓，若是自己超过不了她，那就一定要将她毁掉。
Back then, she swore that she would destroy Ye Li if she could not surpass her.
那个时候，两个小家伙的关系还是十分好的，他当初还无比欣慰，谁料想随着两个孩子的长大，关系越来越差了不说，女儿还开始讨厌起了对方。

Back then, she was very close to Xu Fengnian and he was even gratified because of their close relationship. To his surprise, the older the two of them got, the more strained their relationship became. Ye Li even began hating Xu Fengnian.
那个时候，她因为拒绝了这个邀请，所以并没有关注这个聚会，只是记得，这个时候，叶眉来找她借钱，说是想要买一条限定裙子去参加聚会，叶漓的私房钱很多，也没多想，直接就把自己的唯一一张黑卡给她刷了。

At that time, she refused the invitation, so she did not pay attention to the gathering. She only remembered that Ye Li borrowed money from her, allegedly to purchase a limited edition dress that she could wear to the gathering. Ye Li had a lot of savings and hence, she lent her one and only black credit card to Ye Mei without hesitation.
那个男人一向沉默寡言，更别说好好解释，因此两人的好不容易缓和的关系再次破裂，叶漓更是拼了命的想要逃离帝家。

His silence and lack of a proper explanation caused their relationship, which had gotten better after a great deal of painstaking efforts, to break down once again. Ye Li desperately wanted to leave the family.
那人死死的捏住了她的衣服，靠近两步。
The girl pinched her shirt tightly and approached her.
那人生，仿佛开挂了一般。
It was as if her life had suddenly became better.
那从大夫人身后冒头眨眼睛的女孩不是坐他前面的小胖还有谁？
The girl who winked behind Mrs. Xu was obviously the Little Fatty who usually sat in front of him in class.
那他就永远不可能再和他为伍。
Hence, Ye Feng would never be friends with Yu Xiangyang again.
那会的她，嫉妒的都快要疯了。
At that time, she was so jealous that she was almost going to lose her mind.
那副情深意切的模样不似作假。
The look of concern and affection on Ye Mei's face seemed genuine.
那只是因为她没有将这张脸露出来而已。
那可就有好戏看了。
That would be interesting, they thought.
那同学见叶眉这样，心里稍微舒坦了一些，于是抬着下巴施舍一般的语气说：“行，那我就再给她一次机会，给我道歉，并主动站出来承担这件事的责任！”

Seeing Ye Mei's reaction, the girl felt a little more at ease. Hence, she raised her chin and said condescendingly as if she was doing some charity, "Fine, in this case I will give her another chance to apologize to me, and take the initiative to come forward to take responsibility for this matter!"
那天自己说的话虽然是过分了一些，但是自己现在都主动上门道歉了，不至于转变的那么夸张吧？
'I may have been too harsh with my words that day but I've already taken the initiative to apologize. She shouldn't have changed so drastically because of that, right?'
那女生闻言，冷哼一声：“叶眉同学不是我不给你面子，你看你姐姐这丝毫没有悔悟之心就罢了，还在这里死不承认，真是没见过这种人，反正我话是撂在这里了，你一天不道歉，我们向阳粉一天不会放过你！”她放下狠话。

Hearing her words, the girl humphed coldly and said, "Ye Mei, it's not that I don't want to spare her on your account but look how unrepentant your sister is. She even refuses to admit to her mistake. I've really never seen such a person before. Anyway, I'm only going to say this once. If you don't apologize, we, the fans of Xiangyang, will never let you off!"
那女生闻言，脸一下就黑了：“我是向阳的粉丝，我自然是他粉丝的名义维护他！”
Upon hearing her words, the girl's face turned sullen and she exclaimed, "I'm Xiangyang's fan. Of course I'm defending him as a fan!"
那怎么可能会是出现在一个二十岁少女脸上的表情。
That was not an expression that should appear on a twenty-year-old girl.
那时候上叶家依旧很庞大，整个帝都能动的了手的也就只有徐家。
At that time, the Ye Family was still extremely powerful and the Xu Family was the only family in Beijing that could touch them.
那时候她和徐凤年是隐婚关系，除了比较亲的人和一些消息灵通的人知道，外人并不知道他结婚。
At that time, Ye Li and Xu Fengnian were keeping their marriage a secret. Other than a few close friends and some well-informed people, outsiders did not know that he was already married.
那时候她还不清楚自己和叶漓的差距。
At that time, she was still unclear about the differences between her and Ye Li.
那时候的她长得就像是洋娃娃，所有人都夸她好看，而忽略了认真优秀的自己。
At that time, she looked just like a doll and everyone praised her for her good looks, thus neglecting Ye Mei who was truly outstanding.
那是一个怎样的眼神啊，锋利如刀，似是一瞬间划破了空气，准确无误的刺中了他们。
Her gaze was sharp like daggers which seemed to have cut through the air and stabbed them accurately.
那服务员闻言，点了点头，“那我帮你查一下。”说着又退了下去。
The sales assistant nodded and said, "Let me check on it for you." She then retreated.
那样的感觉，仿佛是君王在看已经犯了死刑的罪人。
He felt as if he was a criminal who had been given a death sentence, and was being stared at by the king.
那样的眼神，一点也不像是对喜爱之人的。
She did not seem to be looking at the person she adored at all.
那样的眼神，好似再说：“别闹。”
He seemed to be trying to tell her with his eyes, "Cut it out."
那样的话，这些人是会更瞧不起自己！
If he were to do that, they would look down on him further!
那样轻飘飘的语气，仿佛好似再说今天吃些什么，孟父给气笑了：“还给我装，你以为你是谁，你知道我孟氏有多大吗？还想收购，真是笑死....”一句话还没说完，兜里的手机突然剧烈震动了起来，随之而来的，还有“出卖我的爱，你背着我离开，知道真相的我眼泪掉下来~”的铃声。

His nonchalant tone made it seem like he was just talking about what he had for lunch today, causing Meng Fei's father to laugh in anger. "Go on pretending. Who do you think you are? Do you know how major of a business the Meng Group is? You want to acquire it?What a joke..." Before he even finished, his mobile phone suddenly began vibrating violently in his pocket, followed by a ringtone of a song about romance.
那模样好似被叶漓欺负了一样，好大的委屈。
She looked extremely aggrieved, as if she had been bullied by Ye Li.
那种感觉，仿佛被野兽盯上了一般，他心里发紧，身体紧绷的朝着视线主人的方向看去。
He felt as if he had been targeted by a wild beast. His heart tensed up together with his body and he looked in the direction of the person who shot him that gaze.
那边叶洛满意的挂断了电话，就见办公室的门被人打开。
Ye Luo hung up in satisfaction, after which someone opened the doors of his office.
那边的叶洛顿时满意了，“行，那我们说好了，鱼庄有什么好吃的，哥哥带你去帝都最大的海鲜酒店吃个够。”

Ye Luo was immediately pleased. "Okay, it's settled then. What's so good about that fish restaurant? I'll take you to the best seafood restaurant in Beijing where you can eat to your heart's content."
那里，站着一男一女两人。
There was a man and a woman standing there.
都从对方的眼中看到了尴尬。
They could see the awkwardness in each other's eyes.
都是叶眉小姐叶眉小姐的叫。
They would simply call her 'Miss Ye Mei'.
都是神仙颜值啊！
They were incredibly good-looking!
酒杯与酒杯的碰撞声，男男女女轻笑交谈的声音，无数侍者单手抬着托盘，游行在人群中，无一不显示着这场聚会的格调高雅。

The sounds of wine glasses being clinked together and the joyous laughter of the males and females who were chatting with each other merrily, could be heard. There were also waiters pacing through the crowd, holding up trays singlehandedly, highlighting the posh elegance of the gathering.
醒来的第一件事，称体重。
The first thing she did when she woke up was to measure her weight.
重生回到学校的第一天，就被惩罚，这感觉还真是奇特。
It was the first day that she had returned to school after being reborn and getting punished was a bizarre feeling to her.
野王来一个：“眉宝，那件事是真的吗？你姐姐真的和枫神一起吃饭了？他们到底什么关系啊（抓狂）！”
Give Me A Wild King: "Ye Mei, is that true? Did your sister really have lunch with Ye Feng? What exactly is their relationship with each other!?! (Going mad)."
野王的女人：“终于有人出来澄清了，既然他们没有关系，我就可以放心的喷那个小凤漓了，竟然还发什么就喜欢你们看不惯我却又干不掉我的模样，真是好嚣张啊，我还以为她跟枫神关系很好呢，没想到是她约人家吃的饭！”

Wild King's Woman: "Finally, someone has come out to clarify this matter. Now that I know there's nothing between them I can finally be at ease and criticize that Little Ye Li. How dare she be so smug and tweet that she likes seeing us being angry at her while being unable to do anything to her. She's really arrogant. I thought that she had a very close relationship with Ye Feng. I didn't expect her to have asked him out for lunch!"
镜中的女儿脸很大，还留着厚重的齐刘海儿，土里土气不说，还显得头大。
The girl in the mirror had a large face and thick and neat bangs which not only made her look like unsophisticated, it also made her head look large.
除了有钱，好像是其他的都跟她没什么关系了。
Apart from being wealthy, she did not have any other positive attributes.
除了莉莉安，排在她前面的其他几个她都不怕。
Other than Lilian, Ye Mei was not afraid of the others because she knew that they had risen to popularity using money.
随后一阵粉丝蜂拥而上。
随后人群一阵骚乱，疯狂的尖叫层层迭起！
Afterwards, a commotion broke out and the crowd began screaming hysterically!
随后反应过来，想这可能是刚刚自己的作为已经被人爆了，只是他没想到，妹妹的微博竟然被人挖了出来，想着她即将会遭受了什么，叶枫的脸色微微变了变，刚开机，十几个未接电话就跳了过来，有公司的，有经纪人的，也有他大哥二哥的。

He then recovered from the shock and thought that it was probably because of the uproar that was caused by his actions. However, he did not expect his younger sister's Twitter account to be exposed. Thinking that she might be about to receive some hate, Ye Feng's expression changed a little. As soon as he unlocked his mobile phone, he received more than ten missed calls. They were from his management agency, manager, and elder brothers.
随后对面不知说了什么，他手中的电话啪的一下掉在了地上，直接就黑了屏。
Afterwards, he said something and his mobile phone suddenly dropped on the ground, after which the screen turned black.
随后就是惊喜：“真的吗？”
She then asked in surprise, "Really?"
随后打开微博，删除了那些图并致歉。
She then opened Twitter to delete the photo and make an apology.
随后逐渐难看下去。
It then gradually became worse.
随着长大，这种情况一直限制着她。
That condition of hers had been restricting her throughout her adolescence.
难..难不成自己重生了？
'Did... did I get reborn?'
难不成真招惹到不该招惹的人了?
'Could it be that we have really provoked someone we shouldn't have?'
难怪。
'That explains it.'
难怪他敢当着那么多人的面带她吃饭。
No wonder he dared to take her to lunch in front of so many people.
难怪叶漓敢在微博上说那种话。
No wonder Ye Li dared to say those things on Twitter.
难怪叶眉这么想要这条裙子，就是叶漓，也被镜子中的自己惊艳了片刻。
'No wonder Ye Mei desperately wanted this dress.' Even Ye Li was stunned and amazed by her own reflection for a while when she stood in front of the mirror.
难怪她会冲动的跑去自杀，难怪她会那样恨他们，原来学校里的那群人才是罪魁祸首！
It was no wonder that she had decided to kill herself in a moment of impulse. It turned out that her schoolmates were all culprits!
难道也是去参加徐家的聚会的吗？
'Is she going to attend the social gathering hosted by Xu Fengnian's family too?'
难道叶漓醒来，又闹了吗？
'Did Ye Li throw a tantrum again after regaining consciousness?'
难道真的是因为自己身份的原因吗？
'Is it really because of my identity?'
难道眼前这个女生，也是叶家的小姐？
Is this girl in front of them a daughter of the Ye Family too? They wondered.
难道说，枫神是来邀请叶眉吃饭的吗？
They wondered, 'Did Ye Feng invite Ye Mei to lunch?'
面对曾经疼爱自己的父亲和哥哥们的各种相逼，同学们的嘲笑，性格极端的她直接跳了学校的池塘，险些淹死。

Faced with all kinds of pressure from her father and brothers, who used to love and dote on her very much, as well as the mockery of her classmates, Ye Li, who had an extreme personality, jumped straight into the pond in school where she almost drowned.
面目扭曲！
She grimaced!
顿时，教室里发出了一阵凄厉的惨叫。
All of a sudden, a miserable shriek sounded in the classroom.
颜值也只是中上等。
His looks were only slightly above average too.
风向cp：“请你自觉离开枫神，不然我们cp粉与你势不两立！”
Ye Feng And Xiangyang Are A True Pair: "Please be self-aware and leave Ye Feng. Otherwise, we'll go against you!"
骂声越来越烈。
The hateful comments became more and more aggressive.
黑色更是将她原本就白嫩的肌肤衬托的几欲发光。
The color black accentuated her fair and tender skin, making it look like it was glowing and almost luminescent.
鼎鼎大名，娱乐圈顶级流量大明星枫神，正一脸兴奋的朝着一个方向跑了过去。
The famous A-list celebrity of the entertainment industry, Ye Feng, was scurrying in another direction excitedly.
果然。
Just as he expected.

tu.prop: “我什么时候要能跟偶像吃顿饭，我当场猝死都愿意！”
叶眉早就预料到这种情况，这会儿脸上带着温柔的笑容，周围的人纷纷也给她让开了道，着实一副众星捧月的场面。

tuv.seg: 众人艳羡的目光落到了叶眉身上。
Everyone cast looks of envy at Ye Li.
